story:
Hi everyone! I am trying to raise money to be able to showcase my jewelry in Boston with RAW artists on Sunday October 27. The event is targeted to help support and promote artists of all media from all over the country. This will be the largest city and largest event that I will have ever shown my work and would give my jewelry line a ton of exposure. There is estimated to be over 500 attendees at the show along with the 25+ artists showcasing there. Since most of my friends and family live in CT I understand that attending this event on a Sunday night might be difficult, so instead of nagging everyone to buy tickets to support me, I decided that raising the money here would be easier and I will front all the ticket money myself. Any money that you donate will go directly toward the cost of the show and you will automatcally get a spot on the guest list if you do decide to attend. Without this money I cannot afford to do the show. I am so grateful that you are even reading this, so thank you! for your time and contributions. Hopefully my career as an artist will blossum from here as a result of your kindness and support!

And if you do want to come, the show is Sunday October 27th at Rumor in Boston, MA. 7pm-11pm.

story:
Hey Indiegogo!

My name is Andy Dewar and together with my partner, Antonio Rodrigues, we are the founders of Dewar Watches, a new, Swiss, luxury, handcrafted, watch company.

Mine and Antonio's business relationship formed when back in the summer of 2013, I sold my two year old social networking site with 1,000,000+ members to Antonio. After the sale we both discovered we had a passion for watches and decided to start a watch company. We then took to the drawing board (or laptop) to design some prototypes. After about a week of designing prototypes, we finally got to see the finished product.

So that's enough about us, let's have a look at the watches.

 The Dewar Moon is a beautiful timepiece that was inspired by a friend saying the dial looked like a moon. The name just stuck from then!

 This is the Dewar Helmsman in Red. This timepiece was inspired by my love of yachts, and another name for the captain of a boat is the Helmsman. This piece is available in Red, Blue, Green and Orange.

The Dewar Flight Scale is a perfect timepiece to wear on your private jet. The inspiration was taken from just that, the jet life of billionaires.

So they're the watches, here's the technical info:

Size and weight Case width:41 mm excluding crown

 Thickness: 12 mm

Water resistance: 50 m / 5 ATM (not swim/dive)

Our watches are made by hand in Stockholm, Sweden and normally take around 3 days to produce. They are the best quality. That's our mind state, if it isn't perfect, it isn't right.

What will the Indiegogo funding go to?

Advertising,

Getting a bulk order of Dewar Watches.

We have a deal with a large retailer for 100 Dewar Watches, unfortunately at this time we can't afford to do it ourselves, so we hope Indiegogo will be able to help!

If anyone has any questions feel free to email either myself or Antonio at sales@dewarwatches.com and we'll be able to help you!

Otherwise, Happy Pledging!

Visit our website!

Visit our Instagram too!

story:
We’re back! After shipping our stain & odour repellent shirts to fresh men in 98 countries it’s time to venture into an equally important part of the male body - the bottom.  Get ready to dress more stylish, without compromising on performance and comfort.

Washing your pants less means they will look good for years. Combined with the superior craftsmanship and enforced seems and thread these pants will outlast any other pants in your closet.

The outside repels liquids and semi-liquids, while the inside is anti-bacterial and odour repellent. 

 They repel all water-based liquids such as red wine, coffee or cola.


 

Through extensive research and prototyping at our lab in Switzerland, we have created a unique treatment mix called FreshCore™. By manipulating cotton fibers we shield them from both bacteria and liquids. Our treatments do not affect the hand feel of the fabric. Thanks to the yarn construction we are able to reach similar or higher levels of breathability than any untreated pants in the market.

        All research and production are done in Europe and are Blue-Sign certified and in line with REACH, which are the world's harshest regulations of use of chemicals in apparel. In short - you do not have to worry about the effect of our tech on neither your body nor the environment.

Wear both formal and casual 

We wanted to create great-looking pants that fit, feel and perform well - no matter what your day brings.

The flap cover ensures a clean look while the hidden elastic waistband in the sides give extra stretch and comfort, whether you are running to a meeting or sitting on a plane. It also means you can stick to your size: whether you lose or gain a few your kilos, your pants will still fit perfectly. 

We have added an extra-strong click button for an easy, but secure closure with an additional button to avoid the fabric pulling on the front. 

 We wanted to make sure everyone gets their perfect length: Even though our pants come in 2 lengths, we have also added 4 cm hidden extra length, should you need a little extra. 

Function and looks in one: the discrete pocket zip means you can keep your valuables safe without compromising on the look of your pants. The zip pocket conveniently fits your smartphone or passport.

 These pants are made for the long run, thanks to the enforced seams and strong polyester thread. All details such as buttons and belt loops also have enforced stitching. 

Don't take our word for it. We use the unfiltered platform Trustpilot for all reviews - both the good and the bad. We have no way to interfere with the reviews. This is a part of our commitment to full transparency in both production, sustainability and customer experience (we're not gonna tell you our secret recipe though).

We have been making stain & odour free cotton for almost 2 years. The reactions from across the world have been unreal.

Not all heroes wear capes. Some wear lab coats. And LABFRESH works with the best of them in Switzerland and Portugal. By setting up a dedicated supply chain from scratch and rocking the internet LABFRESH is helping the creators get their smart inventions out of the lab and into closets across the globe.

                 When we develop a new product we put our back into it. We obsess. That’s why we only launched 3 products in 3 years.

By reducing the need for washing we extend the lifetime of our products. By investing in longevity, durability, and wearability we contribute to lowering consumerism. Wash less. Wear more. Buy less.

                 We keep a close eye on our environmental footprint and as a company, we take full responsibility. This includes ensuring the best work environment at our manufacturers in Europe.

                 At LABFRESH we work from a technology-based vision and non-seasonal approach into building a collection that embraces longevity and essentials. Nobody needs as many clothes as the fashion industry is producing.

 Our story began almost 3 years ago on this platform when we launched the odour and stain repellent shirt.

                 We got 1,000% funded and immediately quit our jobs, so we could turn LABFRESH into a real business.

                 Launching new products is scary. It requires a lot of resources to get new technologies out of the lab and into a real supply chain.

                 That is why we would like to see if the Indiegogo community is interested in our new invention before we go into full-scale production.

                 Our mission hasn’t changed. We want to fight fast fashion and over-consumption by creating products engineered to last a lifetime.

                 Wear more. Wash less. Buy less.

Unlimited cancellation. You are able to cancel your order at any point in time and get a full refund (until the day the product is shipped).

90 days size guarantee. If your size is wrong we send you a new product in the right size, free of charge (we do not provide free return labels).

Free and easy shipping across the EU, US & Canada. Shipping costs to other parts of the world is only €15.

Stain repellency
                   We guarantee that our pants will repel stains that are caused by water-based fluids and semi-fluids. If stains are caused by oil-based fluids, such as skin oils or greasy food, the product will need to be washed or cleaned with stain remover.

We test the stain repellency for 30 washes at 30 degrees with ironing after each wash and no tumble-drying or bleaching. A lot depends on the type of machine, washing program, and detergent used, which is why we are not comfortable extending the guarantee above 30 washes for the stain repellency. Since the products need significantly less washing than a traditional cotton product 30 washes will give you a lot of wears.

Odour repellency
                     We guarantee that our pants will repel odour caused by bacteria, such as odour from sweat. Our shirts will not repel odour from cigarettes or cooking. Due to the many different variations and levels of perspiration, we, unfortunately, cannot guarantee a specific amount of days the products will last before odour starts being absorbed into the fabric. We know that our current customers wear it 3,5 days. But we guarantee that the anti-bacterial treatment will be active for at least 100 washes.

Lifespan technology
                  We guarantee that the stain repellency will last for 30 washes and the odour repellency for 100 washes.

Keep in mind that you have to wash LABFRESH pants less, so it’s a lot of wears.

Feel free to reach out to us by leaving a comment or writing us on hello@labfresh.eu.

story:
The Future of Your Files

Imagine a world where you no longer have to fight for control of your files.  A future where you are given the option to change your mind after you have sent a file.  A place where your online experience will not be dependent on the trust of others. 

Today it only takes one moment of indiscretion to create a lifetime of problems and we at EJS Technologies believe this should not be the case. We built DotGon with the idea that not everything should live forever on the internet and that people should have a choice to protect themselves.

Let us introduce you to DotGon

DotGon allows you to control files long after they have left your computing device.  DotGon takes a unique approach to the problem by allowing the file originator to exert their rights as the owner and place a set of constraints on the file consisting of number of views, view duration, and time window before sending it to an individual. Recipients are bound by these constraints and once the file has been terminated by views or time, it cannot be retrieved. All copies of the file are also invalid so forwarding has no detrimental effect.

Our Story

DotGon’s initial concept came to us after one of our team members took a vacation to a tropical beach and after returning, wanted to share his vacation pictures taken of him.  Being a professional and not wanting the photos of his pasty white sun screened chest to get posted to Facebook, he started fishing around for different ways to share his pictures without giving up control.  What he found was that there was no way to prevent his files from being distributed by anyone who had received them.  Thus the seed of DotGon was planted.

As we started talking with our friends, we realized that such a system was desired for not only pictures, but for documents, video, audio, long term storage, and many other uses.  It seemed that everyone we talked to had a new use for this software system.  The problem with having all of those features from the start is that we would never actually get around to releasing the software, so we had to limit it down to a core set of features, but we have the hooks in place to expand for the future.

The DotGon File

DotGon uses an AES 256 bit encryption algorithm to protect files.  The DotGon file is a self-contained file that can be sent via any regular file transfer protocol (email attachment, instant messenger file transfer, FTP, etc.).  The file itself will be easily identifiable with a .gon file extension.  When you double-click on a DotGon file, it will spawn the DotGon application.

The DotGon Application

The DotGon Application is where all of the heavy lifting is done.  From the DotGon application, you can choose to either build a new DotGon File or attempt to open one that someone sent to you.  In the future we will also have a console that will allow you to change permissions on the file after it has left your computer.  Please keep in mind that the demo in the video is for an early copy of the Alpha, and one of the first working versions.

            

Building a DotGon File

From inside the application there is a tab to build a DotGon file.  You have an area to select the file you want to protect.  From there you can select the constraints of your file through a series of simple drop down menus.

The production version will have the following protections:
1. The window in time that the file is available to be viewed
2. How many views are available for the file
3. The duration that someone can view the file

The production version will utilize the following file types:
jpg, gif, and txt

What we are here to do

1. Complete the Alpha and move into a Beta status
2. Start the Beta with enough users to weed out any issues
3. Take feedback from our Beta users and assess what the Beta users can’t live without
4. Finalize and launch the first consumer versions of DotGon

Breakdown of Deliverables

 

There are several moving parts here for deliverables, so here is the breakdown of when each item is going to be ready to go.

  • Swag – T-Shirts, Hats, and Water Bottles are going to be processed as soon as we have firm numbers as to how many we need to order.  Give some manufacturing time in there to get them done and then factor in boxing and shipping, and we are talking 6-10 weeks for those to be in your hands.
  • PC Beta – This is the item that we are the closest to at the moment.  We have a list of fixes and enhancements that need to be addressed before it is ready, but we are only talking about 2-3 months after the Indiegogo campaign ends before you will have a working Beta.  Everyone who contributes to this campaign is going to have access to the Beta and the time spent in Beta does not count toward your Production Version license time. 
  • PC Production Version – We are planning an 8-10 week Beta testing phase before we have a good idea of what the final version needs.  Based on those requirements, we will probably take another 2-3 months to finalize those changes before Version 1.x is ready to go out the door.  We are planning on keeping the Beta alive until the Production Version 1.x is live.  There will be a hard cutover at that point, but we will give at least a week’s notice before we shut down the Beta.
  • Android Beta – This is a little harder to predict and is going to be based on many other factors, including staffing levels and how much help the PC version needs, but we are estimating that the Android Beta will be ready by no later than April 2013.  Hopefully, and with your generous support, we will be able to hire additional development people that can knock this out before the end of the year, but with current staffing levels we have to play conservative on the dates.
  • Android Production Version – The Android Beta is also going to run through an 8-10 week testing phase before we are able to really commit to a date for the Android Production Version 1.x, but it should be similar to the PC version with a 2-3 month lag.  We will be keeping you posted on these developments as they are decided.
  • Future Features Vote - The DotGon team has many ideas for new features that we eventually want to roll into the main DotGot system.  People who pledge into being able to vote are going to set the course for the company by voting for what features are the most important to them.  You vote it, we build it.  It is as simple as that.
  • MMA Fights - While we would all like to see Brittany going head to head in the ring, the real situation is that we have no idea when she is going to fight again or where it may happen.  The best we can offer here is that Brittany comes with us to a fight featuring other fighters.  If Brittany does schedule a fight that is convenient for us, we will take as many people to that fight that we can, but no guarantees.
  • iPhone - The development of an iPhone version is going to take place after the PC and Android versions are released, scheduled for release sometime in 2013.  The iPhone version of DotGon is one of our stretch goals that you can make happen sooner with your generous support.
  • The Golden Inner Circle - The people who pledge into the Golden Inner Circle will have access to the DotGon team, to include any new swag that we come up with, first access to what we are working on and when it will be ready, your own full page write-up on the DotGon webpage telling everyone how much we love you and why you are such a cool person, among other exclusive benefits.
  • Shipping & Handling Charges - Please make certain that you add the correct amount for shipping and handling.  If you have not included shipping and handling, you will be dropped back to the previous tier.

Licenses

The DotGon system will be a yearly subscription service.  This is an effort to keep the prices down as low as we possibly can, to give many more people access to the application.  It always annoys us when we find that required safety components are extremely expensive, so we are going to fight back in our own way.  The timer for production copies will begin one month after the production versions for each product are released, or as soon as you register your copy, whichever is sooner.  Supporters from Indiegogo are getting cheaper prices than what we will be offering people who purchase the product later at retail.

The Future of DotGon

We have many ideas for where to take DotGon in the future.  We think that it is going to be very important to get this application on Mac's and iPhones to get as many of your friends as possible living up to the expectation of secure and limited file sharing.  All of these different systems will be able to use the same exact .gon file as everyone else.

Future builds will take the protect up a couple of notches with the introduction of choosing who can view a file.  We have plans for this that would allow you to select one person in the world that would be able to open a file, and then it wouldn't matter how many copies you send out or post to a community forum, only the one person assigned to receive the file will be able to view it.  The current build is a bit of a horse race where the first person gets the file.  Once we have this file assignment system in place, we will also allow you to assign a single file to multiple recipients, taking some of the repetitiveness out of sharing files.

As further enhancements to assigning files, we are also going to release with it a way to disable files that have already been sent as well as a stats page that will allow you to see if a recipient has viewed your file and for how many times.

Closing

It is not often that you get to be in on the ground floor of a truly disruptive technology.  DotGon has the ability to revolutionize the simple process of exchanging files.  With your help and support, we can turn the vision into a reality.

Thank you for your interest and generous donations.  Please help us spread the word.  Please like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter.

EJS Technologies

 

 

News Articles

Since starting to actively work on DotGon, we have been collecting articles that do a very good job of delineating the problem that we are solving. While these are not required reading, we hope that you may browse them and get an idea of what dangers lay out there for files that you have no control over.

USA Today – Private Photo Goes Viral on ‘Ellen’ Facebook Page

NBC News – RedTape Chronicles – That famous space shuttle photo: When is sharing stealing?

The New York Times – Nude Photo, and Altered Lives

Futurity – For Young Adults, ‘Sexting’ Just Part of Dating

AARP – Sexting Not Just For Kids

US News & World Report – ‘Sexting’ Common Among Teens

Jezebel – Sexting Suicides and the Dangers of Digital Abuse

Today Show - Her Teen Committed Suicide Over ‘Sexting’

Wired – Survey: One-Third of Youths Engage in Sexting

 

FAQ

Q: What is DotGon?

A: DotGon is a file control system that allows you to keep control of your files after they have left your computing device.

Q: Why is the application called DotGon?

A: It is called DotGon because of the file extension on the DotGon file, which is simply “.gon”.

Q: What platforms is DotGon currently on?

A: Currently we are working on a Windows PC version as well as an Android version.  If user response is high, we hope to make it compatible with all major platforms.  The app is designed to run on any Windows operating system that hasn’t been labeled as “extremely archaic” by the computing world (i.e. only Win 7, Vista, and XP).

Q: What files types are currently useable through DotGon?

A: .jpg, .gif, .txt (although there are some serious limitations on text files currently).

Q: I want to send my video/.doc file/Cad file/etc./etc. through DotGon.  What can I do?

A: Please be patient with us as we push the development team to build in all of the different file types and platforms that are feasible.  Apparently by law we have to give them bathroom breaks and let them go home at night.

Q: I was sent a .gon file.  Now what do I do?

A: You are going to need a copy of the application in order to view the file.  Once you open the file in the application, the rest is actually pretty easy.

Q: How much does DotGon cost?

A: We are not currently selling DotGon except for our campaign on Indiegogo.  When our campaign is successful, we hope to have DotGon ready for regular consumption within a few months after completing our beta testing.  Those wonderful individuals who support our Indiegogo campaign are going to be the first with consumer copies.

Q: I heard that DotGon is a yearly subscription.  What’s up with that?

A: DotGon is a server heavy application that we want to keep the price down on.  Your yearly subscription is keeping the servers on while at the same time funding heavy development activities designed to deliver you new document types, more platforms, and more user functionality, delivering them to you for no additional cost as soon as they are ready.  All of these things are ongoing expenses that your yearly subscription pays for.   

Q: I was sent a DotGon file and wasn’t able to open it/need to open it again/need to get the original file out/etc./etc.

A: The easiest way to get around this problem is to have the file originator send a new copy to you, since we don’t keep copies of files and value your privacy just as much as we value our own. Please don’t send us any DotGon files, we will not open any files for you or do you a favor.

Q: When is the DotGon application going to do _________?

A: We would love to hear your ideas about what you would like to see incorporated into DotGon.  Please email us and we will take a look at whatever suggestions you have.  We aren’t making any promises, but a good idea is a good idea.  Keep in mind that any idea that you send us will be owned by us and we will not be able to give anyone credit for what you send to us.

Q: My internet went down and now I can’t open my DotGon file.  What can I do?

A: Unfortunately, DotGon requires an active internet connection in order to get the latest information about the file.  Have you tried a coffee shop?

Q: How are the files stored?

A: Your files are stored in an encrypted format with a “.gon” extension.  You can then send your file via email, texting, flash drive, and IM.

Q: How do I know it is safe?

A: This is a tough question to answer.  The short answer is since we are using modern encryption methods, it is going to be very hard for someone to open your file.  The unfortunate part about encryption is that nothing is ever 100% safe.  We have worked DotGon files to the point that we feel that we are 99.999999% safe, but breaking encryption algorithms is only a matter of time and effort.  Given enough time and enough computing power, anything can be broken.  So is it breakable?  Short answer is yes.  But hopefully we have made it so difficult to do that it is not worth the time and effort to do so.

Q: So what is keeping me from taking a screenshot of it?

A: This is also a tough question.  The quick answer here is that screenshots, copy & paste, and screen capture applications will all be disabled in the viewer.  The viewer was built such that if you touch a key on the keyboard or click the mouse, the view window will collapse, ending the view.  What we cannot stop is further malicious captures of the screen with a second device.  Our prediction is that for normal use, the best most people will be able to do is to take picture of a view with a cell phone.  The activity of doing this may have copyright repercussions.  To make an analogy, the goal here is to lock the house, but you cannot prevent a professional thief from gaining access some other way, but will keep out most violators.  We have ideas in the pipeline to help alleviate this problem; we will let you know when they are ready to go.

Q: Is DotGon legal?

A: In the United States it is legal.  Outside of the United States, it greatly depends on the laws governing you.  Needless to say, if it is not legal for you to use DotGon, don’t use it.
story_txt:
The Future of Your Files
Imagine a world where you no longer have to fight for control of your files.  A future where you are given the option to change your mind after you have sent a file.  A place where your online experience will not be dependent on the trust of others. 
Today it only takes one moment of indiscretion to create a lifetime of problems and we at EJS Technologies believe this should not be the case. We built DotGon with the idea that not everything should live forever on the internet and that people should have a choice to protect themselves.

Let us introduce you to DotGon

DotGon allows you to control files long after they have left your computing device.  DotGon takes a unique approach to the problem by allowing the file originator to exert their rights as the owner and place a set of constraints on the file consisting of number of views, view duration, and time window before sending it to an individual. Recipients are bound by these constraints and once the file has been terminated by views or time, it cannot be retrieved. All copies of the file are also invalid so forwarding has no detrimental effect.
Our Story
DotGon’s initial concept came to us after one of our team members took a vacation to a tropical beach and after returning, wanted to share his vacation pictures taken of him.  Being a professional and not wanting the photos of his pasty white sun screened chest to get posted to Facebook, he started fishing around for different ways to share his pictures without giving up control.  What he found was that there was no way to prevent his files from being distributed by anyone who had received them.  Thus the seed of DotGon was planted.
As we started talking with our friends, we realized that such a system was desired for not only pictures, but for documents, video, audio, long term storage, and many other uses.  It seemed that everyone we talked to had a new use for this software system.  The problem with having all of those features from the start is that we would never actually get around to releasing the software, so we had to limit it down to a core set of features, but we have the hooks in place to expand for the future.
The DotGon File
DotGon uses an AES 256 bit encryption algorithm to protect files.  The DotGon file is a self-contained file that can be sent via any regular file transfer protocol (email attachment, instant messenger file transfer, FTP, etc.).  The file itself will be easily identifiable with a .gon file extension.  When you double-click on a DotGon file, it will spawn the DotGon application.
The DotGon Application
The DotGon Application is where all of the heavy lifting is done.  From the DotGon application, you can choose to either build a new DotGon File or attempt to open one that someone sent to you.  In the future we will also have a console that will allow you to change permissions on the file after it has left your computer.  Please keep in mind that the demo in the video is for an early copy of the Alpha, and one of the first working versions.
            
Building a DotGon File
From inside the application there is a tab to build a DotGon file.  You have an area to select the file you want to protect.  From there you can select the constraints of your file through a series of simple drop down menus.
The production version will have the following protections:1. The window in time that the file is available to be viewed2. How many views are available for the file3. The duration that someone can view the file
The production version will utilize the following file types:jpg, gif, and txt
What we are here to do
1. Complete the Alpha and move into a Beta status2. Start the Beta with enough users to weed out any issues3. Take feedback from our Beta users and assess what the Beta users can’t live without4. Finalize and launch the first consumer versions of DotGon
Breakdown of Deliverables
 
There are several moving parts here for deliverables, so here is the breakdown of when each item is going to be ready to go.


Swag – T-Shirts, Hats, and Water Bottles are going to be processed as soon as we have firm numbers as to how many we need to order.  Give some manufacturing time in there to get them done and then factor in boxing and shipping, and we are talking 6-10 weeks for those to be in your hands.

PC Beta – This is the item that we are the closest to at the moment.  We have a list of fixes and enhancements that need to be addressed before it is ready, but we are only talking about 2-3 months after the Indiegogo campaign ends before you will have a working Beta.  Everyone who contributes to this campaign is going to have access to the Beta and the time spent in Beta does not count toward your Production Version license time. 

PC Production Version – We are planning an 8-10 week Beta testing phase before we have a good idea of what the final version needs.  Based on those requirements, we will probably take another 2-3 months to finalize those changes before Version 1.x is ready to go out the door.  We are planning on keeping the Beta alive until the Production Version 1.x is live.  There will be a hard cutover at that point, but we will give at least a week’s notice before we shut down the Beta.

Android Beta – This is a little harder to predict and is going to be based on many other factors, including staffing levels and how much help the PC version needs, but we are estimating that the Android Beta will be ready by no later than April 2013.  Hopefully, and with your generous support, we will be able to hire additional development people that can knock this out before the end of the year, but with current staffing levels we have to play conservative on the dates.

Android Production Version – The Android Beta is also going to run through an 8-10 week testing phase before we are able to really commit to a date for the Android Production Version 1.x, but it should be similar to the PC version with a 2-3 month lag.  We will be keeping you posted on these developments as they are decided.

Future Features Vote - The DotGon team has many ideas for new features that we eventually want to roll into the main DotGot system.  People who pledge into being able to vote are going to set the course for the company by voting for what features are the most important to them.  You vote it, we build it.  It is as simple as that.

MMA Fights - While we would all like to see Brittany going head to head in the ring, the real situation is that we have no idea when she is going to fight again or where it may happen.  The best we can offer here is that Brittany comes with us to a fight featuring other fighters.  If Brittany does schedule a fight that is convenient for us, we will take as many people to that fight that we can, but no guarantees.

iPhone - The development of an iPhone version is going to take place after the PC and Android versions are released, scheduled for release sometime in 2013.  The iPhone version of DotGon is one of our stretch goals that you can make happen sooner with your generous support.

The Golden Inner Circle - The people who pledge into the Golden Inner Circle will have access to the DotGon team, to include any new swag that we come up with, first access to what we are working on and when it will be ready, your own full page write-up on the DotGon webpage telling everyone how much we love you and why you are such a cool person, among other exclusive benefits.

Shipping & Handling Charges - Please make certain that you add the correct amount for shipping and handling.  If you have not included shipping and handling, you will be dropped back to the previous tier.
Licenses
The DotGon system will be a yearly subscription service.  This is an effort to keep the prices down as low as we possibly can, to give many more people access to the application.  It always annoys us when we find that required safety components are extremely expensive, so we are going to fight back in our own way.  The timer for production copies will begin one month after the production versions for each product are released, or as soon as you register your copy, whichever is sooner.  Supporters from Indiegogo are getting cheaper prices than what we will be offering people who purchase the product later at retail.
The Future of DotGon
We have many ideas for where to take DotGon in the future.  We think that it is going to be very important to get this application on Mac's and iPhones to get as many of your friends as possible living up to the expectation of secure and limited file sharing.  All of these different systems will be able to use the same exact .gon file as everyone else.
Future builds will take the protect up a couple of notches with the introduction of choosing who can view a file.  We have plans for this that would allow you to select one person in the world that would be able to open a file, and then it wouldn't matter how many copies you send out or post to a community forum, only the one person assigned to receive the file will be able to view it.  The current build is a bit of a horse race where the first person gets the file.  Once we have this file assignment system in place, we will also allow you to assign a single file to multiple recipients, taking some of the repetitiveness out of sharing files.
As further enhancements to assigning files, we are also going to release with it a way to disable files that have already been sent as well as a stats page that will allow you to see if a recipient has viewed your file and for how many times.
Closing
It is not often that you get to be in on the ground floor of a truly disruptive technology.  DotGon has the ability to revolutionize the simple process of exchanging files.  With your help and support, we can turn the vision into a reality.
Thank you for your interest and generous donations.  Please help us spread the word.  Please like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter.
EJS Technologies

story:
Wer sind wir?

Wir sind Claudia und Daphne – zwei beruftstätige Mütter. Gemeinsam haben wir KiBa – Sustainable Kids & Baby Clothing gegründet. 

KiBa ist ein Online Shop für hochwertige second hand Kinder- und Babykleidung. Das ist perfekt für alle Eltern mit wenig Zeit. Bei uns gibt’s modische und farblich passende Kleidung in 25-teiligen Sets.

Unser Ziel ist es, den Kauf von second hand Kinder- und Babykleidung einfach, günstig und nachhaltig zu gestalten. 

  • Einfach - weil man alles an Kinderkleidung mit einem 1-click-buy in einem Set erhält.
  • Günstig - weil man bei uns bis zu 80% gegenüber dem Neukauf sparen kann.
  • Nachhaltig - weil second hand Kleidung die Ressourcen unserer Erde schont.

Was macht KiBa besonders? 

Bei KiBa packen wir für Kinder im Alter von 0-6 Jahren die 25-teiligen KiBa-Sets. In einem Set bekommt man alles, was man grundlegend für eine Woche braucht (außer Kinderschuhe) praktisch und ganz unkompliziert in einer Box. Jedes KiBa-Set wird von unserer Designerin liebevoll gestaltet und ist ein Unikat – Überraschung inklusive. 

Damit wir unseren Kunden, qualitativ hochwertige Produkte garantieren können, prüfen wir die von uns eingekaufte second hand Kleidung, bessern sie gegebenenfalls aus und reinigen sie. Im Rahmen der Reinigung der second hand Kinder- und Babykleidung verwenden wir unser hauseigenes und hautverträgliches KiBa-Waschmittel, das keine chemischen Zusatzstoffe beinhaltet. Damit können sich unsere Kunden sicher sein, dass sie ein nachhaltiges, sauberes und schadstoffarmes Produkt für ihre Kinder erwerben.

Was macht KiBa nachhaltig?

Mit dem Konzept von KiBa möchten wir ganzheitlich nachhaltig handeln, weswegen wir auf die drei Säulen der Nachhaltigkeit bauen: ökologisch, ökonomisch, sozial nachhaltig.

  • Ökologisch: weil wir bereits verwendete Ressourcen weiter nutzen und damit einen Schritt weg von der Wegwerfgesellschaft gehen. Auch die von uns aussortierte B-Ware wird weiterverwendet, indem sie für einen guten Zweck gespendet wird. Außerdem verwendet wir nur Strom aus erneuerbaren Energien und versenden unsere KiBa-Sets mit DHL GoGreen.
  • Ökonomisch: weil wir mit unseren second hand KiBa-Sets günstigere Preise anbieten können als beim Neukauf der Baby- und Kinderkleidung. 
  • Sozial: weil wir nicht nur für den guten Zweck unsere B-Ware weitergeben, sondern langfristig planen, auf dem Arbeitsmarkt benachteiligte Menschen einzustellen und ihnen damit eine neue Chance zu geben.

Vielleicht fragst Du Dich, warum wir als Logo einen Einsiedlerkrebs gewählt haben? Der Einsiedlerkrebs stellt ein gutes Beispiel für ökologisch nachhaltiges Handeln dar. 

Er sucht sich im Laufe seines Lebens und Wachstums immer wieder neue und größere verlassene Schneckenhäuser. Damit verwendet er die bereits existierenden Ressourcen weiter und gibt den nachfolgenden Generationen die Möglichkeit, sie ebenfalls zu nutzen.

Seit wann gibt es KiBa? Wie kam es dazu?

KiBa wurde im Dezember 2011 gegründet. Zu dem Zeitpunkt waren wir beide schwanger. Daphne mit dem ersten Kind, Claudia bereits mit dem Dritten. Da Claudia viel erfahrener war, was das Thema Kinderkleidung etc. anging, tauschten wir uns darüber aus, was man für das erste Kind benötigt. Im Rahmen dieses Gespräches kamen wir darauf, dass es auf dem Markt zwar Erstlingsausstattungen gibt, aber keine praktischen Folgeausstattungen. Zudem sind wir beide berufstätig und haben wenig Zeit, ausgiebig shoppen zu gehen. Und da dachten wir uns, es wäre doch klasse, wenn man ganz einfach und zeitsparend an modische Kinderkleidung käme. Außerdem beginnt man sich als Eltern Gedanken über das Thema generationenübergreifende Nachhaltigkeit zu machen. Also haben wir die modischen second hand KiBa-Sets entwickelt. 

Wofür benötigt KiBa Deine Unterstützung?

In den letzten 1,5 Jahren ist es uns gelungen, den KiBa-Online-Shop und unsere Produktion aufzubauen. Bis heute haben wir schon viele begeisterte Kunden gewonnen! Jetzt ist es an der Zeit, das KiBa-Konzept weiter bekannt zu machen. Daher möchten wir das Funding für Marketingzwecke und zur Verbesserung unserer Website nutzen.  

Im Bereich Marketing möchten wir eine gezieltere Zielgruppenansprache realisieren und unterschiedliche Marketing-Campagnen aufsetzten sowie unser Social-Media-Marketing ausbauen. Darüber hinaus ist es notwendig, unsere Website übersichtlicher und nutzerfreundlicher zu gestalten. 

Wie kannst Du KiBa außerdem unterstützen?

Du kannst KiBa außerdem unterstützen, in dem Du ...

  • ... diese Campagne an all Deine Freunde und Bekannte weiterleitest. Bitte nutze dabei die Indiegogo share tools (FB; …)!
  • ... uns auf Facebook likest und unseren Facebooklink mit Deinen Freunden und Bekannten teilst: www.facebook.com/KiBaSustainableKidsAndBabyClothing
  • ... uns Deine Fragen oder Anregungen an info@kiba-berlin.de schickst. Wir freuen uns auf Deine Rückmeldung!

macht KiBa nachhaltig?
Mit dem Konzept
von KiBa möchten wir ganzheitlich nachhaltig handeln, weswegen wir
auf die drei Säulen der Nachhaltigkeit bauen: ökologisch, ökonomisch, sozial
nachhaltig.



Ökologisch: weil wir bereits verwendete Ressourcen weiter nutzen und damit einen
Schritt weg von der Wegwerfgesellschaft gehen. Auch die von uns aussortierte
B-Ware wird weiterverwendet, indem sie für einen guten Zweck
gespendet wird. Außerdem verwendet wir nur Strom aus erneuerbaren Energien
und versenden unsere KiBa-Sets mit DHL GoGreen.


Ökonomisch: weil wir mit unseren second hand KiBa-Sets günstigere Preise
anbieten können als beim Neukauf der Baby- und Kinderkleidung. 


Sozial: weil wir nicht nur für den guten Zweck unsere B-Ware weitergeben,
sondern langfristig planen, auf dem Arbeitsmarkt benachteiligte Menschen
einzustellen und ihnen damit eine neue Chance zu geben.


Vielleicht fragst Du Dich, warum wir als Logo einen Einsiedlerkrebs gewählt haben? Der Einsiedlerkrebs stellt ein gutes Beispiel für ökologisch nachhaltiges Handeln dar. 



Er sucht sich im Laufe seines Lebens und Wachstums immer wieder neue und größere verlassene Schneckenhäuser. Damit verwendet er die bereits existierenden Ressourcen weiter und gibt den nachfolgenden Generationen die Möglichkeit, sie ebenfalls zu nutzen.
Seit
wann gibt es KiBa? Wie kam es dazu?
KiBa wurde im Dezember 2011
gegründet. Zu dem Zeitpunkt waren wir beide schwanger. Daphne mit dem ersten
Kind, Claudia bereits mit dem Dritten. Da Claudia viel erfahrener
war, was das Thema Kinderkleidung etc. anging, tauschten wir uns darüber aus,
was man für das erste Kind benötigt. Im Rahmen dieses Gespräches kamen wir
darauf, dass es auf dem Markt zwar Erstlingsausstattungen gibt, aber keine
praktischen Folgeausstattungen. Zudem sind wir beide berufstätig und haben
wenig Zeit, ausgiebig shoppen zu gehen. Und da dachten wir uns, es wäre doch
klasse, wenn man ganz einfach und zeitsparend an modische Kinderkleidung käme.
Außerdem beginnt man sich als Eltern Gedanken über das Thema
generationenübergreifende Nachhaltigkeit zu machen. Also haben wir die
modischen second hand KiBa-Sets entwickelt. 
Wofür
benötigt KiBa Deine Unterstützung?
In den letzten 1,5 Jahren ist es uns
gelungen, den KiBa-Online-Shop und unsere Produktion aufzubauen. Bis heute
haben wir schon viele begeisterte Kunden gewonnen! Jetzt ist es an der Zeit,
das KiBa-Konzept weiter bekannt zu machen. Daher möchten wir das
Funding für Marketingzwecke und zur Verbesserung unserer Website nutzen.  
Im Bereich Marketing möchten wir
eine gezieltere Zielgruppenansprache realisieren und unterschiedliche
Marketing-Campagnen aufsetzten sowie unser Social-Media-Marketing ausbauen.
Darüber hinaus ist es notwendig, unsere Website übersichtlicher und
nutzerfreundlicher zu gestalten. 
Wie kannst Du KiBa außerdem unterstützen?

Du kannst KiBa außerdem unterstützen, in
dem Du ...


... diese Campagne an all Deine Freunde und Bekannte
weiterleitest. Bitte nutze dabei die Indiegogo share tools (FB; …)!

... uns auf Facebook likest und unseren Facebooklink mit Deinen
Freunden und Bekannten teilst: www.facebook.com/KiBaSustainableKidsAndBabyClothing

... uns Deine Fragen oder Anregungen an info@kiba-berlin.de schickst. Wir freuen
uns auf Deine Rückmeldung!

story:
Our Story

We are a start-up company offering logo wear that will not only help women feel good while wearing it, but every purchase at our e-commerce site (when it goes live on May 1) will raise money for a variety of causes that support women and girls worldwide.

Brazilian Sexy celebrates the fearless spirit – those who at least once in their life have been brave enough to get a Brazilian wax or is currently receiving regular Brazilian waxes.

We Are Asking For Your Help to Get Us To Vegas Trade Show

We need your help launching our new Brazilian Sexy logo wear at the IECSC spa show in Las Vegas in June.

Why do we want to be exhibitors at this spa show?

Because this International Esthetics, Cosmetics & Spa Conference (IECSC) in Las Vegas draws the most attendees - spa/salon owners and independents - than any other in 2014.  The show dates are June 21-23, 2014.

Your contributions to our Get Us To Vegas Trade Show fundraising campaign will pay for our exhibition at the IECSC trade show to help us make our first-ever offering of our Brazilian Sexy logo wear to spa & salon professionals.


Brazilian Sexy Kimono Waffle Spa Robe

I Am Brazilian Sexy Spa Wrap


How We Will Use Your Contributions

Your contributions will help us with the following costs to attend the IECSC trade show:

  • Ordering inventory of Brazilian Sexy spa robes and aprons to display at our booth
  • Printing for booth signage and brochures
  • Shipping to deliver everything to the Las Vegas Convention Center
  • Booth rental fees
  • Transporation and lodging
We need your help to get us to Las Vegas so we can get the Brazilian Sexy show on the road!

[Note: Many costs other exhibitors will pay for graphics design to create brochures and signage are avoided due to Desiree's talents with graphics design.  When our e-commerce site goes live on May 1, it will be due to the sweat equity Desiree has invested in that project over the past 16 months.  Desiree designed the Brazilian Sexy logo, which is a registered trademark.]


Brazilian Sexy Burnout Racerback Tank Top

How Brazilian Sexy Came To Be

The Brazilian Sexy idea was born on the day Sandy exclaimed "Now you're Brazilian Sexy!" to one of her Brazilian wax clients after their Brazilian wax.

Immediately Sandy liked the catchy phrase that tumbled out of her mouth and thought of how the Brazilian Sexy idea could help women feel sexy and confident just as Brazilian waxes do. As the Brazilian Sexy idea grew in her mind, she envisioned i am brazilian sexy embroidered across the front of spa aprons that could be worn by Brazilian wax specialists and and t-shirts sporting the Brazilian Sexy logo they could sell to their wax clients.  Soon she called Desiree and said, “Hey, I have this great idea for an new brand of logo wear, would you like to partner with me?”

And so our partnership began and we went to work designing the brand's logo, testing its printing and embroidery on various fabrics and developing relationships with our vendors to create finished pieces of our Brazilian Sexy logo wear.  Almost nightly, after coming home from our day jobs, we worked on the registration of our Brazilian Sexy trademark and an e-commerce site to sell our logo wear.  www.iambraziliansexy.com will sell directly to spas, salons and independents that offer Brazilian waxing to their clients.

As we spent the last two years forming our tiny company, we realized our interest in boosting women's self esteem with our fun and sassy logo wear wasn't enough. We have always wanted the ability to support more women's causes but our financial resources are limited with just the two of us.

Brazilian Sexy: Philanthropy Over Profits

As a woman-owned business we decided the focus of our company would be one of philanthropy over profits, by donating 10% of our profits to women's causes. Not only will women feel good wearing Brazilian Sexy logo wear but they will feel good knowing some of the money from their purchases will automatically go to some of the best causes supporting women and girls on the planet. Imagine: In one action, each customer's money would do far more in combination with other Brazilian Sexy customers than they could do alone!

The initial list of causes we will support will be listed on our e-commerce site when it goes live on May 1, 2014.  As our company grows, so too will the list of women's charities we will support. This philanthropic focus will be the integral part of our business model as long as Brazilian Sexy is in business.

With some of our profits going to organizations that help deliver women and girls from oppression we hope to play a small part in uplifting them so that they are not merely surviving but thriving.

Our Mission: The Brazilian Sexy brand will perpetually support the causes that help women feel better and live happier lives while at the same time helping our customers feel bold and confident in our logo wear. It's a win-win for everyone! 



Brazilian Sexy V-Neck White Tee

How You Will Be Rewarded

We will reward you with a Brazilian Sexy apparel based on your contribution and/or your name listed on our Indiegogo Heroes web page when our site goes live on May 1, 2014. You can wear it or give it away!

Limited Availability: A Unique Opportunity

For now, Brazilian Sexy logo wear will only be available in spas and salons, and by independents that partner with us. Selling Brazilian Sexy spa robes, tees, headbands and slippers, will provide an easy added revenue stream for the spa and the customer will know that their purchase is a limited edition that cannot be found anywhere else.

This limited availability means that when you receive a Brazilian Sexy item based on your contribution here today you will be one of the first customers to own our logo wear!  You will stand in the front line of our campaign, wearing an exclusive product that not even spas will be selling until they buy from us at our booth at the IECSC show in June.

Brazilian Sexy Ball Cap - White

Our Offer To Those in the Spa Industry

Spa/salon owners and independents who support us with a contribution of  $10 or more will get listed on our website of Partner Spas - Salons - Independents.  We will pin your spa location to our online map and provide your location and contact information to our site visitors, women and girls who will want to know where to buy our Brazilian Sexy logo wear, and may also be searching for a Brazilian Wax Specialist. This is excellent advertising for you at minimal cost. In addition, if you are attending the IECSC show in Las Vegas please come by our booth to meet us and pick up your  free Brazilian Sexy spa apron (while supplies last, and they are sure to go quickly!)

The Impact Brazilian Sexy Will Make

Over the years Brazilian Sexy will not only uplift women through our fun logo wear, but remember: every purchase will drop money into the coffers of women's charities.

Our long-term goal is to create a foundation that will funnel money, talent and other resources to women's charities. Not just for women, socially conscious men can contribute too in our efforts to improve the lives of women and girls everywhere.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to our Get Us To Vegas Trade Show campaign, you can help us in the following ways:

  • Send us the business names and website addresses of spas & salons in your area that offer Brazilian waxing services.  This will help us build a database of customers we can contact when our website goes live on May 1.  You can do this by sending us an email at contact us@iambraziliansexy.com.
  • When you visit spas or salons, please tell them about us and give them our website address so they can begin offering Brazilian Sexy logo wear to their clients.  Tell them you want to buy, but you can't until they sell!
  • Tell everyone you know about our Indiegogo campaign!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!  Share our campaign on your Facebook page, Tweet about us and make some noise!

Our Timeline

March 22 – April 30 | Indiegogo Get Us To Vegas Campaign Runs 

May 1 | www.IAmBrazilianSexy.com website is launched.

May 15 – May 20 | Order all items from our wholesale suppliers. 

May 20 – May 25 | Robes are embroidered | all other items screen printed. 

May 25 – May 31 | Ship all Indiegogo orders to our contributors!

June 1 – June 15 | Prepare for spa trade show in Las Vegas

 June 16 | Ship everything to Las Vegas Convention Center 

June 21- 23 | Launch Brazilian Sexy brand at spa trade show!!

A Word Of Gratitude

Thank you for believing in our mission and helping us take the first step toward building the foundation of our business that will perpetually support women's causes while at the same time offer a fun and sassy brand that women will love!

How We Have Prepared For This Funding Campaign

We have all of the suppliers, vendors and printers lined up for fulfilling Indiegogo orders, with back-up shops available if heightened demand requires it.

The combination of talents in our respective fields - Brazilian waxing, entrepreneurship and over 20 years of advertising and marketing experience for Sandy, and over 15 years of Information Technology, web design and entrepreneurship experience for Desiree - provides the experience we need to make Brazilian Sexy a successful brand. But it is our passion for helping women around the globe that drives us!

After spending two years on this effort, we are excited and ready to see our vision become a reality!

Who Is Brazilian Sexy?

Sandy and Desiree have been best friends for over 25 years and became business partners in 2012 creating Brazilian Sexy, LLC to give birth to Sandy's idea.

Desiree is an IT professional in Denver, CO, with 15 years experience and a former owner of a web design firm for nearly 10 years. Since closing her web design company, she has been working in a myriad of IT positions for various corporations as she does today while developing the e-commerce site that will make Brazilian Sexy a strong and viable business.

Sandy is an esthetician in Pensacola, FL and former owner of a successful day spa in Mississippi which she sold in 2013. She is a Brazilian wax specialist and brings years of industry experience to the Brazilian Sexy concept that she dreamed up in a moment of true inspiration. Together, their skill sets and experience make their business partnership an excellent collaboration.
