Activate multiple devices with one clickRoutines (as Yonomi* calls them) or scenes (as Samsung SmartThings* refers to them) allow a user to initiate multiple commands at once.  For example, a Leave Home routine might include the following:
Close the garage
Lock the front door
Arm the security system
Turn off all smart lights
Set the thermostat to an away temp
Once a routine is programmed in the Yonomi app or in the SmartThings app, OmniFob can initiate it with one simple click.  The possibilities are virtually endless... Wake Up, Go To Sleep, Leave Home, Coming Home are just a few of the most common routines which you can personalize to suit your needs.* see COMPATIBILITY section below to learn exactly what devices OmniFob can control out of the gate. 
OmniFob™ (patent pending) is a tiny shortcut remote that triggers the apps you use to control your smart devices, scenes, routines, and even your cars. It's like having multiple smart buttons in one tiny remote. Currently OmniFob can control over 100 devices and scenes. But since OmniFob only has two buttons, how fast is it to access all your devices if you have to scroll through the menu each time? The answer is… Quick Controls :)   
With Quick Controls, you don’t have to look at your OmniFob to activate it. You can simply perform a double-click, long press, quad-click, or shake & click to trigger your most frequently functions. Quick Controls combined with a scene or routine allows you to trigger smart actions quickly without digging your phone out of your pocket or purse, unlocking it, selecting an app, opening it, and then selecting the function you wish to initiate. Quick Controls are completely customizable in the Keyport app so you can assign your most frequently used actions to the Quick Control option of your choice. Currently we are building five standard Quick Controls in addition to a panic trigger for personal security (more on that below).
Here are a few examples of Quick Controls you can program yourself in the app.



Without question, auto lock/unlock is the most requested function, and we have heard you loud and clear! Over the past several years, we have researched, examined, outlined, prototyped, and tested dozens of options, and we are excited to introduce you to our first partners in the auto space.
While still early in the development, we are working with two of what we hope will be several aftermarket connected car applications to bring you remote start and lock/unlock solutions.

Turn your old car or new car into a connected car with functions like remote start, lock/unlock, etc. that can be controlled by both OmniFob and your phone
Control multiple vehicles with a single fob (so long as an OmniFob compatible* aftermarket system is installed in each vehicle)

It is true that these first solutions require the purchase and installation of a compatible* smart** aftermarket system, but the benefits are significant.
* By compatible, we mean an aftermarket system that we have permission to connect to and that we have worked together with the system's developer to integrate.
** By smart, we mean one that can be controlled by an app on your phone. 



Our first partner in this space is an exciting early stage company which is doing very cool things in the car sharing space.  They have been testing their original system all over the World this past year and have recently launched the newest version of their smart auto start / keyless entry system called MoboKey.
Once the system is installed in your vehicle, OmniFob will be able to control the various MoboKey functions depending upon which version you have.
MoboKey comes in three versions:

 MoboKey Basic - Basic keyless entry LOCK/UNLOCK @ $70 + shipping. DIY installation.
 MoboKey Plus - Advanced keyless entry LOCK/UNLOCK @ $90 + shipping. DIY installation.
 MoboKey Pro - Keyless entry LOCK/UNLOCK plus remote start and car sharing @ $150 + shipping. Requires professional installation.

For more information on each of the above, please visit mobokey.com, or contact them directly at (713) 701-5748.
We will be sending out an EXCLUSIVE discount courtesy of MoboKey to all of our backers at the conclusion of our campaign.

We are also working with Blue Eclipse, a startup founded by a pioneer in the connected car space who helped develop the first commercially available connected car app at Delphi Automotive. BluRemote by Blue Eclipse (due out in early 2020) offers connected control of OEM and aftermarket remote functions for any car, garage door, or home security alarm without the need for professional installation. DIY installation is simple and requires only a few minutes to configure. For a car, you simply place your remote in a small box, place the box securely in the vehicle (can be hidden or locked down), and you will have access to all of the fob's functions through both OmniFob and the BluRemote app.
Here is a little video sample of this exciting device.

 
This is Only the Beginning...
These are just the first two of what we hope will be several compatible aftermarket systems. If you have one of them already - like Viper SmartStart, Compustar DroneMobile, Completely Keyless, Voyo, etc. - contact them through their website and on social to let them know that you want it to work with OmniFob. The more they hear from you, the greater chance we have of moving up their priority list.
From there, we hope that integration with OEMs will not be far behind.
 

Having a device separate from the phone that doesn't attract as much attention is a valuable thing when it comes to personal security. In the case of an assault for example, the assailant's first order of business will be to get your phone away from you so that you cannot contact anyone. Having access to a panic button that is separate and that can trigger an event on your phone like texting or calling emergency services, a friend, or family, or even all of them can be critical at such a time. 
Several single function panic buttons are already popular on college campuses, for exercising by yourself, for late night walks, and for jobs that can take you to out-of-the way locations and in contact with strangers like a real estate agent.  OmniFob combines it with a range of other functionality so that you don't have to carry multiple devices.

OmniFob pairs to both the Keyport app and the Chipolo app (for locator specific functionality) on your smartphone. Once set up, the commands you issue by selecting the function and then clicking the button on your OmniFob will be sent via Bluetooth to the requisite app which will then initiate your request. For example, to open your garage door, you select the Garage Door - Open/Close function with the Mode button on the side and then click the Select button which initiates the command. The Keyport app receives the command via Bluetooth, determines which function to call, and then initiates the action via API through the cloud.

 Setting up your OmniFob is simple. After pairing OmniFob with the Keyport app on your phone, just click Add Device and all the compatible devices you have already set up appear as available devices.  Just tap it and name it, and it will be available almost instantly on your OmniFob.
Add, remove, and modify your configuration in the app at any time.
You can even share device functionality with other OmniFob users in your household or office.

Out of the gate, OmniFob will be compatible with a wide range of devices through Samsung SmartThings and Yonomi, which includes most items that are compatible with the Wink hub, as well as a handful of direct connections to great partners like Chipolo, MoboKey, and Nexx Garage (Amazon's most popular Smart Garage Door Opener).
 
 


 

Alongside smart home, connected car, and personal security, OmniFob has incorporated a built-in Bluetooth locator powered by Chipolo so you can find your OmniFob from your phone... or find your phone from your OmniFob.
And it too works with Siri, Google Assistant, and Alexa. 

Find OmniFob with Siri, Alexa, or Google Assistant
After testing several Bluetooth trackers, we were convinced that the team at Chipolo not only knew exactly what they were doing, but they are just awesome to work with. Based in Europe with an outpost in NYC, the Chipolo team has developed several award-winning locators including the Chipolo Classic, Chipolo Plus, and the Chipolo Card.
We will be sending out a discount code courtesy of Chipolo to all of our backers at the conclusion of our campaign.


Trying to take the perfect selfie is not exactly the suavest of moves. Now you can use OmniFob as a remote camera trigger so that you can do it without looking like a tourist.


A tiny keychain flashlight is always a useful everyday carry item.  To give you one that doesn't take up any additional space, we added a mini-flashlight for shining a little light when you need it most.
MULTIPLE CARRY OPTIONS
While IoT is gaining ground, the vast majority of us still carry some form of a keychain. Keys are not going away anytime soon, and our key rings are chock-full of other everyday carry items as well - pocket tools (e.g. mini-flashlight, bottle opener, pocketknife), auto and access fobs, security tokens, contactless payment options, loyalty cards, etc. At Keyport, our mission is to add some organization to the chaos and to transform your keychain from an unwieldy collection of physical items into a fully customizable, modern day, connected multi-tool for the modern lifestyle.

OmniFob has multiple carry options besides clipping it to your pocket or bag,
A part of the Keyport modular everyday carry system, OmniFob is compatible with the Keyport's Anywhere Pocket Clip™ (comes standard and can connect to virtually any keychain), the Keyport Pivot™, and the Keyport Slide™.

Before we go into specifics, here are a few general things about OmniFob's security:

No biometrics
No direct device connections
No private data stored on the device
No history stored on the device
No unencrypted transfer of data

OmniFob does not connect directly to your devices. It simply connects to the Keyport app on your smartphone via Bluetooth and acts as a shortcut to your smart apps. It’s that simple. All the work is done app to app, by your smartphone, just as if you are controlling your devices directly from your smartphone. When you press a button to activate a device, scene, or routine on the OmniFob, it sends a signal via Bluetooth to the Keyport App on your phone. Our app sends the command to the 3rd party app, which then triggers the action and... voila. 

In the Keyport App, you connect to a compatible 3rd party app via Oauth2 validation. Once your account is linked, the devices, scenes, and routine names you have programmed in the 3rd party app automatically populate in the Keyport app. The only information written to your OmniFob is the custom names you select for each device, scene, and routine.
What if I lose it? There is no need to worry about security if you ever lose your OmniFob. It is designed to be a shortcut to your smart phone via Bluetooth. Therefore, OmniFob will not work if it is out of Bluetooth range of your phone and the Keyport app to which it is paired. So, a potential thief would literally have to get a hold of it and be within your smart phone’s Bluetooth bubble (approximately 60 feet) for it to re-pair with your phone.
But we have a simple solution for that too. Just unpair it in the Keyport app and all your devices will be inoperable even if the thief finds his way back into your Bluetooth bubble.
In comes Chipolo - And lost doesn't mean forever with OmniFob... You will still be able to track it down via our locator powered by Chipolo and its crowd mesh network which shows its last known location. You can check it right on Chipolo's app.
But, let’s say you totally lost it and un-paired it from the Keyport app as described above. Guess what? It is still connected to Chipolo so you can mark your OmniFob as lost in the Chipolo app and you will have a chance at finding it again using their Community Search feature. When you get it back you can easily re-pair it with the Keyport app.
Anonymity - Imagine, you leave your keys somewhere and someone finds them. That person now has access to your car, house, office, and any other keys you have on there. But, unless you have your address on your keys, they are anonymous, right? Most likely, that person is just going to be a good samaritan and turn them into the lost and found. The slim chance that person would become a potential thief is eliminated with OmniFob, because when you un-pair it from the app as described above, it becomes useless.
Testing Before Launch - In addition to the initiatives we have undertaken during design, we are already putting OmniFobs in the hands of our partners, beta testers, and white hat hackers (some of our security professional friends from DEFCON) to identify any potential issues. We will continue to study best practices and develop a community which helps us to discover and then patch any potential vulnerabilities as quickly and efficiently as possible.


Even without any smart home products, OmniFob provides quite a bit of value. Here is what you get when reserving an OmniFob reward:

OmniFob™ All-in-One Smart Remote Module with built-in mini-flashlight, Chipolo locator, and remote camera trigger
Compatible with Samsung SmartThings Ecosystem*, Yonomi Ecosystem*, Chipolo, MoboKey, and Nexx Garage
Anywhere Pocket Clip™ by Keyport
FREE 2-year access to our Premium Connectivity Package - While not finalized yet, when we launch after Kickstarter, we anticipate a two or three tiered pricing approach which will depend upon the number of connections. You will receive the maximum number of connections at no additional cost for two years from Keyport.

*Includes top smart home brands including August, Wink, Philips Hue, WEMO, LIFX, Yale, GE, Sengled, Cree, Ecobee, IKEA, Leviton, Kasa, Schlage, Kwikset, and more.
We have added significant discounts to ALL reward levels, so everyone gets a meaningful break for their support.

 
As we have done for all three of our campaigns before, we are going to use BackerKit to administrate the fulfillment process after the campaign. Once we migrate to BackerKit, we will send out a survey that will help us to review and break down your pledge into the specific rewards you ordered along with their associated costs. This will help us to easily reconcile any outstanding balances from add-ons or additional shipping.
BackerKit will also allow the opportunity for additional purchases, but please keep in mind that OmniFob will offer the best reduced price options.


 


 July 17 - Launch Kickstarter  
 August 16 - Complete Kickstarter
 August - iOS app beta testing
 February '20 - Complete initial pilot run of 50 units, Android app development
 May '20 - Place final hardware production order after FCC testing approval
 Late July '20 - Test and package production units, start shipping to Kickstarter backers 
 Mid August '20 - Complete production shipping for Kickstarter backers
 Late August '20 - Complete production shipping for Indiegogo backers

Updated May 15th, 2020

Your support has a direct impact on OmniFob by helping us to:

secure the funds needed to launch OmniFob sooner than we would be able to otherwise
solicit your input to ensure that we are building a product you will love and use every day
prioritize future development initiatives with your guidance

In return for your support:

Backers receive OmniFob before anyone else
some of you will have the chance to be beta testers and put OmniFob through its paces on behalf of your fellow Backers
you get a substantial discount (15% to 25%) off of our estimated MSRP
you have direct input into OmniFob product development by providing us feedback (in the comments and emails) and by participating in surveys and polls
you have the opportunity to help build our Keyport and OmniFob communities and take a leadership role in the direction they take and the impact they make
you join our team and get a front row seat on what promises to be quite an adventure



We NEED your help to spread the word about OmniFob by clicking on the icons - Facebook, Twitter, and campaign link at the top right of the page under the total raised thus far.
Use the hashtags: #OmniFob, #OneFobToRuleThemAll, #ControlYourEverything
Kickbooster
 
To give you a little added incentive to share OmniFob, we have setup Kickbooster, which pays you a 10% referral fee for any referrals who back our project. In our last campaign, we actually have a few whose referrals more than covered their reward, and they ended up with money in their pocket!
 

 
 
 

If you haven't already, please make sure to sign up for our OmniFob VIP email newsletter which includes the latest product news, releases, exclusive discounts (on compatible IoT devices as well as on Keyport products), and giveaways.
 

Thank you again for all of your support and enthusiasm.  OmniFob doesn't happen without you, and we are very grateful for having you on our team.
For more information or the latest Omnifob news, please visit https://omnifob.com or https://www.mykeyport.com.
If you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate to contact us at kickstart@omnifob.com.

story:
US and international patents-pending.

Have you ever pondered what it would be like to replace your old boring shirt buttons with cool new “fashion” buttons? Something that will really catch people’s eyes and set you apart?

Kind of like “cufflinks” for every button on your shirt… Intriguing, right? Or, perhaps you’re a practical person – and you simply want buttons that won’t EVER let you down! 

Buttons that never come loose. Never fall off (at the worst possible time, too). Never break from washing, drying, ironing, or dry cleaning. 

Well, get ready, because Auxilry are…

Interchangeable shirt buttons are currently available in either brass and polymer with high polish, painted, sprayed or oiled finishes.

The fasteners are made with medical grade high crystalline polymer, that can withstand some of the strongest chemicals and highest temperatures.

Lifetime Guarantee

If any part of your interchangeable shirt button should fail to function properly, or should you lose an interchangeable cap for any reason, I will  replace it for free (except shipping).

I’m so excited about my “garment improvement” technology, I’m affectionately calling it “BUTTON – 2.0” – an innovation set to make everyone look their best while looking at their wardrobes in a whole new way! 

With the Auxilry interchangeable button system, you “swap out” your existing shirt buttons with these amazing high-tech replacements. 

Because they’re “high tech” (precision engineered), there are only FIVE STEPS and there is absolutely…

Most people don’t know how – or else they won’t take the time – to sew on a new shirt button. Taking shirts to the tailor is expensive and time-consuming. People want simple, efficient solutions. So they go out and buy a new shirt! 

But that gets expensive. 

With Auxilry buttons, there will be NO MORE button frustration in the world. Button replacements are made of only the highest quality polymers and metals – strong enough to handle repeated washing, dry cleaning, pressing, and stressing. 

Simply change to the Auxilry interchangeable button system. Problem solved for as long as you own that shirt! 

Auxilry buttons allow people to get much more utility out of the clothes they already own. And no more buttons to repair! 

In a few seconds, it changes the entire look of the shirt! 

“CUSTOMIZE” Your Wardrobe Automatically, With One Fix!

My Invisa-Fit collar extender is adjustable and made with clear high quality soft to the skin silicone. 

Best of all, it works with Auxilry interchangeable shirt buttons and lets you match your shirt buttons as you please! 

So forget the old unsightly collar extender that you have to constantly take off and put back on, my Auxilrys Invisa-Fit collar extender is always on and never seen. Button up and go! 

Keep your shirt collars looking sharp! The Auxilry engraved mirror finish collar stays are 2.5cm in length for most standard collar sizes. 

Like the famous “Power Tie” of the 1990’s, you can have the first “Power Buttons”!

You’ll never settle for being seen in tired old “regular” shirt buttons. (We can all agree – they do nothing for you but hold your shirt together!)

Why not wear dynamic, interchangeable, attractive buttons that will set you apart?!?

You’ll dazzle your prospects and clients… your boss… your friends… your coworkers. Anyone who sees you on a regular basis. They’ll say there’s something special about you – even if they can’t quite put their finger on it.

Only your fingers will know the secret! 

The “magic” to impressing people is in the subtle details of your style and accessories.

Customized buttons. Now if that isn’t subtle style detail staring everyone right in the face, I don’t know what is!

Auxilry interchangeable buttons go far beyond mere “accessorizing” – the obvious thing everybody already does.  Auxilry buttons, rather, are your subtle, barely-prominent way of standing out without shouting out. 

In today’s competitive world, the person who stands out for being DIFFERENT and BETTER than their competition is the one who gets chosen to be the WINNER.

If you live in that world – in business or socially – you know how important it is to have that “edge” I’ve mentioned. You can feel it.

Well, your “signature look” is what they will remember – long after everyone else’s expensive cologne or perfume has worn off.  

And, you’ll have a secret edge -- because no one even knows about this yet!

I firmly believe Auxilry buttons are the clothing-improvement solution shirt wearers around the world are HUNGRY for.

They’re simple. Unique. Elegant. And oh so practical.

Your investment today will last a lifetime. 

And yet, it pays off right away. 

Not only does the Auxilry interchangeable button system greatly expand the versatility of your current wardrobe (a profit right off the bat!), it achieves things money alone can’t buy. 

If you want to look cool and hip, simply match your buttons to the occasion – an instant success! Special occasion? 

No need to rush out and buy something new! (Who can do that every day?) 

Or perhaps you need to look subdued and business-like. I have the ideal buttons just for work. 

So now you can wear the same shirt, but make it fit the occasion! 

Rather than buy more shirts, the Auxilry interchangeable buttons let you turn every shirt in your closet into a “double duty” or “triple duty” shirt!

This alone will save you hundreds of dollars a year – maybe more. 

And still you’ll look like a million bucks!

Your “fashion score” with peers – men and women alike – will go through the roof. You’ll know you barely even tried! After all, what’s easier than changing your shirt buttons?!?

Everyone will also wonder how you afford to have such a new, different look so often! (It’s up to you if you want to tell them your new secret!)

Your pre-order means the world to me.

Only with your help today will I be able to get the injection molds needed for manufacturing. 

All the specs have been finalized. Everything has been tested and verified. I’ve chosen a manufacturer out of dozens who were capable – but one factory impressed me as the most qualified to handle the initial production.

After all, I absolutely must come out with the best product possible. It’s that simple. There’s no room for error in a launch like this.

When introducing something SO revolutionary, it has to be done RIGHT!

And that’s where you come in.

Your IndieGoGo Pre-Order today will bestow upon me the honor of having you place your trust in me and my expertise.

In return, I give you the honor of being an Auxilry Premium Charter Customer (PCC).

This designation means you will always get new designs of buttons far in advance of the general public.

Thus, you will always be “the first on your block” to arrive in the latest attractive and most eye-pleasing buttons in the world. 

A true innovator. Dapper, too.

You will also continue to enjoy – FOR LIFE – the rock-bottom Low Introductory IndieGoGo Backer Price I’m offering right now as part of the Auxilry IndieGoGo Campaign.

I intend to raise the price as time goes on. But you’ll ALWAYS get the same low price you pay today.

Start enjoying the good feeling of knowing, deep down inside… YOU had something to do with it!

For me, it’s like a revolution in shirts, buttons, neckties, and cufflinks – all at once!

That’s why I want to invite innovation-minded folks like you to join us.

If you like what you’ve heard here and think (agree) we have a winner, let’s do this!

Make your PCC IndieGoGo Pre-Order today – and help MAKE HISTORY tomorrow!

P.S. About Me: I have a background in product design and menswear – so I know the market well. I also have a burning desire to change the world for the better. Frankly, what better way than helping millions of people get dressed and look their best every single day!!! 

  • April - Launch IndieGoGo
  • May - Pre-Production
  • June - Production
  • July - Shipping & Delivery

Domestic US orders will be shipped via USPS. International orders will by distributed by a designated fulfillment center.

Click here to visit www.auxilry.com 

Upon delivery of the first goods, the full Auxilry online store will be accessible through your mobile, tablet, and desktop. There you can navigate effortlessly through our interchangeable button collections or purchase replacement parts.

I am grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read my campaign and to those who contributed whatever they could to make a difference and help me spread the word. YOU, the generous supporters have made all of this worth it. Please know that your efforts, even the smallest ones, do not go unnoticed. I will continue to keep you posted on what your support has helped me to achieve.

Auxilry’s vision is to create buttons that are timeless. We go the extra mile to ensure that both my company and my products have integrity.

Auxiliare International is the first company in the world to create an integrated button system that combines no-sewing, self-fastening capabilities with button interchangeability. You are joining the effort to be progressive and forward-thinking - to not only inject stylish details into your daily fashion choices, but also to further develop additional uses in multiple industries for this amazing system. Together we can provide the world with incredible button designs that have personal meaning and set us apart.

Re-invent the way people wear shirts – starting with your very own!

Legal: US and other international patents pending. Auxilry and Interchangeable Shirt Buttons are registered trademarks of Auxiliare International LLC.

 

Risks and challenges

As a merchandiser, designer and product developer for over 15 years, I have extensive industry experience designing and merchandising collections for numerous fashion brands. In addition, I have handled every aspect of manufacturing, from trend forecasting, branding, designing, production, technical specs, traveling to trade shows and factories in many different continents for quality control just to name a few. Furthermore, I have acquired great relationships over the years, and have designed all kinds of trims including buttons with some amazing production facilities.

From my experience, something unexpected always comes up in the production process. I’ve buffered my timeline to account for unexpected delays that may impact the schedule, so I can deliver the Auxilry Interchangeable Button System to you on time. These things could also impact the delivery schedule:

Volume - sometimes Kickstarter campaigns wildly exceed a project creator’s expectation. If I hit huge volume, it may push the timeline back, within the 15 - 30 day range.

Freight - Port closures and customs delays happen. It’s impossible to know when and for how long. The buffer calculated into the timeline should cover this, but it is an unknown.

My goal is to deliver the highest quality, most effective and innovative interchangeable system to hit the market. I will be working expeditiously delivering transparency all the way through. Please feel free to reach out to me personally anytime should you have a question, or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, I would love to hear from you.

Thank you for supporting Auxilry and I hope you enjoy my product!

Sincerely,

Anibal Marin, CEO and Founder

Last but not least: Please help me spread the word by sharing this page. Thank you so much for your time and support, and I look forward to hearing from each and every one of you!!

Domestic US orders will be shipped via USPS. International orders will by distributed by a designated fulfillment center.Click here to visit www.auxilry.com Upon delivery of the first goods, the full Auxilry online store will be accessible through your mobile, tablet, and desktop. There you can navigate effortlessly through our interchangeable button collections or purchase replacement parts.I am grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read my campaign and to those who contributed whatever they could to make a difference and help me spread the word. YOU, the generous supporters have made all of this worth it. Please know that your efforts, even the smallest ones, do not go unnoticed. I will continue to keep you posted on what your support has helped me to achieve.Auxilry’s vision is to create buttons that are timeless. We go the extra mile to ensure that both my company and my products have integrity.Auxiliare International is the first company in the world to create an integrated button system that combines no-sewing, self-fastening capabilities with button interchangeability. You are joining the effort to be progressive and forward-thinking - to not only inject stylish details into your daily fashion choices, but also to further develop additional uses in multiple industries for this amazing system. Together we can provide the world with incredible button designs that have personal meaning and set us apart.Re-invent the way people wear shirts – starting with your very own!Legal: US and other international patents pending. Auxilry and Interchangeable Shirt Buttons are registered trademarks of Auxiliare International LLC. Risks and challengesAs a merchandiser, designer and product developer for over 15 years, I have extensive industry experience designing and merchandising collections for numerous fashion brands. In addition, I have handled every aspect of manufacturing, from trend forecasting, branding, designing, production, technical specs, traveling to trade shows and factories in many different continents for quality control just to name a few. Furthermore, I have acquired great relationships over the years, and have designed all kinds of trims including buttons with some amazing production facilities.From my experience, something unexpected always comes up in the production process. I’ve buffered my timeline to account for unexpected delays that may impact the schedule, so I can deliver the Auxilry Interchangeable Button System to you on time. These things could also impact the delivery schedule:Volume - sometimes Kickstarter campaigns wildly exceed a project creator’s expectation. If I hit huge volume, it may push the timeline back, within the 15 - 30 day range.Freight - Port closures and customs delays happen. It’s impossible to know when and for how long. The buffer calculated into the timeline should cover this, but it is an unknown.My goal is to deliver the highest quality, most effective and innovative interchangeable system to hit the market. I will be working expeditiously delivering transparency all the way through. Please feel free to reach out to me personally anytime should you have a question, or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, I would love to hear from you.Thank you for supporting Auxilry and I hope you enjoy my product!Sincerely,Anibal Marin, CEO and FounderLast but not least: Please help me spread the word by sharing this page. Thank you so much for your time and support, and I look forward to hearing from each and every one of you!!

story:
We feel so thankful for receiving many good comments about the products and we also learn that many backers are willing to buy more Gligo for their friends. We also get a lot of feedback about the improvements for Gligo. We do keep improving and updating the APP about stability of the connection and other parts of the usage. What’s more, there is an update and improvement of Bluetooth and the second generation of Gligo2S is available.

We are able to immediately deliver the products to the backers after ordering.The Gligo is over but you can order now the Gligo 2S on our new campaign. We are able to immediately deliver the products to the backers after ordering. 

You want a smartwatch that respects your time. We created GLIGO to do just that. 

No crazy/flashy UX and alerts that never stop. We only keep track of the most important things for you throughout the day: check time, meeting reminder, and a little bit of health monitoring and fitness tracking.  

While giving you the most comfortable watch-reading experience, GLIGO also has unprecedentedly long battery life. Different from most of the smartwatches on the market that require charges daily, we adopted an energy-efficient dual-core design: the quartz core has a battery life of up to two years, e-ink screen has a battery life of up to 180 days.

 

We strive for simplicity and functionality, and always with style. With GLIGO, you can focus on the things you care the most about. 

GLIGO’s screen is e-ink, and there is no reflection under the sun like traditional liquid crystal displays have. And it only consumes energy when screen color changes (e.g., switching from black to white). After turning off, images on screen remain, hence very energy-efficient. 

Another advantage of e-ink screen over traditional liquid crystal display is that it is easy to read. E-ink looks like printed text, making it easier for eyes.​

 -

Press the bottom-right button on GLIGO and switch between black and white screens freely. Given your environment, choose mature black or chic white.

The watch has a two-pin design and is equipped with quartz movement. The e-ink screen displays time, date, and notification icons.

GLIGO’s waterproof body can withstand depths up to 30 meters. So now you don't have to worry about taking off your watch when you're showering, at the beach, or working out.

Let us first introduce to you the reminder functions under four innovative scenarios. 

Mobile phone reminders are automatically synced to the watch, and the e-ink screen will display the reminder in different time intervals. For example, if you have an important meeting between 10 am, and 12 pm, the outer circle between 10 and 12 will show white, reminding you that there is a meeting during this period.

The display is black or white background; there are agendas reminder lines for next 12 hours (as you see, there are lines around the display edge, when your calendar has tasks in those hours, the display will show a range at that hour).

You can set and view your full daily schedule easily. As shown in image above, the watch face shows that you have some upcoming appointments at 11:50 AM, 14:30 PM and 18:30 PM.

The screen background is black or white; there’s a ring around the display edge which we called sports amount ring, it goes as your sports amount increase until you fulfill your target sports amount which is set through mobile App.

Black or white background, the display shows a digital time or date, which is in sync with your mobile phone time or date through the mobile phone app. So when you travel to different time zone, the display can show time of different time zones.

When you have traveled to France from American, GLIGO’s quartz hands show the local current time in US (e.g. 10:10 AM) and its face shows the local current time in French (3:10 PM) at the same time. And it also can show the date in French (Oct. 10th).

GLIGO features email alerts, call alerts, and application alerts so that you have to take out your mobile phone or notebook to check them. Life can be simple and easier.

The GliGo Watch application allows your GLIGO to connect seamlessly with your phone, enabling you to access stored information in real time, use your GLIGO to take pictures, and program your reminders as well as your mode choices.

Quick, convenient magnetic charging technology can be used to provide charging power to the E-ink screen alone; the quartz core has a battery life of up to 2 years.

Robust body with streamline makes this smart watch resistant to high temperature, corrosion and tear and wear, allowing for a long lasting use.

Do sports with GLIGO. It tracks everything from your steps, running distance and heart rate. It can also remind you to take a rest. Its sleep monitor tracks your sleep patterns - when you go to sleep and wake up.

There are two different styles for you to choose from: Classic Leather or Stylish Milanese, don't miss the opportunity to show your style.

All silver design fits the most occasions

story:
Discover The Peace Of Never Having To Choose Between Warmth & Safety Again

  • NO More Struggling To Take Coats Off And On
  • NO More Fighting With Blankets
  • NO More Keeping the Coat On, Knowing You Should Take It Off

Buckle Me Baby Coat makes warm car seat safety possible and easy!

https://www.bucklemecoats.com

So How Does It Work?

Just unsnap the front panel – pull the harness straps over your little love’s arms as usual, then pull the panel clear through the harness.

Buckle

Tighten

Done!

CRASH TESTING

Buckle Me Baby Coats has been crash tested at an Independent Crash Test Facility where it not only outperformed traditional coats but actually performed almost identically to no coat at all. The back of the coat is thinner and the front panel moves out of the way leaving no slack in life saving harnesses. Watch below as the test "child" with the Buckle Me Baby Coat moves forward almost identically to the test with no coat at all!

 

 

NOTE: To maximize safety, there will be no hood in the final design per CPST recommendation.

Our patented car seat safety coat is so much more than an ordinary winter coat - it's a lifestyle choice!

We know kids outgrow everything so fast from diapers to tiny shoes, from stylish slings to exersaucers - and that can be expensive. Buckle Me Baby understands parents’ budgets, so we’ve created a high quality coat that eliminates the need for an extra gear like fleece jackets or tangled blankets for the car. Our coat also ends all the take the coat off, put the coat on struggle, letting kids stay safer in the car seat.

Less gear + more safety = priceless convenience.

Buckle Me Baby Coats are designed with gender neutral colors, so coats can be easily passed down from sibling to sibling - just like their car seat. Starting October 2017, parents will also be able to join our  parent marketplace to swap, buy, and resell coats.

Our coats are designed for parents on the go who prioritize safety but love comfort and convenience for themselves and their littlest loves!

We Need Your Help!

Buckle Me Baby Coats has recently completed a successful Kickstarter Campaign (thank you KS Backers!!!) but we want to continue funding our Fall 2017 launch. Manufacturers have large minimums and the more Pre-Orders we collect, the more leverage we have to meet minimums and keep costs down - savings that will be passed on to you as we grow!

Risks and Challenges

Using my background in economics, psychology, marketing, small business and entrepreneurship, Buckle Me Baby's biggest risk, crash testing, has already been overcome. During the design phase I had predicted and planned for many revisions before the coat was expected to pass crash testing. Through careful preparation and design planning only one crash test was needed - which the coat passed with flying colors!

Timelines are often of concern with crowdfunding campaigns, and understandably so. We are currently well ahead of schedule for our September delivery. Our coats are Made in the USA!! We have contracted with a factory in beautiful New England and are excited to be helping local businesses while making our fabulous coats. 

Our biggest hurdle is funding - we need startup funds to get our life saving coats out of our hands and into yours. BMBC looks forward to having you join our team and be a part of revolutionizing the children's outerwear industry. BMBC sees a day in the future where ALL children's coats are designed for the lives kids lead. Thank you and welcome to Team BMBC!

Final Note: You will be able choose your size and colors mid July for September delivery!

If you love our project and are passionate about children's safety help spread the word!

Please click on the social sharing buttons to the right and share our project with any parent who would love to learn about car seat safety recommendations, or how to stay safer and warm in the car during the winter!

Kabaccha Shoes are colorful leather shoes that are handmade in Italy by brilliant artisan shoemakers with premium materials. Kabaccha Shoes redefine the age old boring black dress shoe - by adding a modern twist, new technologies and a splash of color. We make Modern Shoes for Modern Men & Women.

 

 

These are the 2017 Kabaccha Men's and Women's Collection. We have three styles: The Wingtip, the Loafer & the Driver Mocassin. We focused our efforts on these three styles because they are the must have shoes in any wardrobe.
We've made them in many beautiful colorways for every type of personality. Whether you're going to work or a night out - we have every style and color you can imagine.

 

The visually striking 2017 Men’s Wingtipis our creative reinvention of Kabaccha’s Original Men’s Wingtip. The classic brogue designs, that reference long-standing traditions of men fashion, are accentuated by our signature variations of color that further transform this highlystylized design.
The Men’s Wingtip is made for the risk-taker and aspiring creative with an affinity for redefinition. Timelesselegance and striking details make this shoe the perfect statement piece for formal, professional and evening ensembles. Below are a selection of 10 colorways to pick from!

 


You also have the choice between the Wedge Heel & the Classic Heel. We've received lots of feedback from our backers about which one they want. When we send out the survey - we'll ask you which one you prefer! This effects only the Men's Loafer & Wingtips!

Our Modern Man’s Loafer finds its roots in a timeless and elegant shoe design, reimagined to introduce an elevated standard of comfort and versatility. The classictassel, in combination with our wide selection of inspiring colors, creates a unique blend of classic and urban, risk-taking style. 
Lightweight soles and fine Italian leather handled by highly trained artisans have allowed us to create durable, ultralight, and comfortable formal footwear that will add an element of personality to the basic black tux, elevating your style to be anything but ordinary. Below are a selection of 6 colorways to pick from!


 

You also have the choice between the Wedge Heel & the Classic Heel. We've received lots of feedback from our backers about which one they want. When we send out the survey - we'll ask you which one you prefer! This effects only the Men's Loafer & Wingtips!

The 2017 Men’s Mocassin is Kabaccha’s ideal blend of effortless yet eye-catching style, brought to you at our unprecedented standard of comfort. The Men’s Mocassin pays tribute to the classicDriver style with a uniquely Kabaccha twist.
Brought to you in a variety of versatile and expressive colors, our Italian leather Moccasins will add an element of personalityand excitement to your everyday ensemble. Below are a selection of 10 colorways to pick from!


 

The Women’s Loafer Lace ups finds its roots in a timeless and elegant shoe design, reimagined to introduce a heightened standard of comfort and versatility. Sleek, modern lines and our wide selection of inspiring colors create a unique blend of classic and urban, risk-taking style.
Lightweight soles and fine Italian leather have allowed us to create durable and comfortablefootwear that will add an element of personality to anything you wear. In our New Women’s Loafer, elevate your style far above the ordinary in your everyday jeans, dresses, or business attire (even without the heel!). Below are 8 colorways to pick from!


 
 

Kabaccha’s Women’s Wingtipis derived from the shape of the time-honored Men’s Wingtip. Feminine accents soften its silhouette to be paired with anything from jeans to dresses. Classic brogue designs are accentuated by our signature variations of color that further transform this highly stylized design. 
The lightweight, white soles and patent, pastel leathers will add an element of feminine grace to any style. Timeless eleganceand striking details make this shoe the must-have statement piece for everyday looks or the perfect match for formal, professional and evening ensembles. 

 

 
 

The 2017 Women’s Mocassinis the embodiment of Kabaccha’s mission to balance effortless and eye-catchingstyle with our higher standard of comfort. Hand-tailored to fit the needs of every woman on the go, our Women’s Mocassin pays tribute to the classic Driver style with a uniquely Kabaccha twist. 
Brought to you in a variety of versatile and expressivecolors, our Moccasins will add an element of personality and excitement to your everyday ensemble while their lightweight soles and fine Italian leather will keep you comfortable and on the move.


 


 

Our Ultralight shoes drastically reduce the overall drag & weight on your feet - allowing you to feel as if you don't even have shoes on. Shoes now a days are heavy and not very easy on your feet - we wanted to change this because there are so many new materials available. Using these revolutionary materials makes the shoe so much more comfortable even after a long day.

 
The Sole we used in our 2017Men's Wingtip and Loafer hasevolved tremendously from our original collection. We listened to all the feedback we received, and went back to the drawing board. 
We made the sole 75% stronger sole that is much more durable and longer lasting while still keeping the light weightfactor to it. We've designed it in a way that you can comfortablywalk for years without the shoe loosing tread or grip.
 

 

Each pair of Kabaccha Shoes is carefully hand-cut in Italy by our brilliant artisan shoe makers. Almost all other brands do this by machine to save time and money. Our CEO, Kabeer, has made sure that we do everything the long and right way.
This is one of the most important steps of making a shoe as everything depends on the skill and precision of cutting the Nappa leather.

The short clip you see above is just one of many, and we mean many, pieces that go into making just one shoe. All of these steps have to be repeated again for the other half as well.
We are proud to say that every molecule in our shoes is 100% Made in Italy! Our artisanshoemakers treat each shoe like a work of art. They don't stop picking at it until the shoe is perfect.

The craftsmen & women in our artisan factory have been making shoes by hand for generations and they've become exceedingly good at it. The skills are passed down from generation to generation, evolving and becoming more efficient every time.
When we say "Handmade in Italy", we really mean it... from a piece of leather - to a full shoe - made by hand.

We use only the best Italian Nappa Leather. The tanneries we sourced our leather from are environmentally safe as well, as we use Natural Vegetable Tanning processes and don't use harsh chemicals to tan our leather. A lot of brands don't buy their leather from Italian tanneries to save on costs, but Kabaccha Shoes are made from 100% Italian leather bought from tanneries in Tuscany, Italy.

Every pair of Kabaccha Shoes is individually tempered into the perfect fit to make them comfortable and durable.  This procedure makes the leather supple but also strengthens the integrity of the shoe. This step is usually skipped by lesser companies to save on costs - but we at Kabaccha went the extra mile.
We also use only PremiumMaterials in all our shoes. We used the best quality laces, best quality stitching and other raw materials. Everything that goes into making a pair of shoes is sourced 100% from Italy.
 

We give a lot of attention to detail and you will see that the moment you receive your first pair. Before the shoes are shipped off, they are individually checked for imperfections and manually inspected by an experienced artisan to make sure each and everyone of you gets a perfectly matching pair.

The Men & Women artisans that work at our factories in Italy are so skilled at what they do, that they take a lot of pride in their work. It's almost an insult to themselves & their tradition if they make a mistake, so they really go out of their way to make sure they don't make any.

Once your beautiful shoes are ready, they are put inside out Kabaccha Shoe boxes. We were so picky about having everything made in Italy that we even got our boxes made there.

The box is made from a very high quality heavy stock materials and you will feel this the moment you receive the box. We think of our selves as a high end brand, so we wanted to have all the attributes of a high end brand. In our last campaign, many of our backers complimented our packaging and box and compared us to the likes of Apple!
With our direct to consumer model, we cut out the middle man and make our prices affordable and fair. Other Italian brands have a lot of markups, so you end up paying a lot more for what the shoes are really worth.
Our shoes will be worth a lot more once they go on retail on our website. Now is your chance to get the shoes for 30-50% OFF! 

Our direct to consumer business model enables us to cut out the middle man and keep our prices low. We should be selling our shoes for $500, but we want to build a brand that makes luxuryaffordable.

From our artisan factories - straight to your feet. Kabaccha Shoes will always put you over making a profit like most other brands. We are happy with the way things are with our prices and won't ever lose our valuesor forget where we came from.

We've carefully thought out each reward and broken it down to make it simple for you. Those prices are 30-50% off Retail! Look over the rewards and read the pledge descriptions for more details. If you have any questions please feel free to ask us in the comments section and we'll do our best to answer them for you.


Here is a pretty accuratetimeline that we predict. Having been through an extremely large campaign last year, our factory is much more prepared this year for an even biggercampaign. If all goes according to plan we should be shipping your shoes out by Feb/March. 



 


 
Kabaccha Shoes are true to size. When choosing your size, stick with your usual dress shoe size. We've made our shoes with a wider than normal Italian shoe. Doing this gives your feet more room to breathe, makes our shoes a lot more comfortable and allows all kinds of feet to fit effortlessly. We will send you a survey at the end of the campaign to find out your exact size. If they don't fit - don't worry - we'll exchange them for ya!
Size 14/15/16. We offer large sizes, but the leather/materials required to make them requires an aditional cost. Please increase your pledge by 40$ if you are a size 14/15/16.. Please message us if you have any questions!

 

Kabaccha Shoes is a fun brand, but we take our shoes very seriously. We wanted to make the most visually appealing shoes ever seen, and the most comfortable shoes ever worn. We knew we had to do something spectacular to live up to that, so we put together a talented team and all the passion in this world to make that happen.
Our founder, Kabeer Arora, is a thoroughbred shoe designer & comes from a bloodline of shoemakers. He's spent many years in shoe factories all over the world gaining real world experience and has professionally studied footwear design in London and Italy. 
In 2015, Kabaccha shoes successfully completed a kickstarter campaign and became one of the most successful campaigns in crowdfunding history. Our campaign opened doors and lead the way for so many other campaigns, who followed in our footsteps. It's been an incredible journey!

story:
Craftmark’s smart-locking stainless steel buckle allows for a micro-adjustable custom fit for any individual, ensuring ultimate comfort. The smart-locking system was meticulously designed to grip and secure the belt without any slippage. The buckle is made from stainless steel that guarantees added durability.

Say goodbye to unpleasant looking wrinkles caused by a traditional pin buckle and holes!

The Craftmark Belt’s easy-twist magnetic system makes this all possible. You can easily swap between premium hand stained vegetable-tanned leather and sophisticated cowhide Saffiano leather, to suit any occasion, with a simple swivel of the buckle.

Compared to other conventional reversible belts, the Craftmark Belt's unique magnetic buckle mechanism requires no pulling and twisting or manual unscrewing, which saves time and reduces the possibility of damage.

We source our leather carefully. We only use premium-quality, natural leather in our products to promise great performance. To ensure the Craftmark Belt meets our high standard, the vegetable-tanned side of the belt is made of full-grain leather. This high-grade, moisture-resistant leather has an extremely tight grain, making it durable and breathable. With a minimal amount of treatment, the vegetable-tanned leather is hand-stained with natural pigments and eco-solvents to produce an astounding color.

By using tannic acids naturally found in bark, branches, leaves, fruits and other plant species, vegetable tanning leather is one of the most natural and environmentally friendly ways to produce a rich, classic color. This artisanal process is”chromium-free,” promising to eliminate the typical harsh, harmful chemicals used in the standard dying processes.

Because of this, the Craftmark Belt will age beautifully over time like a “fine wine”, even when worn daily.

Stylish and high-quality Saffiano leather was chosen with versatility and class in mind.

Rock this look to a sophisticated, urbane, elegant and sleek event.

The Craftmark Belt can be more than just two belts in one...

Create your own unique belts that match your style using an array of interchangeable leather belt bodies and quality stainless steel buckles from the collection.

The Craftmark Belt was inspired by Adelene’s husband who leads a busy jet setting lifestyle as a tech executive. Frequent travels are common, and external meetings require him to look dapper and groomed. At the same time, he favors a smart casual look for daily work life and also for socializing after work and on weekends. He prefers to keep things simple and minimize belt clutter both at home and while traveling. In addition, heavy meals can cause discomfort as belts sometimes have a tendency to feel too tight after eating. What he needed was a stylish and versatile belt that could provide micro-adjustments, very discreetly, to provide relief and comfort. The Craftmark Belt by Barnns was conceptualized to solve these issues, to inspire through innovation and to simplify life.

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make the Craftmark Belt a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a belt, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

  • Facebook: http://fb.me/barnns.official
  • Instagram: @barnns_official
  • Twitter: @barnns_official
  • Website: https://www.barnns.com
  • Media Kit: https://bit.ly/2OiD7H3

story:
Quality materials, hand made garments produced by real artists. Made in Michigan & Indiana.

 

                   The Story

Established in December of 2014, Savage Village started as a young grassroots urban outfitter drawing inspiration for designs from pop culture, horror films, to skateboarding, punk, hip hop and other genres of music. We've seen tremendous success since then and we have learned a great deal. While all of us here have had fun producing new t-shirt designs as well as stickers, hats and lapel pins, we have always wanted to push our creativity to the next level to offer our customers more, which is hand made garments using high quality textiles and materials. 
 

(Photo courtesy of us, hell yeah)

There has been so many products that we've tried again and again. some materials we've been very satisfied with, while others just weren't things that we thought were great to begin with. Through a lot of trial and error, we can finally say we are where our taste is, what made us want to start this movement in the first place. We want to inspire others to follow their ambitions, and to never give up, even when it seems like the odds are against you.

(One of our favorite inspirational speeches by Ira Glass)

We found that the only way to truly produce a quality that we're happy with is to make it ourselves and collaborating with other creative minds. We're FINALLY partnering up with our good friends at Axiom Graphix, these guys do stellar work. Insane quality prints.

Check out their Instagram and Facebook:

https://www.instagram.com/axiomgraphix/?hl=en

https://www.facebook.com/AxiomGraphix/

We have traditional artists on deck like Pauly Everett, we're planning to make some incredible designs with him. A Flint native that has been killing the game for years, check out his work on Instagram.

https://www.instagram.com/flintundergroundkid/?...

https://www.facebook.com/FlintUnderground/

Just this year we've partnered up with Midnight Tyrannosaurus to bring you guys some awesome merch, he's chosen a few epic companies to collaborate with and we're incredibly stoked to work with him. If you haven't already go show him some love on Soundcloud and Facebook. Dude produces some absolutely filthy tunes. 

https://soundcloud.com/midnightasaurus

https://www.facebook.com/MidnightTyrannosaurus/

https://www.instagram.com/midnight_tyrannosauru...

 

Over the next few months we will cut n' sew all of the new hats that we sell in our store, this will ensure high-quality products that are made in the U.S.A. If you're curious about checking out how we will produce the hats, there's a solid video from Properfit Clothing (An awesome bunch of hat makers from Grand Rapids, MI), we plan to use their online store at www.hatsupplyco.com for our components. 
 

 

We're also launching our new streetwear capsule immediately, the new shirts will be a mixture of 50/50 cotton/polyester and triblends.
 

What We Need & What You Get

The entirety of the funding will go towards new sewing/screen printing equipment and materials, we will also have some awesome stretch goals for our campaign that you will be able to see at the end of the story. 

Once we have fulfilled all pledge goals we will be updating our store periodically with limited runs no restocks of new & unique products. Be sure to follow our Facebook and Instagram for updates!

We will be launching weekly livestreams soon, you will have a chance to see us work and participate in the creative process.

 

PERKS!

Skate Fast, Eat A$$ $30
100% cotton, hand dyed by us. Low print numbers <100.

Savage Slime $25

100% cotton, hand dyed by us. Low print numbers <100.

5 Panel Wool Camper Cap $40

6 Panel Savage Snapback $40

Hot Cheesy Mess Hoodie $50

50/50, Woven labels on pocket and hood

Murder Mitten $25

Triblend, designed and illustrated by Cody Ling. Limited prints <50

Artist Instagram https://www.instagram.com/cdaltonart/?hl=en

O.M.W.2.F.Y.B. $25

Triblend, limited prints <100

Asking for a Friend $25

Triblend, open run.

Murda Mania $16

Vixen Kneehighs 

Savage Booty $16

Stretchy jersey knit

DIRT CRATE

$20-$50 per crate.

 

Perk Packages:

$50 Shirts on Shirts

  • Two shirts of your choice and a randomly selected enamel pin.

$100 Savage Starter Pack (choose one) 

  • Every order comes with a limited edition enamel pin, embroidered patch and stickers. 
  • All 4 of the new shirts, 
  • Your choice of 1 hat, 2 shirts,
  • 1 Hoodie, 2 shirts, art print.

$100 Village Vixen Package

A package for the ladies, this includes:

  • An "Asking for a Friend" t-shirt.
  • Pair of Savage Booty Shorts
  • Pair of Murda Mania knee high socks.
  • One Hoodie of your choice.

$200 The Village Chief

  • One of the $100 incentive packages PLUS one ORIGINAL artwork from us.

$500 The Savage Wombo Combo

  • Every product in the capsule.
  • An original artwork.
  • You will have the opportunity to hang out for a live stream in our studio, with our lead designer and our resident artist, SALVO and Knives (travel and lodging accommodations not included).
  • A year subscription to our Dirt Crate service.

$1,000 ABSOLUTE SAVAGERY

  • Every product in the capsule.
  • An original artwork.
  • You will have the opportunity to hang out for a live stream in our studio, with our lead designer and our resident artist, SALVO and Knives (travel and lodging accommodations not included).
  • A 3 year subscription to our Dirt Crate service.
  • A special discount code, available only to you, for life. You get everything, AT COST.
  • The opportunity to collaborate in the design of one of our future products.
  • Random supply packages with all kinds of love included. 

 

 

The Impact

Most of these products are in production or close to production, we're launching this campaign in hopes that we can cover the cost of additional equipment to manufacture hats and other embroidered products in house. All those that contribute will have the opportunity to grow with us. We've been successful in every endeavor thanks to all of you, we love each and every one of you. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign to your social media sites and make some noise, you can very easily get the word out using the IndieGoGo share tools. Thanks!

More video goodness from one of our super awesome homies, Check out AJ Damnit at: https://www.youtube.com/user/bubutonik

 

Who doesn't love outtakes?

 

Thanks for checking out our campaign. Please share the page!

We love all of you, thank you for your continued love and support, we would be nothing with out you. <3

story: I am a nearly 16 year old who has been given an incredible opportunity to go to the IMTA modeling competition in NYC. There is one tiny little catch i need to pay $ 4,995 before June. I am looking for any support a few dollars here or there or even an encouraging word if that is all you can afford. It is my believe that this money will not be wasted as i am very inspired to work my butt off and make something of this once in a life time chance. Thank you in advance for your exeptional support and maintaining my belief in the support of fellow man. Sincerly Liam

story:
About Set Apart Clothing

Hey, my name is Zachary Martinez, and I'm hoping to start a Christian clothing design company with the help of you:

  • We are inspired by Romans 12:2 "Don’t copy the behavior and customs of this world, but let God transform you into a new person by changing the way you think. Then you will learn to know God’s will for you, which is good and pleasing and perfect."
  •  This is a ministry all around giving glory to God.
  • We aim to give some of the profits to community, local churches, and missionaries. 

What We Need & What You Get

The Basics:

For this project to become a reality we will need to raise at least $500, and God-willing, even more. This money will be used to print the t-shirts, crew necks, sweatshirts, and more. Eventually we hope to upgrade our design process, add more products, and gain more recognition and support for Set Apart. 

If we do not reach our intended goal, the money raised will still be put into the project. If more money is raised, the extra will be put into even more clothing, and support of missionaries all around the world.  

The Impact

Just by donating you will impact our ministry massively:

The more donations, the more recognition (of God, and Set Apart)

If someone is wearing Set Apart designs, it is more likely they may have a chance to share the Word with someone who may not know.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have any money to donate, you can help in many ways:

Get the word out about Set Apart and spread the Gospel! It's all for God's glory. 

 

Thanks, Zachary Martinez - Set Apart Clothing

story:
The last thing anyone wants to hear is you have cancer. I was in total shock when I was diagnose with stage three breast cancer in 2009, followed by chemotherapy and radiation, “I had a Double Mastectomy”. This was truly the loneliest and darkest time of my life. I’ve been working in the medical field for some time and the last nine years has been with Hospice patients. I went from working with patients to becoming a patient. I’ve had patients die in my arms and felt privileged to be there as they began there new journey. I have been to support groups and the families and patients have shared with me the need for such an article as this top. The top can be used at the beginning of treatments. When I see a patient it is at the end of life. A part of my personal therapy was to learn how to sew! I bought a sewing machine and took several sewing classes. I have designed a top for patients that are having surgery above the waist. When I went through my treatment there were “no” tops available. My design top would address the concerns for comfort and modesty; while easing the distress and vulnerability. The idea of challenging myself to become an entrepreneur was daunting and exciting to say the least! I have a design patent pending. My dream is to have my own on line medical clothing line.

What is Hope medical wear?

Hope Medical Wear will be producing its first garment which is call Hope. The Hope top will take you from home to the store to the hospital to the exam rooms and back home again without ever having to change or disrobe.  Every time you go to the doctors you have to change into a paper gown or a cloth gown. I know how tiring this can be. The Hope top is design with you the patient in mind. Its for anyone having surgery above the waist and up. If you're having surgery on, neck- esophagus- heart-liver-gallbladder-pancreas-stomach- spleen-colon- back- kidneys-breast augmentation and in my case breast. Its a great gift a great donation for your loved one which provides comfort , ease , modesty, and still provide you with dignity. I'm in the process of designing a top for a man. A percentage of proceeds will be donated back to those in need.

 

Your contribution will fund 

1. Manufacturing, grading and final pattern development and production 

2. Sourcing and purchase of fabric and product hardware,labels etc.

3. Starting with Two styles to choose from, starting with the fall and winter season

All manufacturing will be done in the US to ensure best quality and support American manufacturing to keep jobs in the US. We design manufacture and distribute our products right here in Seattle.

Risks and Challenges

The Hope Medical team has a realistic expectations for product manufacturing lead times and out come of the product.

Running a business is a risk

Taking the next big step forward is a whole new challenge.

Help makeit happen for Hope Medical Wear

story:
What is OHCOVER

OHCOVER is a new stylish and comfortable way to carry your motorcycle helmet.

OHCOVER is a new kind of foldable helmet bag that can be worn as a backpack, as cross-body, as hobo bag or as a slanted tote.  

You will hardly find a bag like ours because our products are registered in Europe, USA and Canada.


"A great idea, it is very useful if you need to carry another helmet while riding a bike." - Carlos Cardús - 250cc World Championship racer

"An interesting and practical proposal but also elegant and fun" - Josep Lluís Merlos - Radio Marca journalist (20th of October 2014)


Why is useful our helmet cover? Watch the following video made by ourselves:



General specifications

A helmet cover that folds into itself

That's it, simply. You can fold the cover into its inner pocket and you need less than 1 minute to do it!. This way, its size is very small and you can put it anywhere you want.



One bag that can be worn in 4 different ways

You can carry the helmet the way that you prefer: as a backpack, as cross-body as a  hobo or as a slanted tote. We have developed a side buckle that allows you a fast change between the configurations.



Lots of different designs

In order to achieve great quality in terms of designs and colours we use sublimation technique (Sublimation technique - Wikipedia). This way, we can transfer the designs made on the PC into the polyester cloth (How sublimation works - Youtube).

We have developed different design ranges so you can find the one that fits you the best.

  • CITY: it is our main line. Lots of different products for lots of different tastes



    • Supersport: Inspired by the supersport motorcycles



    • Custom: Based on the classical custom bikes



    • Race: Designs based on actual designs from great all time pilots


    • OHH!!: Some of the CITY line put into a helmet bag for jet helmets



    Handmade in Barcelona

    Barcelona means sun, architecture, Mediterranean way of live… but it also means textile know-how. It has 200+ years in textile manufacturing experience. For this reason we work alongside local manufacturers so we can have the best possible product.


    Other specifications

    In OHCOVER we take care of every detail, even the smallest ones:

    • All the covers have a protective stripe that prevents the helmet from being scratched by the zipper.
    • We use thick thread that strengthens the seams.
    • We have developed side buckles that allow a quick change between the backpack and the other configurations.
    • The zipper puller is made on hard rubber so it cannot damage your helmet by accident.
    • All the different designs are registered in Europe, USA and Canada. 

                                             


    Product range

    We have completely developed 3 lines of products plus the personalized products:

    • EVO ADAPTABLE:  full face's helmet cover with adaptive elements, waterproof and available in 3 different sizes. 


    • GALAXY NEO: flexible helmet cover, water-repellent and available in 2 different sizes. 



  • OHH!!dry:  waterproof helmet cover available in a only size.

  • OHH!!neo: flexible helmet cover, water-repellent and available in a only size.

  • Personalized: We are open to personalize all of our products. We can modify an existing design or we can create a completely new design for you. For example the following design was made for Wayne Gardner (500cc World Champion).


    PERKS


    THE COMPANY

    The company started on 2012. Everything was born when Luis ordered a customized helmet. It came along a helmet bag that didn't look like the new helmet. Then he wondered: why can't I have a helmet cover that looks like my helmet? This very first idea set everything in motion because we wanted to improve the existant helmet covers on the market.

    We worked in 2 lines of products in parallel: helmet covers for motorcycle helmets and helmet covers for horse riding helmets. The first prototypes were made in leather. The quality of the final product was very good, but the associated costs were also high.

    We managed to launch the horse riding range:

    But it wasn't a success.... So we decided to center our efforts in the motorcycle line because the range of potential customers is wider.

    We finished the leather helmet covers. The result was fantastic but if wasn't that useful, the leather is rigid and, if you don't want to damage it, you cannot fold it. 

    At this point (more than a year ago) we started working with different kinds of cloth, and we ended up choosing polyester, because it allows using the sublimation technique and it is easy to work with. We followed this path and after lots of different prototypes and designs we managed to finish the helmet covers that you have already seen.

    WHERE ARE WE AND WHY WE NEED YOU

    Now we have managed to finish most of the prototypes (we have some work in progress products) and we are ready to start the production. But there are some points that we need to solve first.

    We lack the proper machinery. Now we are producing everything with a plotter modified to do sublimation and a small heat press. In order to do a proper production we need a sublimation printer and a thermic  pressure calander, we would like to purchase these two machines:



    Even tough these two machines aren't the top of the market, they would make 8 times faster our production process.

    As we said before, we want to work in Barcelona because there are lots of experts and good workers who know a lot about textile and because producing everything here lets us control all the production steps. We already have our main manufacturer that will provide us the cloth and we already have two groups of workers that will sew the helmet covers.


    TIMETABLE


    RISKS AND CHALLENGES

    We have been working for more than two years developing OHCOVER helmet covers and and now the product is ready for production. The next steps that we have to follow are the acquisition of the two needed machines and to bond business deals with the different manufacturers and shops/resellers that we have already contacted.

    We have talked to some business and we know that it will be a hard work to close deals. That is our main challenge!
