story:
Pick up this exclusive new style now!

*PLEASE NOTE: INDIEGOGO DOES NOT GIVE AN OPTION TO SPECIFY SIZE. I WILL BE EMAILING YOU AFTER THE CAMPAIGN IS OVER TO GET YOUR SIZE!


In 2013 I quit my job, sold everything I had and went on a journey to find a more meaningful path in life. While backpacking Europe I met a person who was helping 1500 orphans in Ethiopia to get off the streets and into schools. She told me even though they were able to educate these orphans, after they turned 18, many were still in poverty as there were no jobs or opportunities for them. She asked if I could help.

So this year I went to Ethiopia and spent 3 months teaching 8 underprivileged people how to make my favorite sandals as a way to support themselves, and now I am turning to you to join me in making a difference. Pick yourself up a pair of these amazing rope sandals and share this with your friends, and together we can make a lasting difference in their lives and many more as we expand our operation. 


There are an estimated 150,000 orphans and underprivileged children living on the streets of Ethiopia. Some of the lucky ones will get placed into orphanages where they will have a better home and a chance to go to school. But even these kids are displaced from this support system when they turn 18, leaving them once again alone and desperate as there just aren't enough jobs or opportunities for them.

It is our goal to invest directly into the lives of these talented youth, and others in similar situations, by not only giving them a well paying job, paying 3X the average local wages, but teaching them the business and life skills they need to succeed, keeping them and their families out of poverty for good. 

 

At Corda we provide the opportunities these underprivileged people need by teaching them how to make the worlds coolest sandals out of rope! Providing them with a well paying job is just the first step. Our goal is to empower them to be able to start their own businesses, creating even more opportunities and jobs in their local communities. 

With your support, we will be able to offer them English classes, computer classes and teach them basic business skills. Corda is also providing the hands on experience of starting and growing a business as they participate in all facets of growing Corda in their local community. For this reason we really wanted a product they could sell in their local market, a shoe that was easy to make that was also fashionable, durable, versatile and affordable. Your support enables us to offer Corda sandals at a reduced price in Ethiopia so more can afford them. 


Corda rope sandals are the greatest footwear on the planet!  They are light, comfortable, durable, form to your foot and can go anywhere! They have an adjustable strap in the back for a perfect fit. They are Perfect for the office, city streets, the beach, hiking or any other adventure you want to take them on. And when they are nice and dirty from all your adventures you can just toss them in the washing machine!  Oh, and did we mention they are 100% vegan and made out of the most eco-friendly rope you can find? The process to make our rope uses less water, electricity and chemicals than any other rope!


We know Corda rope sandals are awesome, and we have already done the hard part of teaching 8 deserving people in poverty how to make them. They are currently making adult whole sizes between 5 and 13. And now we need your help. We are turning to you to try out these comfy and unique sandals at a great price and help us reach our goals!

Goals

  • $10,000:  The minimum we need to really get started. This provides the funding to pay for the rope, hand tools, equipment and wages needed for the 8 people we've hired for the next 6 months.
  • $20,000: The funding needed to get into a larger facility, provide opportunities and jobs for 6 more deserving people who desperately need them, and the equipment and tools needed to expand into making Kid's sizes and the ability to add recycled tire soles! This will also enable us to increase our supply capabilities to get into new markets and start selling the sandals wholesale to retail shops. 
  • $30,000: Provide opportunities and well paying jobs for 6 more amazing people, as well as the funding needed to formalize and implement our program to teach basic business skills, English classes, computer lessons and provide micro-loans to start their own business, which not only allows someone else to take their place at Corda, but creates even more jobs in their community.
  

The regular Corda Rope Sandals are made 100% out of rope. The rope is melted together forming a very strong bond, while staying soft and comfortable. It is quite durable but after some good use they may start to fray on the bottom. You can just bust out your scissors and trim it off, or burn it back with a lighter. 

Adding a sole made 100% from recycled tires is not only good for the environment, but makes your sandals more durable and last longer. Add an extra layer of protection for your more rugged activities. 


It is not an easy task setting up this kind of a project in a sub-Saharan African country. That is why I wanted to go over there first, overcome all the necessary obstacles and get the ball rolling. We are already producing a small amount of sandals daily, so you can be confident you will get yours! Each pair is made entirely by hand, so if there are defects, we will replace them for you at no extra cost!

All you have to do is support this project, help deserving people to have an opportunity to get ahead in life, snag yourself a pair of Corda Rope Sandals at a great price and wait for them to come in the mail!  The early orders we should be able to fill within a few weeks of this campaign, later orders may take a few months, but as we expand our operation we are confident you will have your comfortable Corda sandals in time for your spring adventures!



INSTAGRAM: @CORDALIFE #CORDAVENTURE


Corda Sandal Size Conversion Chart



Video filmed and produced by: Sam Peay 
Photography by:
Molly Grunwald
Kylie Turley
Austin Johnson
Austin Winnie
and our fellow #adventuresouls on Instagram!

story:
PERFORMANCE: Not only is the [eau]bottle stylish in eight fashionable colors for use in your active lifestyle. It is also 43% hotter after 12 hours and 49% cooler after 24 hours when bench-marked against three market leaders. This is thanks to the THERM[eau]+™ triple layered insulation.

Driploq™ - Trust your [eau]bottle will not leak a single drop.

Powershell - The impact resistant [eau]bottle can endure your active lifestyle.

Powder coating - A superior scratch proof surface (not on Naked Steel or Norwegian Wood) providing a solid grip.

18/8 Stainless Steel - Pure food grade steel without plastic liner ensures flavors will not be impaired.

Anti-condensation - Keeps surrounding stuff dry and safe preventing wet marks on your table top.

Fits Cup-holder - In your car, on bike, baby stroller etc.

Toxic free and BPA free - You care not to drink bad stuff.

 

AND ONE MORE THING: Your water well in Bulingin, Ghana.

Each [eau]bottle part finances a well in Africa. The first well in Bulingin, Ghana opened in July (yes we drilled in advance so that you are guaranteed of success) and the GPS to find it is engraved on your limited edition bottle. 1 bottle = 7 years water to one person in Africa.

Each bottle has a unique ID laser engraved under the base. By registering your bottle you can get updates on that project and the coming wells. By sharing in your social media we can track orders from your code and add another year of water (on top of the 7 years a bottle generates) to the next well project. You can follow the progress of this sharing on "My Water" on www.eaubottle.com. 5.000 bottles finance the drilling of a new well, meaning if we only reach a fraction of the volume of the market leaders we'll be drilling thousands of new wells. 

Sormontey Kyerebetey, Bulingin, Ghana: "I am happy they have given us a borehole. We have been looking for a good drinking water for a long time but we don’t get, now we have one am so happy."

 

Read more about our local NGO in Ghana working closely with WaterAid here:  

 

Read more about the UN goals for sustainable development here:   

 

COMES IN A NICE GIFT BOX: The [eau]bottle comes in a great looking gift box explaining the features. Open the magnetic flap front to explore your well and meet some of the villagers of Bulingin. Who do you know that would appreciate a gift with a bit of extra wellness?

 

LET´S DRILL MORE WELLS! Showing people you are proud of your choice is not only a way of sharing the coolest & hottest design bottle ever. It also changes lives...

 

 

READ MORE on www.eaubottle.com Follow us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Youtube.

story:
The Eternal Diamond

The symbol of eternal love, captured in solid sterling silver. We've created a timeless work of art we call the Silver Diamond. Every angle illuminates with brilliance with each handmade piece.

The Silver Diamond is a 3 dimensional mathematical construct called an assymetrical polyhedron. After days of CAD work (see below) we felt this was the perfect shape to combine elegance and uniqueness.

Each Silver diamond is solid Sterling silver with a perfect mirror finish.

21 grams of pure Sterling Silver

A break in conventional design, the Silver Diamond is a perfect asymmetrical polyhedron.

We used a heavy, solid Silver design meant to last a lifetime. The Silver Diamond is treated to resist tarnishing. The pure solid silver pendant will stay bright and shiny for years to come without any cleaning!

Appropriate for men and women alike, it's a stunning piece of jewelry.

Enjoy the brilliance from any angle.

Secure and solid design. The necklace becomes part of the pendant.

 A unique flow-through design allows the necklace to become part of the design without disturbing the lines of the pendant.

The front and back are symmetrical and can be worn on either side with the same effect.

Exquisite packaging is perfect as a surprise gift.

Thank you for reading about the Silver Diamond. We are very proud of our work and can't wait to bring it to life!

The development of  an asymmetrical polyhedron is much more difficult than imagined. We used the power of CAD design to work out the details before making our first prototype. Designing jewelry this way results in an amazingly accurate, stunning piece.

SPECIFICATIONS

Pendant: 
100% solid sterling silver   
Size: 2.6cm x 2cm x 1cm (1.02in x 0.78in x 0.39in)  
Weight: 21 grams

Necklace: 
50cm (19.7in)  and 65cm (25.6in）(two sizes included)

Material:
316L stainless steel (clasp)  
Features: waterproof, colorfast, hypoallergenic. 
Diameter: 1.5mm

Pledge today to make the Silver Diamond a reality！

Risks and challenges

We have already made our prototype and are ready to place a production order. Each Silver Diamond will be made using the same process, so we are confident it can be made. We face the risk of running behind on schedule if the handmade production process takes longer than expected.

After days of CAD work (see below) we felt this was the perfect shape to combine elegance and uniqueness.Each Silver diamond is solid Sterling silver with a perfect mirror finish.21 grams of pure Sterling SilverA break in conventional design, the Silver Diamond is a perfect asymmetrical polyhedron.We used a heavy, solid Silver design meant to last a lifetime. The Silver Diamond is treated to resist tarnishing. The pure solid silver pendant will stay bright and shiny for years to come without any cleaning!Appropriate for men and women alike, it's a stunning piece of jewelry.Enjoy the brilliance from any angle.Secure and solid design. The necklace becomes part of the pendant. A unique flow-through design allows the necklace to become part of the design without disturbing the lines of the pendant.The front and back are symmetrical and can be worn on either side with the same effect.Exquisite packaging is perfect as a surprise gift.Thank you for reading about the Silver Diamond. We are very proud of our work and can't wait to bring it to life!The development of  an asymmetrical polyhedron is much more difficult than imagined. We used the power of CAD design to work out the details before making our first prototype. Designing jewelry this way results in an amazingly accurate, stunning piece.SPECIFICATIONSPendant: 100% solid sterling silver   Size: 2.6cm x 2cm x 1cm (1.02in x 0.78in x 0.39in)  Weight: 21 gramsNecklace: 50cm (19.7in)  and 65cm (25.6in）(two sizes included)Material:316L stainless steel (clasp)  Features: waterproof, colorfast, hypoallergenic. Diameter: 1.5mmPledge today to make the Silver Diamond a reality！Risks and challengesWe have already made our prototype and are ready to place a production order. Each Silver Diamond will be made using the same process, so we are confident it can be made. We face the risk of running behind on schedule if the handmade production process takes longer than expected.

story:
Click Below to Pre-Order The Kennedy Weekender Now

Pre-Order Today!

Do you find yourself shuffling multiple bags through the airport, on your daily commute, and at the gym before or after work?  

Do you frantically rummage through bag pockets to find your passport or empty out belongings at security checkpoints just to free your laptop from the hidden depths of your messy bag? Your struggle will soon be over. 

From your daily commute and gym session to your weekend getaway, now you can do it all with a single bag. 

The Kennedy Weekender was made especially for you.

 

 

 

 

With its sleek, minimalist design and premium hardware and leather trim, the Kennedy Weekender gives you a timeless look that transitions with you from the boarding gate to your conference room.

Its features let you slip off to a workout and come back to the office while concealing everything you need inside. 

Watch the video to see how >>>

 

 

 

Enjoy an easy-access external laptop compartment with up to 15-inch capacity, and separate pockets for electronics, work docs, keys, passport, sunglasses, and wallet. There are even separate compartments to isolate dirty clothes and mucky shoes.

Bring the luxury back to your travel plans with thoughtfully designed features built for fast-moving security lines. Access your important travel documents, like passports, boarding passes, schedules, and identification, through the convenient external document sleeve. 

 

 

The Kennedy is TSA-approved as a carry-on item, which means you can have all of your essentials for a 3-day trip with you as you fly. 

 

 

Breeze through airport security by swiftly unloading your laptop through the quick access tech compartment. 

 

 

Slide the trolley sleeve over the handle of your rolling suitcase to keep The Kennedy secure on your journey through the airport. 

 

 

 

 

 

You've put the work in. You've earned it. You're doing big things. 

It's time to make an impression. 

Sourced with High Quality Premium Materials

Made with only the highest quality materials your Kennedy Weekender will last you through all your travels.

Premium components:

  • Full-grain leather handles and trim
  • YKK Excella zippers
  • Reinforced D-rings
  • Strong padded shoulder strap

**Materials and Design Subject to Change**

 

Equipped with a Durable, Eco-Luxury Exterior 

The bag’s eco-friendly body was created from 100% recycled Nylon. It prevents rips, tears, or other damage, keeping your most valuable belongings safe and secure. 

Weighing just 3.7 lbs, the interior compartments are evenly balanced to provide maximum carrying comfort. 

 

 

Water-Resistant to Withstand Sudden Showers

Never worry about the weather. The Kennedy has a water-resistant exterior that will keep your travel necessities clean and dry for your destination. 

 

 

The body of the Kennedy Weekender is created from recycled nylon. By utilizing post-consumer plastic waste, we are acting on our commitment to sustainability and minimizing our ecological footprint without compromising our high quality construction.

 

 

“I have a strong passion for creating a product that is absolutely the highest quality and lives up to all of its marketing hype. I truly want to create a bag that our customers can use for a very long time—something that continues to look good even years down the road.”  

Harrison Bevins, Founder & CEO

Now available in two zipper color options! Backers will be able to select from two options in the post-campaign survey.

 

My itch started a little over a year ago while traveling through Southeast Asia.

At the time, I was working from home, coffee shops, or co-working spaces. A typical day would start like this:

Wake up and get ready, throw on some clothes, and pack a bag full of the day's belongings—some gym clothes, a water bottle, a laptop, and a few snacks.

I'd throw all this into a mid-sized "backpacker" backpack. I originally got it a few years prior because it was compact yet built for longer trips. However, over time I found it to be cumbersome...

 

It was too bulky yet also felt difficult to pack. The main compartment wasn't roomy enough to store clothes without shoving them in and making a mess. If I wanted to take something out, I'd have to rummage through the rest of the items, further exacerbating the chaos inside my bag.

As I progressed in both work and life, I started to take note of my professional appearance. I quickly realized that lugging around a backpack just didn't cut it anymore. I'm not knocking backpacks, but mine certainly didn't add to the "traveling professional" vibe I was going for.

This all led me down one path and...

The Oak & Rove Kennedy Weekender was born.

 

While visiting family in Los Angeles, I got the idea to create a simple yet functional bag that I could use for multiple purposes. I was inspired by the urban business environment and casual seaside hangouts. I wanted to create something that looked good but was also versatile enough to take to the gym, a bar, and an airplane.

 

A bag with thoughtful compartment placements—specific pockets for electronics, phone, tablet, and laptop. A separate shoe compartment to keep dirty separate from clean and an internal waterproof pocket for wet or sweaty clothes that needn't be mixed. 

 

I could think up dozens of useful features, but I didn't want to leave it up to just me. Through my research I found lots of people struggling with the same issues. Additionally, with all of your tremendous feedback we've further validated the need for a bag like the Kennedy Weekender. So far, I’ve invested tens of thousands of dollars of my own money to make the Kennedy Weekender a reality.

 

We’re ready to pull the trigger on mass production and need your support to make that happen. Your campaign contribution will go towards manufacturing the product. It’s as simple as that.

 

Thank you for being part of the Oak & Rove story.

 

 

Creating the most stylish and versatile weekender for the traveling professional would not have been possible without the help of a stellar design team. Jonathan Krehwinkel and Kevin Lorca were up to the task. Each brings nearly a decade of experience to the team. 

 

 

Kevin Lorca is an art director, graphic designer, and illustrator with a background in fashion design and advertising. He founded his agency Kadnezz Studio while attending Parsons The New School for Design in New York, where he completed a double BFA in Design & Communications and Men’s Couture Design. His portfolio includes creative strategy and design for international clients including Glamour, Gucci, Diesel black gold, Kenzo, Martine Leherpeur Conseil, Adidas, il makiage, Ralph lauren, Kenzza, YSL and Nike.

Jonathan Krehwinkel is a senior soft goods designer with a background in industrial/product design. He founded Studio-Jk, a soft goods design house, while attending Holon institute of Technology (HIT), where he completed his bachelor of Design. Jonathan specializes in the design and development of textile-based products and engages those with a passion for detail and quality. His work includes collaborations with emerging to established brands. 

 

 

Return Policy

Indiegogo is platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use we will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defected. However, in the event that you receive a faulty item, please contact us within 30 days for a full refund. You are welcome to contact us at support@oakandrove.com.

Warranty Details

Our Lifetime Warranty guarantees our product will be free from defects in materials and workmanship for the life of the product or 5 years. If you believe that you have a defective product that was purchased from Oak & Rove within the last five years, you may be eligible for a replacement product.

Global Shipping

We are happy to offer shipping worldwide. The shipping rate to your country will be indicated in the check-out menu when making a pledge for this campaign. Please note that the price of the item does not include additional duty and taxes that may apply as per local laws of importation.

story:
For the past 20 years I have been looking for ways to take my dog more places. I've been frustrated by the lack of options for safely securing dogs. After all, it is not always possible to hold on to a leash. Four years ago I started developing a hands-free way to take our dogs almost anywhere. We've come a long way. It's exciting to think about the many different ways that Dog Ring can bring happiness to both you and your dog! 

My experience and background ensure that I will operate a company that you will be proud to back. I have surrounded myself with some of the brightest, most capable people in the country. 

I am building a  company that you can be proud to support.


Revolution!

The Dog Ring is the easy way to safely secure your dog around trees, posts, and poles in seconds. It's lightweight, portable, and engineered to be very strong.


To Use 

Simply open the ring up, put it around the tree (post, pole), slide on the leash, click it and you're done! It gives your dog a full 360 degrees of safe, tangle-free area to roam. When you're ready to go, just open the ring, slide off the leash and you're on your way.


The Dog Ring system is great for...

  • Parks
  • Gardening
  • BBQ's 
  • Camping
  • Hiking
  • Road trips (rest areas)
  • Exercising your dog
  • Sporting events  
  • Visiting a friend
  • Keeping your dog safely in the yard
  • And anywhere else you and your dog can think of



The Ring

The Ring is made of double-thick, kink-resistant, cross-linked polyethylene piping. It will not damage trees or other objects, and is extremely strong.

Dog Ring has a unique latching system that's a joy to use. It snaps together easily with an audible 'click', letting you know the latch is set securely in place.

The Leashes

Our leashes have been specially designed for use with the Dog Ring. They slide freely 360 degrees in any direction due to the shape. The full system comes with both a 16' retractable leash and a 6' fixed leash.


Our leashes are unique and have two patents pending on them. They are unlike anything currently on the market. Most retractable leashes look the same. There are none that stand out when you go to the store. Now you will have a better option. The Dog Ring leashes are made to be high quality, beautiful, and for reliable repeated use.

 

Our Retractable leash is made strong with reinforced ABS and stainless steel. It will have a sleek overmold around the entire leash. You will feel the quality the second you use it.  Our products are solid and made to last. All leashes are made with your comfort in mind. This is the most comfortable, ergonomic grip you have ever felt. You will love the feel. As we grow we will continue to release an entire line of stylish leashes that people will quickly come to recognize at the park.


Safety

Our leashes also feature a unique patent-pending Bungee Brake system. 

With the Bungee Brake and the natural flex of the Ring, your dog will come to a safe stop at the end of the leash. Dog Ring was designed from the ground up to be safe for our dogs.

Dog Ring keeps your dog safe from tangled leashes and other dangers. The entire system is constructed of engineering grade materials, and designed for strength and repeated use. The reinforced latch ensures the Ring will not open unexpectedly or accidentally, and the Bungee Brake brings your dog to a gentle stop.


Freedom

Dog Ring gives your dog more running area than anything on the market, over 1000' sq. with our retractable model. It is an excellent addition to any dog loving home. Dog Ring is the easiest way to exercise your dog or let them stretch their legs. It's perfect for people who love going to the park and other places to spend time with their pals.

  • standard dog run             = 100' sq. ($200- $450)
  • 6' fixed leash                    = 215' sq.
  • 16' retractable leash        = 1050' sq.


Design

We've been working on Dog Ring for almost four years and have gone through many models and designs to bring you the best system possible. Dog Ring is designed to be beautiful, high-quality, affordable, and safe. You'll fall in love with it the first time you use it.

Production

We wanted to be sure our designs are perfect before investing in the costly tooling process. We have created more than 10 functional prototypes to test and refine all aspects of the system. We've selected a manufacturer in the U.S. and have assembled a talented team to realize this dream. 


Costs

Molds & Tooling  Four separate molds                                       $23,500
Minimum Order Quantity                                                             $26,500
Indiegogo/processing fees                                                          10%
Shipping of product to backers                                                   $5,000
Total                                                                                           $60,000

If We Raise More

We have designed a full line of unique, high quality products that you and your dog will love. Any money we raise above our goal will be used to bring you additional high fashion leashes, as well as design packaging and display items.


If We Raise Less

We have the hard work behind us. Any amount will be put to good use. We can do this in steps if we must, but we absolutely will get these out to you good folks one way or another. All pledge amounts are welcome and will get us closer to production. At all levels of funding we will get this done, albeit pace is directly related to the amount that is raised.


Stretch Goals

$100,000 
Able to launch full Dog Ring system pictured here plus molds and minimum order for an additional retractable leash design and one additional fixed leash design AND design packaging and display. 


$150,000
Able to launch $100,000 goal, plus one more additional retractable leash and one additional fixed leash and a full array of high quality collars and harnesses. 


$200,000
Able to launch all goals above plus full line of high quality dog products such as Dog Rings, collars, harnesses, rope toys, and specialty products including crates, carriers, safety seats, ramps, stairs, etc.


Challenges

This project has challenges to be sure. Anytime we create a new product, there are many factors that must be taken into careful consideration. My background makes me uniquely qualified to meet challenges head-on and get to the right decision quickly. 
Some of the upcoming challenges will be:


  • Packaging - Design
  • Shipping - Distribution System
  • Supply Chain Management System
  • Inventory Storage - Fulfillment Centers, Options
  • Brand Identification - Getting the Word Out 

These are all great challenges to have. With our collective experience and education, our entire team is creating a company that is for the people. As systems are put in place we will be able to fine tune the process to make it as smooth and pleasant an experience for the customer as possible. 
I have surrounded myself with some of the brightest people in the country. I will seek proper counsel before making decisions. Full transparency. We are dedicated to bringing only the best product to you and your dog.


THANK YOU

bringing only the best product to you and your dog.


THANK
YOU

story:
Once upon a time in 2009, I was attending a conference in Jeddah Chamber of Commerce (Saudi Arabia) about Earth Day. There was a speaker "Abdulla Suhaibani" talking about the harm of the plastic bags to the environment (sand, sea, human, animals .. etc)!



I felt responsible, guilty and had to do something about it! After doing research, I've created this brand {Trochet} with my partner @ReemBakheet who I met on twitter and got passionate about it!

Trochet (pronounced with a silent ‘t’ at the end and an extended ‘e’) is as much a social movement as it is a business. A fusion of two words: Trash + Crochet.


Trochet aims to:

  1. Reduce wastes of Plastic Bags.
  2. Reduce women unemployment rates.
  3. Create a marketplace of creative handmade products.


This is what we have done! 

1 | Started collecting plastic bags from different resources like landfills, and Halima was the first creative collector who has invited her group of ladies later on to start collecting as well.


2 | After collecting, we wash the plastic bags in the washing machine. Then, they got some tan and bronze (:D) to get dried and ensure its hygiene quality.


3 | The bags are sorted by colors, then sent to the cutting team who create balls of plastic threads.


4 | Finally, with the design, the balls are sent to the trocheting team who start executing the designs.


We have started with two women only and now we have around 50 women along with waiting list of those who are interested to learn and join the team.


This is exactly how we're doing it creatively, enjoy watching ;)


Three months ago, we got nominated to pitch our startup at Harvard Arab Week in Boston along with other 9 startups from Middle East & North Africa. We've made it to the first place with a high pleasure and honor.


As an award of winning Harvard, we got one month free to attend an accelerating program in San Francisco, California (USA).


In San Francisco, we had an amazing chance to launch Trochet party in Eden Gallery in from of pier 39, where we celebrated the success with around 150 visitors who spent their times trying our comfy products and fabulous inspiration.


YES :D! We had to carry the bean bag all the way to #StartupGrind stage for @DaveMcClure who simply loved it and claimed its the best one ever sat on!


NOW, its the time to have a look at the products, for you to choose your soul matching!

1. YOGA MAT 

Made out of: 300 Plastic Bags | 3 days | one woman.

2. BEAN BAG

Made out of: 1000 Plastic Bags | 20kg StyroFoam | 4 days | 2 women.

3. LAPTOP CUSHION

Made out of: 40 Plastic Bags | 2kg StyroFoam | piece of wood | 1 day | 1 woman.

4. DOOR MAT

Made out of: 70 Plastic Bags | 1 day | 1 woman.

5. STRESS BALL

Made out of: 1-2 Plastic Bags | cotton | 1 hour | 1 woman

6. UMBRELLA GARDEN

Made out of: 2000 Plastic Bags | 7 days | 1 woman.

7. BEACH BAG

Made out of: 100 Plastic Bags | 1.5 Days | 1 woman.



Now, imagine every time you buy {Trochet} products, you help in:

  1. Saving the environment form the harm of plastic bags.
  2. Create jobs for women.
  3. Create a creative products for the market!


So, would you like the story to end here? Or you will join us in our journey and help us collect the $ 10k to build an eCommerce website to give opportunity to all of you wherever you are, to buy our unique products online and ship it to you easily with passion and love?!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help!

  • You can get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • You can always use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • If you are a talented designer, you can design unique products for us!
  • If you are a crochet pattern designers, then your creatively wanted :)

** Shipment cost are added below to product prices.

** We'll do our best to send your product with your favorite color but not guaranteed.

** As its a hand made only for you, so it will take take around 10 days to reach you.

** You can always choose plain color or mixed colors.

** These are the basic colors available: pink, green, blue, yellow & white.

** You can always contact us at: Trochet@ateeq.me.

** Feel free to share, mention and tag us @trocheter.

story:
Hello! My name is Ian Gormley, and thank you for stopping by to check out our project! I have always had a passion for the arts of all styles and mediums. While I was in highschool I received my first silkscreen as a present and I created my very first t-shirt design. I gave a couple out to my friends and we instantly had people coming up to us asking where they could get one. So I started making more and more of this one basic design right out of my house until I got my very first screen printing position professionally when I was 18. With this new knowledge I was learning, I started to grow my brand and sell at local shows that my friends would play.This was all being funded by myself while trying to maintain college life and a full time job. By starting the brand so early I quickly realized a lot of mistakes I was making on the production and retail end of my business. So I began the journey to learn as much as I can about perfecting my craft and learning the other aspect behind it while in school for business. I would constantly be asked by my friends in bands or by people in the town about making shirts for them or their business, which led me to take on a full screen printing and apparel production side of the business. With this came the birth of Inkwell Apparel Production.

Why We Stand Out

As a clothing brand and a screen printer we try to bring something to the table that other places do not. As a brand we keep all of our shirts limited to ensure each customer feels like they have something that is very desired and rare. Some of our designs also have multiple colorways they can select to better suit their style. Special designs our customers can personally select the color of shirt and color of print to make it their own. On special occasions we also feature one-of-a-kind designs and garments for the most dedicated and savvy buyers. But mostly, every garment is "made to order" like a fine meal in a high end restaurant  to ensure the utmost care and detail is put into everything we produce.

  As a screen printer we try to take all customers no matter how large or small the order is, even orders that are commonly pushed aside by most shops. When we first started our brand we ran into all sorts of problems ranging from being turned down, not taken seriously, were overcharged on orders, and received poorly made shirts. At Inkwell we put the same care into every order we receive, whether its 1 piece or 1000. We provide any service one may need in the clothing industry; silk screening, custom packaging, custom hangtags, stickers, sewn in labels, printed labels, individual bagging, embroidery, stickers and other promotional items. On our website we also offer some of our customer's goods that we produce to help them grow while they help us. We try to give our customers the help that we would have wanted when we were starting as a brand, its a tough world out there.

Why We Are Here

We have come to you and IndieGoGo to assist us getting to that next step we have been building up to. Our customer demand for our screen printing department has continued to grow over the past months, and we are still taking in more and reaching out to new potential clients. We have come to the point that we cannot keep up with our current equipment and time situation to complete everything efficiently while trying to expand into other departments. With money we have saved and the money our generous backers will be providing, we will be taking our shop to the next level.

With you backing our project + money he have raised/saved we will be able to:

         - Purchase newer, higher quality equipment

         - Develop our in house opperations

         - Build a stock of blank garments

         - Bring our company into our own facility where our business can        flourish 

         - Cover all fee's that go along with indiegogo projects

         - Ensure all contributer rewards are fulfilled

         - Create a facility where customers can come in to sit with an artist to bring their idea's to life

         - We will be able to teach printing classes to the public and for students interested in fashion, art or design

 *Any money raised exceeding our original goal will be put towards a retail side to our shop where customers can come in and sit down with one of our artists, and create a truly unique, one-of-a-kind garment made just for them. Think of a tattoo shop meets screen printing shop!

 

Our Goals


If we can reach our goal of $15,000 we will be able to get all of our new equipment, and open up shop and completely fulfill all contributer perks. If we only reach a portion of our goal we will still be able to purchase some better equipment and use them in our current location (my house) until we can move into our facility, while fulfilling all perks. We have a stretch goal of $30,000 in which we can fully develop our custom cut and sew department for our brand and other brands to take advantage of. With our cut and sew department, our customers will also be able to create completely custom wadrobes for themselves, everything made by hand in the U.S.

Our Perks!

We have come up with some really cool and original products here! Everything you see as a reward is only being made specially for our backers here on IndieGoGo, some are even hand numbered and will have your name embroidered right on them. We have come up with an original t-shirt design dubbed "Making Dreams Come True", because you are not only helping us live our dream, but all the others we help out along the way. If you only have a couple of bucks, we got you covered! For you we have some really awesome wayfarer style sunglasses we made up and even some beverage koozies. For the more elite backers we have limited edition hooded sweatshirts, even real leather/wool letterman jackets! We also compiled some more unique and hands on rewards for those who like to become part of the process and dive into the arts!

    - Both Men's and Women's sizes available, shirts are fashion fit so choose accordingly.

    - If at anypoint during this project you choose a perk, but see a product from our website that you like better, we will be happy to make it for you instead!

 *Leave your size and color specifications when finalizing your checkout, we will contact you when we reach our goal to ensure you receive the exact shirt and size you want! 

 

 
Making Dreams Come True - Grey with White/ Navy
 
 
Making Dreams Come True - Black with White/ Silver
 
 
Making Dreams Come True - Turquise with White/ Navy
 
 
Inkwell Script Snap Back
 
 
Inkwell Logo Hoodie - You Choose Colors!
 
 
Inkwell Letterman Jacket with hood
 
 
Inkwell Letterman Jacket with hood (back)
 
 
Inkwell Jazzies
 
 
Inkwell Beverage Koozie
 

Our Plans After IndieGoGo

As our business grows we would like to move more into the cut and sew department of the industry and even the manufacturing process. Two things that are hard to come by in our country now are high quality American made products and good manufacturing jobs. We hope to bring these two together by eventually making all of our products in house from scratch!

 

Other Ways To Help


Even if you are unable to contribute to our project there are still plenty of ways you can help! Have Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram? Even run a fashion blog? We would love any help you could offer even if its simply talking about our project with your friends, sharing our project in your blog or facebook or twitter page! Again, thank all of you for checking us out and supporting us!

story:
First of all, where and when can I buy a Gator Strike Plate?

Great news!   The Gator Strike Plate is now available for purchase.  Just visit WWW.GATORSTRIKEPLATES.COM for a listed of online retailers.

Please email us at gatorsgrab@gmail.com if you are a retailer interested in carrying the Gator Strike Plate, or if you'd just like more information.

Why We Need the Gator Strike Plate

There are billions of doors out there and millions not latching or "clicking" properly.  The doors just push open as if no door knob was there.  Or they open or close with difficulty.  We depend on the doors in our homes and we want them to work properly.   Malfunctioning doors create headaches as children and pets get into places we don't want them, our privacy is compromised at times, and we need inside doors to lock if, heaven forbid, an intruder breaks in.

Yet door strike plates have always been very difficult to adjust in the direction we need them to.  They are fixed in position by screws as well as a chiseled recess in the frame itself.  Getting a door to latch again has involved either a time-consuming headache-inducing DIY project, or hiring a skilled handyman.

About Me & How This Process Got Started

My name is Jon Sweeten.  I am a twenty year Navy veteran and married father of three.  We have had door latch problems in every home we've lived in since 2000.   There has got to be a better solution, I've always thought.   Well, upon completing my MBA in late 2013, I decided to finally do something about it.  I used my tools and fashioned some prototype "Gator" strike plates, which successfully repaired not only my malfunctioning doors, but a few friends' as well.  

I took a few weeks and really optimized the design so that door latches swinging shut could be easily "grabbed" like a Gator in any one of the primary axes of misalignment.   I found a factory to manufacture this unique design in four common finishes, and then proceeded to the test and evaluation phase, seeking friends with malfunctioning doors, and going door-to-door at times.   The results were amazing ... every door was fixed and clicking happily again.  

I was expecting at least a couple doors to need extra work, such as wood mortise expansion.  But I found that the vast majority of malfunctioning residential doors out there just need a millimeter or two in a critical direction for latching function to be restored.  The Gator Strike Plate gives the consumer that extra space in all the key areas, so no guessing is required.  Just remove the old plate and replace with the Gator!

Not only that, but finding non-latching doors wasn't hard either, which told me that there was an enormous potential market for this product.

It is our goal to get every home, maintainer, and builder in the U.S., Canada, Mexico, and Australia (wherever this full lip strike plate design is standard) access to this simple and inexpensive solution, whether it be internet sales, retail sales, or a combination of the two.

This product is now patent pending and ready for the public.  There are currently no products like this on the market.

Lori Greiner (of the Shark Tank) recently wrote a great book, "Invent It, Sell It, Bank It!"  In it, she reveals to us her "Hero" or "Zero" checklist she uses to determine whether an invention will be a hit or not.  By our assessment, the Gator Strike Plate meets 13 of 14 criteria on her checklist.  This product could have a truly international footprint someday. 

Please visit us on our webpage at www.gatorstrikeplates.com

story:
^^^ Check Out My Video ^^^


   Civilian Style is a very unique fashion company based out of Little Rock, AR. My business is all about upcycling vintage clothing, rocking your own unique style and dressing creatively on a budget. I publish a DIY fashion blog and I also sell unique upcycled vintage and indie style clothing and accessories online at www.CivilianStyle.net

   This Indiegogo campaign is being launched to help me bring an awesome Civilian Style Mobile Boutique to Little Rock, the first of it's kind!! I plan to bring my unique clothing and accessories to the streets and sell them at our local farmers' market, food truck market and at festivals and private parties. Please consider backing this business start-up campaign, and help this crazy but super cool idea come to life. 

  

    First, I hand select used and vintage garments for their quality, color, pattern, fit and fabric. My goal is to find something cute, totally unique and wearable for everyday life. Next, I upcycle, embellish and/or have the garments professionally altered by a talented local stay-at-home-mother. I like to play with current trends and I often combine tough elements with girly garments. These pieces are flattering, one of a kind, and much better quality than most things you can buy at the mall, all for a fraction of the price. I purchase high quality vintage accessories to resell, I make some of the jewelry myself from vintage parts, and I also buy some new clothing and accessories which have a vintage inspired and indie style look. I always consider how a garment will fit and how it will be worn in everyday life. Nothing too short, too sheer, too complicated, too basic, or too common. My goal is finding clothing which is unique, flattering, and can be worn with several different outfits so you get the most for your money. Oh, and nothing I sell is over $50!!

What does Civilian Style mean?

     In high school, I was obsessed with celebrity level fashion but never had enough money to buy the things I saw in magazines (who does?!). What I did have was creativity! I would dig at thrift stores and yard sales for hours, find vintage clothing and combine it with new things or alter it to make something trendy and new. I realized this was the answer to having unique celebrity inspired style on a civilian budget. Then I was deployed with the Army during my college years. I wore a uniform every day and I missed fashion SO much. I missed my civilian style and the ability to express my individuality through clothing and accessories. That is how the idea for Civilian Style was born! 

How will the campaign funding be spent to complete the project?

   Your generous funding will go towards building materials and labor to customize the interior of the trailer which includes flooring, wall material and custom upcycled shelving. Each week during the project, I will ask backers to vote on certain parts of the interior design like paint colors, decor etc. The earlier you back the campaign, the more input you can have in the design! I will post photo updates as the project is completed so you can see it come to life! 

   Another big cost I am hoping to cover with this campaign is the design and installation of beautiful custom decals for the outside of the trailer. I have teamed up with a talented local graphic artist who will be completing 3 exterior designs that supporters can vote on after the project is fully funded. 

   In order to make the trailer a true boutique I will also need to purchase jewelry displays, hangers, bust forms and packaging supplies like tissue paper and bags. I will also have pay for your perks and shipping as well as the fees associated with the project. 

   I am setting my funding goal at a modest amount of $2000 because I really want to make this happen! Launching this innovative new business will cost much more than that of course, but this will get me rolling and I will appreciate any support you can give. Trust me, every dollar you contribute will be stretched and put to good use!

Thank you, and if you like this idea, please share it!
story_txt:
^^^ Check Out My Video ^^^





   Civilian Style is a very unique fashion company based out of Little Rock, AR. My business is all about upcycling vintage clothing, rocking your own unique style and dressing creatively on a budget. I publish a DIY fashion blog and I also sell unique upcycled vintage and indie style clothing and accessories online at www.CivilianStyle.net
   This Indiegogo campaign is being launched to help me bring an awesome Civilian Style Mobile Boutique to Little Rock, the first of it's kind!! I plan to bring my unique clothing and accessories to the streets and sell them at our local farmers' market, food truck market and at festivals and private parties. Please consider backing this business start-up campaign, and help this crazy but super cool idea come to life. 


  
    First, I hand select used and vintage garments for their quality, color, pattern, fit and fabric. My goal is to find something cute, totally unique and wearable for everyday life. Next, I upcycle, embellish and/or have the garments professionally altered by a talented local stay-at-home-mother. I like to play with current trends and I often combine tough elements with girly garments. These pieces are flattering, one of a kind, and much better quality than most things you can buy at the mall, all for a fraction of the price. I purchase high quality vintage accessories to resell, I make some of the jewelry myself from vintage parts, and I also buy some new clothing and accessories which have a vintage inspired and indie style look. I always consider how a garment will fit and how it will be worn in everyday life. Nothing too short, too sheer, too complicated, too basic, or too common. My goal is finding clothing which is unique, flattering, and can be worn with several different outfits so you get the most for your money. Oh, and nothing I sell is over $50!!
What does Civilian Style mean?
     In high school, I was obsessed with celebrity level fashion but never had enough money to buy the things I saw in magazines (who does?!). What I did have was creativity! I would dig at thrift stores and yard sales for hours, find vintage clothing and combine it with new things or alter it to make something trendy and new. I realized this was the answer to having unique celebrity inspired style on a civilian budget. Then I was deployed with the Army during my college years. I wore a uniform every day and I missed fashion SO much. I missed my civilian style and the ability to express my individuality through clothing and accessories. That is how the idea for Civilian Style was born!

   Another big cost I am hoping to cover with this campaign is the design and installation of beautiful custom decals for the outside of the trailer. I have teamed up with a talented local graphic artist who will be completing 3 exterior designs that supporters can vote on after the project is fully funded. 
   In order to make the trailer a true boutique I will also need to purchase jewelry displays, hangers, bust forms and packaging supplies like tissue paper and bags. I will also have pay for your perks and shipping as well as the fees associated with the project. 
   I am setting my funding goal at a modest amount of $2000 because I really want to make this happen! Launching this innovative new business will cost much more than that of course, but this will get me rolling and I will appreciate any support you can give. Trust me, every dollar you contribute will be stretched and put to good use!
Thank you, and if you like this idea, please share it!

story:
There is a significant deficiency of menswear to womenswear in terms of overall representation, market share, and editorial and press coverage; this is attributed to a host of variables. Two great contributors to the absence of a unified men's fashion week is that there is the lack of a focused menswear lobbyist and it is also due to the habitual trend where womenswear fashion designers colonize fashion weeks universally.

SINCE 2012, WE'VE SEEN A FEW DEDICATED MEN'S FASHION WEEKS POP UP AROUND THE WORLD – FROM LONDON TO VANCOUVER.  TO DATE, THERE IS ONLY ONE MEN'S FASHION WEEK IN THE UNITED STATES; WE CREATED IT!

I'm the President of Sophomore 24 Media, a creative consulting, events planning, and marketing strategy agency that, in 2012, created and now produces Men's Fashion Week (Los Angeles).This summer we're planning to expand into New York City to expose the platform to a larger demographic of the menswear fashion designer community.

Most people have a general idea about Fashion Week.. but before we dig deep into 'Why we're expanding into the New York market', let me briefly explain Men's Fashion Week.

We advocate for a more comprehensive vantage point of menswear in America; we're answering the QUESTION: how do we assist menswear designers with gaining exposure to a global audience?


(American Apparel Face: Michael Rowles |Control Sector | Photo By:Peter Kasabian)

The power of a fashion week is that it aggregates interest and support.  Men's Fashion Week serves the fashion community by allowing any menswear designer to benefit from resource-sharing among presenting menswear brands.  Shared resources include venue, staff, vendors, audio/visual, and production. Participating in Men's Fashion Week requires only a fraction of the resources that it would typically take a menswear designer to do a solo show.

The main objective for a designer presenting a collection during Men's Fashion Week is to gain press coverage from menswear fashion editors, trade newspapers, fashion news media, and bloggers. Centralizing the men's shows makes attending shows convenient and attractive to fashion media and press by alleviating the stress of traveling to and fro,  in and out, and across town to each designer's showcase.

For an EXAMPLE:

Producing a solo show can cost upwards of $30,000.  In our research, we have not found a proper venue in Manhattan for less than $10k/day.  That number does not include staffing, AV, communication, production, staging or any other necessities to produce a to-par runway show in New York City.  A designer can expect to spend another ten thousand dollars on audio and visual, anywhere between $5,000-$15,000 to staff the event, another $5,000-$15,000 on back-house, seating, staging, and the list goes on..

 

This development of "Men's Fashion Week" into New York City is key for many reasons. 

PRIMARILY, NEW YORK CITY IS A MARKET WHERE WE SEE THE LARGEST BANDWIDTH TO SUPPORT OUR GOAL: TO GAIN UNIVERSAL RECOGNITION FOR AMERICAN MENSWEAR FASHION DESIGNERS.

There are more than twice as many the fashion designers in New York City as there are in The Greater Los Angeles area according to the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

Further data supports that most fashion editorial jobs are held in NYC; this includes fashion writers, journalists, editors, bloggers, photographers, and other multi-media agents.  Without taking up too much of your time analyzing and presenting demographic data, trust that most any search engine query (and some general knowledge of the industry) will corroborate that New York City is one of the best environments for this platform. 

NEW YORK CITY LENDS TO SUSTAINABLE GROWTH FOR A GLOBALLY RECOGNIZED WEEK; WE CONTINUE TO NOTICE TRENDING IMPROVEMENTS TO ITS MENSWEAR ECOSYSTEM.

This platform in NYC will have optimum national and global visibility, a virtue to which most any American menswear fashion designer can benefit. 

In New York City, a fashion designer's showcase can more easily be seen by national (and international) fashion publications, like WWD's Men's Week and  Karmaloop TV; coverage on these media outlets or a write-up in a nationally renown menswear publications such as this can immediately translate into increased demand and revenue for any brand coupled with better brand positioning overall.  Below is a diagram with a detail of fashion designer jobs as mentioned above.

 

 

And it's not just that NYC will be the best avenue for a sustainable men's week, but our platform allow for a lot more flexibility than others nationwide.  We fuse together runway shows and trade show vehicles to provide optimum media exposure and B2B opportunities for the menswear community.

The platform includes not only fashion shows, but fashion installations, pop-up showrooms (B2B), buyer previews, and much more.  

During intermission, all guests can enjoy amenities such as the Style Lounge and a Grooming Lounge.  We wanted to create an environment that is non-esoteric.  Some of our celebrity friends, honestly, do not like to be alone in a room, isolated from other humans!  Instead of a Green Room, we have several areas where attendees can pamper themselves, network, or just kick back and learn a few things.

 

THE STYLE LOUNGE IS A PRINCIPAL AMENITY AT MEN'S FASHION WEEK.
This past season, celebrity stylists taught guests 'How to Tie a Bow Tie' and gave a few tips for 'Packing for the Mile High Club'.  


We really try to speak to a men's week that is conscientious about creating an immersive and interactive experience for our clients and their guests.  In addition to working with stylists, we work together with local and nation-wide companies to ensure that we're offering the best possible experience for menswear designers that showcase.

ADJACENT TO THE STYLE LOUNGE WAS ANOTHER STAPLE AMENITY: THE GROOMING LOUNGE. 

 This season, we teamed up with the Blind Barber. Guests enjoyed complimentary haircuts, trims, and shaves either on their way in, out, or in between shows.  And there were many other surprises on site. 


 


 

Okay, let's talk about what we need the money for and what we're planning to do once we're fully funded. 


The overall goal is to bring this platform to New York City.  Once we are fully funded, we are going to roll out Men's Fashion Week in the Big Apple early summer 2014.

The below spreadsheet is based on a 3-day model using quotes from NYC vendors combined with previous budgets.  Within two or three seasons, we plan to launch a full week of menswear designers.

Men’s Fashion Week will be held in New York on the Men’s Fashion Calendar.  The venue is about $35,000 for 3 days.  We’re planning to put about $20,000 into marketing, promotions, and advertising; this will include nourishing partnerships within the blogosphere, advertising with online fashion publications, and others.  Audio, visual, staging, seating, staffing, fixtures, and  equipment, front house, back house, production will run us about $50,000 for the Week.

If we do not reach our entire goal, then we will move forward with Men’s Fashion Week in Los Angeles as scheduled.  Hopefully, we'll hit our goal because New York needs an opportunity to use the platform.  There are so many brands, venues, spread throughout the city during fashion week;  we are offering a solution that we hope will benefit the community and contribute to the overall growth of the fashion community, cultural landscape, and the national economy.


WE'D LOVE TO CONNECT WITH EACH AND EVERY ONE OF YOU! 

HERE ARE A FEW OTHER WAYS THAT WE CAN WORK TOGETHER AND STAY CONNECTED!


MUSCIANS, DJs, BANDS, we’d love it if you could volunteer your time to spin, play, or perform for the event - either for a designer, or a kick-off festivity, or during fashion week to keep the energy levels up; it's an 8 hour work day for most of the guests attending MFW.

NYC-LOCAL STAGING OR INTERIOR DESIGN COMPANIES, we’d love to work together to design the space, rent, or hopefully borrow furniture and fixtures to make an awesome environment for MFW.  This includes creating seating options.

IN-KIND SPONSORS: LIGHTING, AUDIO, VISUAL, we’d love to discuss opportunities to work together.

SOCIAL MEDIA GURUS, FASHION PHOTOGRAPHERS/VIDEOGRAPHERS and BLOGGERS – We’d love it if you could work together with us to help spread the word using your social media talents. 

VOLUNTEERS/INTERNS:  Email careers@mensfwla.com if you're interested in becoming brand ambassadors in the NY area or if you just want to help out by putting some of your hobbies, skills, and interest to use on towards a rewarding initiative. 

ARTISTS, BUILDERS, CREATIVES: We would love your help towards constructing a cool backdrop for the menswear brands.  Let's work together towards building a nice landscape using innovative, next level multi-media, and contemporary art concepts for Men's Fashion Week New York!

Instagram: @mensfashionweek 

Twitter: @mensfwny (NEW!) Help us build the buzz!

LA Twitter: @mensfwla

 

[PRESS CLIPPINGS]


 

Los Angeles Time Clipping


California Apparel News



LA Canvas



Examiner

story:
It’s no secret that your baby’s feet grow quickly during their first two years. KINBE has developed an innovative, yet chic moccasin that cuts the number of baby shoes you purchase in half. Made in the USA with 100% genuine leather, Kinbe Moccs offer babies and parents a fun, stylish and practical alternative to regular baby shoes.

Still not convinced? A portion of all KINBE Kids proceeds (including this Indiegogo campaign) will go toward helping create loving homes for children without one. We have partnered with a non-profit organization whose mission is to rescue and love orphaned children in Guatemala. Meeting physical needs is important but without love children cannot thrive. Part of the shoes profits will go toward funding family style homes for these children.

KINBE is a lifestyle children's brand whose goal is to inspire and nurture the next generation one child at a time. Our hope is to create products that spread love to children around the world.

At KINBE Kids, we offer nothing but the best products for parents and their babies. Our KINBE Moccs are sure to be a hit with your baby and easy on your wallet.








Idea girl and founder of KINBE, Amber Cruse is a Midwest mama living in Los Angeles making memories with her dino-roaring boy. Before founding KINBE, Amber was a creative director and lifestyle photographer.

Amber started KINBE with a passion to give back to the world in a more meaningful way. Her hope through KINBE is to build a brighter future for as many children as possible. She believes the most important gift you can give your child is being a whole, happy person.

When she is not busy running her company, Amber can be found at the skatepark learning a few tricks from her son, swooshing down waterslides and enjoying the SoCal sun.


Our Purpose: With great courage, integrity and love - we embrace our responsibility to leave this planet a better place for the future generations and inspire others to follow in our footsteps.

Our Legacy: Our goal at KINBE is to share the same love you have for your family with children around the world. All children need love and nurturing to thrive. When you support KINBE, 25% of profits go to helping create loving homes for children without one. We are working with an orphanage in Guatemala that builds family-style housing for orphans. Most of these children will never be adopted, but with the family-style housing, they are raised in a loving home instead of living in a dormitory-style orphanage with little sense of family. We support training these families on parenting and child development, so that they can provide the best love and support for these children.

story:
This hoodie is ...

1) Made from premium fabric. We use the highest quality 420 gram cotton fleece and premium rip. It's designed to keep you warm and withstand the toughest wear.

2) Backed by a 25 year guarantee. We're so confident that your Quarter Century Hoodie will be the most durable jacket you've ever had that we are backing them up with a 25 year guarantee.

3) For men and women. The hoodie comes in sizes XS - XXL for both men and women. We will contact you at the end of the campaign to collect your size and color preferences.

4) Made in America. The best quality comes when you make things in your own backyard. We work with production facilities that pay proper attention to fabric, people and processes right here in America.

5) Sold wholesale. By offering our jackets directly via IndieGoGo, we are able to cut out the retail channel and offer you a hoodie that would usually retail for $180 at only $89.

Our journey started almost two years ago when we took a radically new approach of looking at denim. It's the passion for quality clothes that led us on a mission to design the perfect jeans and later the Quarter Century Jacket. Now, we are back and excited to finally reveal theThe Quarter Century Hoodie.

How does the hoodie last so long?

The Quarter Century Hoodie is made from premium US made 420 gram fleece. Fleece this heavy differs from your standard fleece in that the threads in the former are stronger and more tightly woven. The hoodie is then constructed right here in America and finished with military grade hardware. The result: the best fitting, most durable hoodie on the planet.

We set out to design a timeless and stylish everyday hoodie. The Quarter Century Hoodie redefines style by presenting itself in a simple and modern construction:

 Our Quarter Century Hoodie includes the following features:

  • Sophisticated design (modern classic)
  • Heavy duty cotton fleece (420 gram)
  • Flatlock stitching
  • Integrated headphone jack
  • Ventilated armpit opening
  • Double lined hood
  • Security pockets (both sides)
  • Military grade copper zipper
  • Double tacked on all stress points

We are launching our Quarter Century Hoodie in four colors: navy, charcoal, red and black. Let us know if you are looking for additional colors. We'd love to hear from you!

Every hoodie comes in size XS-XXL for both men & women in our signature Quarter Century fabric and fit. We will confirm your preferences at the completion of the IndieGoGo. You can review our fit guide here:

We are offering The Quarter Century Hoodie at wholesale. No retail markups. No distribution markups. By selling to you directly we can maintain the highest quality and construction while offering a fair price point.

For our early supporters, we are offering a IndieGoG wholesale price at $89. Click on the rewards to see all details.

The Quarter Century Jacket is 100% made in the USA. We use the highest quality fabrics and very best construction.

Our premium fleece, heavyweight ribbing, drawstrings, metal hardware and construction is done right here in Los Angeles, CA. 

We've made this hoodie to last a lifetime and are guaranteeing that it is of the highest quality possible, but if anything happens to them we'll repair them free of charge. Send them back to us and we'll fix them!

Note: We are currently setting up our next production run and expect to start shipping all new pledges during the month of December, 2016. Thank you for your patience!

1) Made from premium fabric. We use the highest quality 420 gram cotton fleece and premium rip. It's designed to keep you warm and withstand the toughest wear.
2) Backed by a 25 year guarantee. We're so confident that your Quarter Century Hoodie will be the most durable jacket you've ever had that we are backing them up with a 25 year guarantee.
3) For men and women. The hoodie comes in sizes XS - XXL for both men and women. We will contact you at the end of the campaign to collect your size and color preferences.
4) Made in America. The best quality comes when you make things in your own backyard. We work with production facilities that pay proper attention to fabric, people and processes right here in America.
5) Sold wholesale. By offering our jackets directly via IndieGoGo, we are able to cut out the retail channel and offer you a hoodie that would usually retail for $180 at only $89.



Our journey started almost two years ago when we took a radically new approach of looking at denim. It's the passion for quality clothes that led us on a mission to design the perfect jeans and later the Quarter Century Jacket. Now, we are back and excited to finally reveal theThe Quarter Century Hoodie.
How does the hoodie last so long?
The Quarter Century Hoodie is made from premium US made 420 gram fleece. Fleece this heavy differs from your standard fleece in that the threads in the former are stronger and more tightly woven. The hoodie is then constructed right here in America and finished with military grade hardware. The result: the best fitting, most durable hoodie on the planet.


We set out to design a timeless and stylish everyday hoodie. The Quarter Century Hoodie redefines style by presenting itself in a simple and modern construction:




 Our Quarter Century Hoodie includes the following features:

Sophisticated design (modern classic)
Heavy duty cotton fleece (420 gram)
Flatlock stitching
Integrated headphone jack
Ventilated armpit opening
Double lined hood
Security pockets (both sides)
Military grade copper zipper
Double tacked on all stress points



We are launching our Quarter Century Hoodie in four colors: navy, charcoal, red and black. Let us know if you are looking for additional colors. We'd love to hear from you!

Every hoodie comes in size XS-XXL for both men & women in our signature Quarter Century fabric and fit. We will confirm your preferences at the completion of the IndieGoGo. You can review our fit guide here:



We are offering The Quarter Century Hoodie at wholesale. No retail markups. No distribution markups. By selling to you directly we can maintain the highest quality and construction while offering a fair price point.

For our early supporters, we are offering a IndieGoG wholesale price at $89. Click on the rewards to see all details.

 

The Quarter Century Jacket is 100% made in the USA. We use the highest quality fabrics and very best construction.

Our premium fleece, heavyweight ribbing, drawstrings, metal hardware and construction is done right here in Los Angeles, CA. 

We've made this hoodie to last a lifetime and are guaranteeing that it is of the highest quality possible, but if anything happens to them we'll repair them free of charge. Send them back to us and we'll fix them!

story:
Venezuela has always stood out for its beautiful beaches, perfect weather, hardworking people and gorgeous women. But this year Venezuela, the country with the largest proven oil reserves in the world, is basically a failed state where young people finds almost imposible to build a decent future.

Due to social inequality in Venezuela, many women have found difficult the access to new products of all kinds. We are building an eco­friendly marketplace that allows them to shop and sell second­hand indumentary.

The clothes that people don't use are accumulated or thrown away, because in Venezuela doesn't ­exist a recycling/reusing culture nor shopping or selling second­hand articles.

Closettine seeks to be the platform in which venezuelan women can give better use to everything they do not wear in their closets, considering their real value while saving money and generating an income in an unconventional market like the venezuelan market.

We look forward to have a considerable impact on recycling issues in Venezuela. None of our competitors work simultaneously in the economic, social and ecological sector. Our business does not pursue to be the best in the world, but the best for the world.

Venezuela is going trough a severe crisis and it is pretty difficult to obtain venture capital, our goal is to raise 5000$ to boost the process in three ways:

  • Improve the user experience and increase positive comments on the page by 7% by organizing a meet and greet (AUG2017) where shoppers will be able to try Closettinas clothes.
  • Increase visitor traffic by 10% (SEP2017) through a social media campaign that explains the dynamics of the portal and includes discount promos.
  • Maintain the operations for the rest of 2017

In Venezuela 70% of people earn less than a dollar per day, our economy is so diminish that any contribution is essential to us, no matter if you think is little, we will use it wisely to make the most of it. 
 

Si quieres ver un video en español de lo que es CLOSETTINE, haz click en el siguiente link:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PaXGLiX2I9M

story:
The Movement

Every​​ ​​child​​ ​​has​​ ​​a​​ ​​dream.​​ ​​Every​​ ​​professional​​ ​​athlete,​​ ​​artist,​​ ​​and​​ ​​musician​​ ​​started somewhere.​​ ​​But​​ ​​for​​ ​​some​​ ​​parents,​​ ​​the​​ ​​cost​​ ​​is​​ ​​too​​ ​​high​​ ​​to​​ ​​put​​ ​​their​​ ​​kids​​ ​​in​​ ​​programs​​ ​​that would​​ ​​help​​ ​​them​​ ​​reach​​ ​​their​​ ​​full​​ ​​potential.​​ ​​After​​ ​​school​​ ​​programs​​ ​​are​​ ​​expensive,​​ ​​and unfortunately​​ ​​thousands​​ ​​of​​ ​​families​​ ​​around​​ ​​the​​ ​​country​​ ​​don’t​​ ​​have​​ ​​the​​ ​​resources​​ ​​to​​ ​​put their​​ ​​kids​​ ​​through​​ ​​these​​ ​​programs.

ReCreation​​ ​​is​​ ​​a​​ ​​clothing​​ ​​brand​​ ​​with​​ ​​a​​ ​​purpose.​​ ​​We​​ ​​will​​ ​​give​​ ​​a​​ ​​portion​​ ​​of​​ ​​the​​ ​​proceeds​​ ​​to help​​ ​​fund​​ ​​after-school​​ ​​programs​​ ​​for​​ ​​underprivileged​​ ​​kids.​ ​Profits​ ​will​ ​go​ ​to​ ​programs, courses,​ ​classes,​ ​sports​ ​equipment,​ ​art​ ​supplies,​ ​instruments,​ ​and​ ​all​ ​other​ ​necessities for​ ​underprivileged​ ​children.

Partners & Fund Raising

 

We are lucky to be working with some amazing organizations, to help raise money for their scholarship programs. Our first campaign will help fund,The Kids Art School, Drawn 2 Art, Bright Artists. And thanks to all of the children and families that participated in the first art competition. And a special thanks to the winner's of the competition, Lana L. and Gemma L. for their works of art.  

http://www.brightartist.org

Up In The Sky 

by 

Lana L. 

                    

Quadrupling Panda's

by 

Gemma L.

                   

 

Motivated​ ​and​ ​inspired​ ​children​ ​are​ ​happy​ ​children.​ ​With​ ​your​ ​contribution​ ​and​ ​support, ReCreation​ ​will​ ​fully​ ​develop​ ​the​ ​brand​ ​and​ ​produce​ ​goods​ ​and​ ​products​ ​to​ ​be​ ​sold​ ​in retail.


Short Summary

My​ ​name​ ​is​ ​Bret​ ​Young​ ​-​ ​I​ ​am​ ​a​ ​fashion​ ​designer​ ​and​ ​consultant​ ​by​ ​day.​ ​Most importantly,​ ​however,​ ​I​ ​am​ ​the​ ​father​ ​of​ ​three​ ​amazing​ ​children.​ ​I​ ​know​ ​first​ ​hand​ ​how difficult​ ​it​ ​is​ ​to​ ​raise​ ​children​ ​while​ ​giving​ ​them​ ​all​ ​the​ ​opportunities​ ​they​ ​need​ ​to​ ​thrive and​ ​excel​ ​outside​ ​of​ ​the​ ​classroom.

In​ ​today’s​ ​world,​ ​too​ ​many​ ​kids​ ​do​ ​not​ ​get​ ​the​ ​opportunities​ ​they​ ​deserve​ ​to​ ​explore​ ​their true​ ​passions.​ ​Many​ ​extremely​ ​talented​ ​and​ ​gifted​ ​children​ ​miss​ ​out​ ​on​ ​their​ ​chance​ ​to enhance​ ​their​ ​capabilities​ ​due​ ​to​ ​their​ ​lack​ ​of​ ​resources.

ReCreation​ ​wants​ ​to​ ​be​ ​the​ ​change,​ ​and​ ​help​ ​as​ ​many​ ​underprivileged​ ​children​ ​as possible.​ ​I​ ​want​ ​to​ ​give​ ​them​ ​the​ ​chance​ ​that​ ​they​ ​deserve​ ​to​ ​shine.​ ​Through​ ​this campaign,​ ​the​ ​ReCreation​ ​brand​ ​will​ ​help​ ​build​ ​a​ ​better​ ​future​ ​for​ ​our​ ​children.​ ​Let’s inspire​ ​more​ ​children​ ​to​ ​follow​ ​their​ ​dreams!

 

 

The​ ​Recreation​ ​team​ ​is raising $5,000​ ​to​ ​begin​ ​production​ ​on​ ​the​ ​first​ ​collection to​ ​be​ ​sold​ ​online​ ​and​ ​at​ ​retail.​ ​With​ ​this​ ​money,​ ​we​ ​will​ ​also​ ​be​ ​able​ ​to​ ​fulfill​ ​contributor perks!​ ​After​ ​that,​ ​50%​ ​of​ ​the​ ​remaining​ ​funds​ ​will​ ​be​ ​given​ ​to​ ​our​ ​first​ ​charity​ ​project.

As​ ​a​ ​contributor,​ ​you​ ​will​ ​receive​ ​the​ ​first​ ​production​ ​of​ ​the​ ​ReCreation​ ​brand’s art contest​ ​product! YOU​ ​will​ ​launch​ ​the​ ​movement​ ​-​ ​the​ ​movement​ ​of​ ​educating,​ ​inspiring,​ ​and​ ​building​ ​a greater​ ​future​ ​for​ ​our​ ​society.

Risk's & Challenges

We've put together a strong supply chain, from the materials suppliers to manufacturers to shipping and fulfillment partners, and have full confidence that we can deliver product you’ll be proud to own for years to come.

Once our campaign is completed and funded, we are ready to go straight into purchasing all the materials from our suppliers and then into production with our manufacturer. We will keep our backers updated throughout the process of the campaign and production to ensure that we deliver on time.

A note on delivery date: As with any manufactured good, delays can happen -- a typhoon can hit, or a pallet can get stuck in a shipyard. We’ve padded our schedule to accommodate some changes, but will let our backers know immediately if we foresee any updates to the timeline for delivery.

Satisfaction Guaranteed

We are so confident you’ll love our product and cause that we guarantee it! When you receive your perk, if you’re not 100% satisfied with the design or quality simply send it back for a full refund of the purchase price (Shipping and handling fees are non-refundable). We’re pretty sure you’ll be more excited to show or wear your support than return it though!

Meet The Team

 

Bret A. Young

CEO / Creator

 

                                                                                     

Chase J. Carnahan

Writer / Director

 

 

Royal T. Binion

Photographer

 

 

Michael Perlmutter

Digital Content
