story:
Wooden Pins for Non-Profits

 

The Brave Wimp - Thank You!

We sincerely appreciate you becoming a part our journey and supporting us!

 

 

Flint Water Bottles - Flint Child Health & Development Fund: Foundation for Flint

“Aiding children with interventions that support positive health outcomes for Flint children, including: crisis response, optimal child health & development, early education, continuous access to a pediatric medical home, access to infant & child behavioral health services, nutrition education, healthy food access, safe & healthy home environments, integrated social services, and research.”

 

 

Meals - Meals on Wheels America 

“For millions of Americans, Meals on Wheels is literally the difference between remaining in their own homes and needing to relocate to a nursing facility. The nutritious meal, friendly visit and safety check help them cope with three of the biggest threats of aging: hunger, isolation and loss of independence. Research proves that when seniors have the right support, they gain greater quality of life, need fewer hospital stays and live longer.”

 

 

Pussy - Planned Parenthood Federation of America

“Planned Parenthood is a trusted health care provider, an informed educator, a passionate advocate, and a global partner helping similar organizations around the world. Planned Parenthood delivers vital reproductive health care, sex education, and information to millions of women, men, and young people worldwide.”

 

 

Resist/She Persisted - She Should Run

‘She Should Run provides the spark for women’s political careers by inspiring more women to consider public office. She Should Run provides a community that encourages women to run and then connects women with resources, people and organizations who can help start their path towards public service. Unique among other traditional organizations that recruit specific women for specific seats, She Should Run’s goal is to expand the community of women considering public service as a leadership path.’

 

 

Free the Nipples - Affirmations

Affirmations provides a welcoming space where people of all sexual orientations, gender identities & expressions, and cultures can find support and unconditional acceptance, and where they can learn, grow, socialize and feel safe! Affirmations is located in the heart of Ferndale, at the Northern Border of Detroit.

 

Cheeto Voodoo - You Pick! 

We ask you use the Cheeto Voodoo Pin for good and not evil; please choose 1 of the 5 organizations to donate to.

 

Mystery Pack - 1 of Each

You will receive 1 random pin from each pack at a special discounted price.

 

 

Gotta Get ‘Em All - ALL WOODEN PINS

You will receive both The Brave Wimp pins, the Flint Water Water Bottle pack, the Meals pack (including both milk cartons), the Pussy pack, Resist and Persist (both red & blue), Free the Nipples pack, and Cheeto Voodoo at a special discounted price!

story:
Sigma Clothing Company

We notice every day that people want to buy game related clothing. However, most people have an issue, it doesn't look fashionable or it’s just too geeky to wear in public! So Sigma aims to offer fashionable geek clothing but also to strengthen the brand while at the same time selling original designs too!

Our website already has several designs online to preview with more ready to be as soon asthis campaign is complete. www.sigmaclothing.co.uk

We have the printer and the Heat press ready for sublimation printing, all we need is the Ink and the Tees! Help us reach this goal and receive limited rewards only to donators!

What We Need 

We need exactly £500 to purchase the supplies and fulfil the rewards we are offering.

100 Sheets of Sublimation Paper £25

4Ltrs InkTec SUBLINOVA SMART Professional Sublimation Ink £315

CISS System £40

Tee Shirts £50

Reward Fulfilment £70

Rewards

£10 Sigma Pocket Tee and Sticker Set

 

£20 Sigma Crest Tee and Sticker Set

 

£30 Sigma Tee + Lanyard and Sticker Set

 

£40 Comic Book Mountains and Forest Tees

£50 Limited Edition Donator Only Tee + Sigma Tee Bundle

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Sometimes you cannot donate, we understand that but please help us out just by sharing the link and help us reach our goal even if you can’t find the money to donate!

Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/sigmaclothing

Like us on Facebook: www.fb.com/sigmaclothingstore

Share Our Site: www.sigmaclothing.co.uk

Thank you for your time!

story:
Gigi's in a Pageant! 

I travel, I dance, I maintain a healthy lifestyle but what is most important to me is providinig others the necessary tools to inspire creativity, health and happiness. 

  • I am blessed to have traveled the world to: Spain, México, Brazil, Colombia, Puerto Rico, Haiti, Holland and Italy. I hold Business and Spanish degree from the University of San Diego, and I am an active model, athlete, dancer and martial artist.  But it's been difficult getting where I am today. I thank my hard working single mom for always pushing me to work hard and get nothing but A's in school. This is for her and I want to make her proud. Hi Mom!
  • The 2nd annual Miss Latina Global pageant will take place Saturday, August 10th at the Downey Civic Theatre. Miss Latina Global and Miss Teen Latina Global provides a unique opportunity for young latinas to represent their countries with honor and respect in the hopes of bearing the title. 
  • I decided to enter this pageant to bring awareness to the causes I am passionate about such as the Homeless World Cup, women's issues and more. 

What I Need & Cool Stuff You Get!

I have many expenses to compete in the pageant (including driving to and from Orange County and Los Angeles) and I have calculated them here:

  • Pageant fees: $300

  • Hair & Makeup Artist for shoots and show: $2,000

  • Photography Fees: $2,000

  • Evening Gown: $200

  • National Costume: $300

  • Cocktail dress: $100

  • Official Pageant Shoes: $100

  • Travel Expenses (gas, food, etc.): $1,000

  • Tickets to sell: $1,000

Check out the cool perks you get when you sponsor me! >>>>> 

The Impact

Your funds go to pay for my fees to participate in the pageant, which will ultimately draw more attention to the work that I do and the causes in which I believe.

  • When sponsoring me, you are not only helping me compete in this pageant, you are helping me help women create their own business and feed their families. My goal is to shed light on social and global issues and create my own leadership organization for women. This organization will do the necessary research to provide education, resources and support for women that will spark their creativity in becoming entrepreneurs.
  • I have already begun this work; meeting and interviewing strong and influential women entrepreneurs from around the world has inspired to create a video blog segment where I will feature local business owners. I can only hope I may one day be as influential to other women as they have been to me.
  • I have also raised money for the Homeless World Cup which is an international soccer tournament changing the lives of former homeless men, women and youth. I wish to continue my work in non-profit and help change many lives. 

Can't contribute but want to help?

I understand some people will not be able contribute financially, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please help me get the word out and make some noise for G!
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools, share it on Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, etc. 
  • If you are in the Los Angeles area and cannot contribute financially, you can help me by suggesting and/or donating hair, make-up, and  photography services, or dresses and accessories that I need for the pageant.  

I am extremely grateful for your time. Thank you and I'll see YOU on the dance floor. 

G
story_txt:
Gigi's in a Pageant! 
I travel, I dance, I maintain a healthy lifestyle but what is most important to me is providinig others the necessary tools to inspire creativity, health and happiness. 

I am blessed to have traveled the world to: Spain, México, Brazil, Colombia, Puerto Rico, Haiti, Holland and Italy. I hold Business and Spanish degree from the University of San Diego, and I am an active model, athlete, dancer and martial artist.  But it's been difficult getting where I am today. I thank my hard working single mom for always pushing me to work hard and get nothing but A's in school. This is for her and I want to make her proud. Hi Mom!

The 2nd annual Miss Latina Global pageant will take place Saturday, August 10th at the Downey Civic Theatre. Miss Latina Global and Miss Teen Latina Global provides a unique opportunity for young latinas to represent their countries with honor and respect in the hopes of bearing the title. 
I decided to enter this pageant to bring awareness to the causes I am passionate about such as the Homeless World Cup, women's issues and more. 



What I Need & Cool Stuff You Get!
I have many expenses to compete in the pageant (including driving to and from Orange County and Los Angeles) and I have calculated them here:


Pageant fees: $300


Hair & Makeup Artist for shoots and show: $2,000


Photography Fees: $2,000


Evening Gown: $200


National Costume: $300


Cocktail dress: $100


Official Pageant Shoes: $100


Travel Expenses (gas, food, etc.): $1,000

Tickets to sell: $1,000

Check out the cool perks you get when you sponsor me! >>>>> 


The Impact
Your funds go to pay for my fees to participate in the pageant, which will ultimately draw more attention to the work that I do and the causes in which I believe.

When sponsoring me, you are not only helping me compete in this pageant, you are helping me help women create their own business and feed their families. My goal is to shed light on social and global issues and create my own leadership organization for women. This organization will do the necessary research to provide education, resources and support for women that will spark their creativity in becoming entrepreneurs.
I have already begun this work; meeting and interviewing strong and influential women entrepreneurs from around the world has inspired to create a video blog segment where I will feature local business owners. I can only hope I may one day be as influential to other women as they have been to me.

I have also raised money for the Homeless World Cup which is an international soccer tournament changing the lives of former homeless men, women and youth. I wish to continue my work in non-profit and help change many lives. 



Can't contribute but want to help?
I understand some people will not be able contribute financially, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Please help me get the word out and make some noise for G!
You can use the Indiegogo share tools, share it on Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, etc. 
If you are in the Los Angeles area and cannot contribute financially, you can help me by suggesting and/or donating hair, make-up, and  photography services, or dresses and accessories that I need for the pageant.  


I am extremely grateful for your time. Thank you and I'll see YOU on the dance floor. 
G

story:
My name is Mark Nickens founder and creative director of General Public Supply Co.

General Public Supply Co. is a hat accessories line for men with heavy influences from today's pop culture and the surf and skate lifestyle. We released our first five panel hat in May 2012 and have since grown our fan base and our overall goals for our line.

We are very eager to continue expanding the brand, and to do that we need to add new items to our collection for Winter'12. General Public supply Co. creates innovative, bright and bold styles for the fashion-forward man and we are turning to you for your help to launch our first full line of hats to the general public.

Pledges

Your funds will allow us to bring an array of exciting designs to life. We need to raise ($1500) in order to purchase sample fabrics, order sample hats, and send them to production. By pledging at our lowest level can help turn our designs on paper, into a fully produced line by (Nov '12). With your pledge of $50 OR MORE, you will secure yourself two limited edition, General Public Supply Co. caps, plus other exciting extras. We will only be producing (125) of this limited edition hats, so make your contribution today to secure your very own. 

Goal

Our goal is to raise $1500, Any additional funds raised beyond our goal will be dedicated to making more caps, that will be available on our site. If we can meet our pledge we can make extra item  we will email everyone letting them know when we will start shipping out all of the ordered hats by. That's pretty much it! Thank you very much for your help.

Perks

Gold Pack - $50

You can pick any TWO Caps + Stickers.

(Value $90) 

Platinum Pack - $70 and above

You get All Three Caps + Stickers

(Value $135)

Diamond Pack- $110

You get All Three Caps + Two Watch Caps + Stickers

(Value $175)

 

*ALL CAPS WILL BE UNIQUE DUE TO THEY ARE CUT FROM THE SAME FABRIC.

*Watch Caps: We send two random colors only with the Diamond Pack

Please Visit our site to see some of our past caps. www.GeneralPublicSupply.com

story:
Hi everybody,

As a minimalist I like to carry as little burden as possible, so I designed the IN1 wallet to take with me only the essentials. But sometimes you need more than just credit cards or other cards, we often need to use some cash.

 

 

 

Carry Crads, Cash, Keys and, more

The IN1 wallet has a space for cards, but it is also equipped with one spacious pocket that you can use for carrying cash, a receipt or whatever you need.

 

 

Ultra-Slim and Flexible

Because of its size (8,5 cms x 6,0 cms) and flexibility, the IN1 Wallet is very comfortable and you will not feel it in your pocket. You can even use it with tight clothes and your pocket will not look bulky.

 

 

 

It can also be used as a key chain due to the removable key-ring.

 

 

 

Safety

You can feel safe using the IN1 Wallet in non-deep-pockets by connecting a strap between the tab and your belt or belt loops on your trousers. You will make it less likely accidental loss, and it will be easier to reach your wallet in deep pockets.

 

 

Carefully selected materials

Made from high quality elastic, this wallet lets you carry as many cards as you need without the risk of losing them, even if it only takes a single card.

 

 

 

Designed for those who want to simplify their lives

Attractive minimalist design, slim, smooth and functional are some of the characteristics that make the IN1 Wallet the ideal accessory for both men and ladies.

 

 

Various colors for your choice

 

Available in 8 colors: orange, sky-blue, blue, green, yellow, Red, orange, white and black.

 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

8 Reasons why the IN1 wallet is perfect for you.

1.It is ultra slim: it’s only 3 mm thick.

2.It is small: It is as big as a credit card.

3.It’s super flexible: you can use it in tight clothes and nobody will see it.

4.It is smooth: rigid metal wallets might scratch and damage your credit cards, but as the in1wallet is made of soft material it assures your cards will be safe.

5.It is elastic: you can take as many cards as you want without them slipping out.

6.It allows you to carry the essential… and all what you need: Cards are not always enough, we also need some cash.

7.It is easy to use and very comfortable in the hand and the pocket.

8.You can choose from eight different colors.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for supporting this project!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Risk and Challenges

The main challenge will be to reach as many people as possible and to get a big number of backers for this project to succeed. This will be a real challenge because is plenty of good projects and innovative ideas out there.

   There is always the possibility of facing unexpected minor problems; to minimize these risks, I personally will be responsible for supervising the production of the wallets as soon as the goal is reached and shipping all of the pledge rewards. I'll make sure the quality standards will be maintained.

   The sooner we get funded, the earlier we can start production and consequently the IN1 Wallets will be shipped in a shorter time.

   We plan to start shipping our products around late march.

story:
Well, you have no doubt been hearing about this upcoming event in August of 2012, the Boston Tee Party & Design/Artist Expo. I wanted to update you a bit on the event because many of you have been asking questions about it.

What is it?

This event is a way for indie brands, artists and designers to come together to showcase their work while networking and meeting peers, retailers and customers.

When is it?

August 11th, 2012.

Speakers - 12pm-3pm

Expo/Bands - 4pm-8pm

Where is it?

The event will be held at the Carson Place Facility at the Boston Teacher's Union Hall. The address is 180 Mt Vernon Street, Dorchester MA 02125. Their website is: Boston Teacher's Union Hall

How much space will vendors have?

Each vendor will have a space of 8 feet (wide) by 9 feet (deep), with a foot of empty space on either side of you, making the entire space 10x9. There are tables available, but you are urged to bring your own table if you can, as there are only 24 tables available (no longer than 8 feet long).

Please let me know if you need a table. First come, first served. Tables are going FAST!

What's the cost?

  • Expo tables are $50 and can be purchased here
  • Speakers & expo guest only (no table) tickets are $20 and can be purchased here
  • Expo guest only tickets are $5 and can be purchased here

What's happening at this event?

I cannot tell you EVERYTHING yet, as things are STILL being confirmed. I'm VERY excited about the event, and once I unveil all of the details, I think you'll be just as excited! Here's what I can tell you:

  • Event begins at NOON
  • First speaker: Adam Assoian from Focused in Photography will take the stage at approximately 12:15pm
  • Second speaker: Jonathan Kay will take the stage at approximately 1:15pm
  • Third and final speaker will take the stage at approximately 2:15pm [TBA]

That is PART ONE of the event. We will then have about an hour to set up the expo tables/booths. This will give brands, artists and designers enough time to get their inventory out for viewing and give our first entertainer time to set up.

You can reserve your expo table NOW. Click HERE to go to make your reservation! The expo tables will be $50 for an 8 foot table. There will be a maximum amount of tables allowed to be set up, so make sure you reserve your table today! Once they're sold out, they're sold out!

This is a great price for this event! Confirm today!

IF YOU DO RESERVE AN EXPO TABLE, this will also get you in to see the speakers, there will be no extra cost for that.

IF YOU DO NOT RESERVE AN EXPO TABLE, you can reserve a ticket to see our speakers and attend the expo event, you just will not be able to set up your inventory at the Tee Party.

Who will our entertainment be at the event?

  • Erin Cheyne from The Borogoves; She is also a web designer, so make sure you talk to her at the event!
  • 13:1 (aka Thirteen To One)
  • Broad Callings
  • Devolver
  • Kingston 530

Get on over and like them on their Facebook pages!

Here are the confirmed brands for the event (so far):

  • saucewear
  • Winky Boo
  • Anthems & Anchors Apparel
  • The Yetee
  • Vudog
  • Forever Gold Clothing
  • Reflection Dynamiks Clothing
  • Color Blind Creations
  • Lil LoveDriven
  • Branded Baron Apparel
  • Regret Clothing
  • Monstros
  • NLIGHTN Apparel
  • Fechured Apparel
  • Candy Effect Clothing
  • Jointed Creativity
  • Meant4More Apparel
  • Defeated Minds Clothing
  • Tiny Fish Printing
  • Purple & Chrome
  • Vers Clothing
  • flyingpantaloon
  • The FEWture Clothing Co
  • B TOASTED (no website yet)

The event will start to wind down sometime around 8pm and we'll make sure we're cleared out by 9pm.

Also, we are in DESPERATE need of donations and sponsors, so please spread the word about this event to your family and friends and urge them to help out in any way they can!

Finally, we will have a 50/50 raffle at the door and also a silent auction! Proceeds from both of these will go to a local charity here in Boston, Birthday Wishes! This is a charity close to my heart and one that I have worked with for quite a few years now. Birthday Wishes brings birthday parties to homeless children! Please visit their website today!

Want to get into the event for FREE? 

Donate some items for Birthday Wishes at the door! Here's what they need:

  • Juice boxes
  • Birthday-themed wrapping paper
  • Label maker
  • Washable markers and sketch pads
  • Preschool musical instruments: maracas, tambourines, shakers, etc. 
  • Teenage pocket/hand games or card games

If you would like to donate anything for our silent auction, please contact me via the contact form below! You don't have to be a t-shirt brand to contribute!

Hopefully this will answer some burning questions, if you have any other, please ask them below and we will update this post with those answers!

Thank you and hope to see you there!

Be sure to stay up to date with all of the Tee Party info by following us on Twitter: @TTGTeeParty!

RESERVE YOUR TICKETS OR EXPO TABLE HERE: CLICK ME

This is a charity close to my heart and one that I have worked with for quite a few years now. Birthday Wishes brings birthday parties to homeless children! Please visit their website today!

story:
Who are WE?

Ekocreashunz is an ecofriendly, handmade jewelry and accessory line that utilizes earth friendly, repurposed and up-cycled ordinary products and turns them into uniquely crafted and custom designed pieces. Birthed from the creative minds of a mother and daughter duo, Lisa and Alexis, Ekocreashunz is based in Atlanta, GA and strives to create items that give a balance to the earth and to each person that owns any of their products.

Each piece has a story, a story woven from the elements that we each look at, feel and touch each day. Gemstones, precious rocks, natural stones, wood and the earth's water resources each serve as inspiration during the creative process.

It is our hope that you will join us in our journey and assist in exposing the creative talents of Ekocreashunz and join our efforts to merge our environment with ecofriendly fashion accessories!  Its fashion with a cause and a true purpose that we all can benefit from.

 

So why should YOU support Ekocreashunz?

As a parent, it has always been important to teach my kids the value of independence, hard work, creativity and self preservation.  Ekocreashunz is in large, the brainchild of my young daughter and it is my goal to ensure that I do all that I can to assist in her success.  She has made a full-time commitment to our business and I simply wish to do my part!!!

We know that the there is a lot of hard work and dedication, and it truly takes the support of everyone to make a small business successful.  We are willing to do the work and remain true to our company goals of being ecofriendly.  There is a lot of beauty in the natural elements as well as in those things that we have tossed away because we feel we can no longer use them.  We strive to recreate that beauty in each piece...using what is already there.

Achieving our fund raising goal will allow us to do several major events, each of which will bring more awareness to our mission of creating timeless jewelry while preserving and conserving.

 

Reasons for you to help!

Recently, we were awarded the Atlanta area RAW Accessories Designer of the Year!  Voted on by the local community, a panel of judges and the overall national audience. Because of our win there, we have been invited to attend the National Event in California.  The exposure and networking that we can gain from our attendance in California will be mind-blowing and has the potential to really put us in a position to expand to a wider audience.  Your contribution will help us prepare for this trip and allow us to attend the award show and compete for business opportunities.

Secondly, our contributions to and participation in our local community events has afforded us the opportunity to display our work in front of global buyers at the annual Atlanta Apparel Trade Show. This top-notch event brings in buyers and sellers from around the world to see the most up and coming designers and gives us the opportunity to have our items purchased and later re-sold in exclusive markets!   We want to give Ekocreashunz the best shot possible and to do this, we need to revamp our exhibit so that it can compete on a national level and stock it with more items than we have ever tasked ourselves to do.  Your help will also allow us to pay our display fees for the trade show, purchase the materials needed and have professionally designed marketing materials created to showcase what we have to offer.

No gift is too small...and every amount that you contribute is appreciated. We have some amazing sponsorship levels that will score you some of our beautiful jewelry that you can keep or give as a gift to someone else!  We are also happy to speak with you directly about what we do and how we do it, just shoot us over an email.

 

How you can help?

Help us reach our fund raising goal of $5,000.

Your help will also allow us to pay our display fees for the trade show, purchase the materials needed and have professionally designed marketing materials created to showcase what we have to offer.

No gift is too small...and every amount that you contribute is appreciated. We have some amazing sponsorship levels that will score you some of our beautiful jewelry that you can keep or give as a gift to someone else!  We are also happy to speak with you directly about what we do and how we do it, just shoot us over an email.

Tell a friend, and ask your friend to tell their friends.  We are honored to be able to do what we do, after all, each of us has a role to play in taking care of the environment.  Our goal is to do just that, but allow each of us to “wear” our support through the design of up-cycled, nature inspired pieces.

 

Where your help will go!

Travel & Preparation for the RAW awards in California: $1000

Atlanta Apparel Trade Show entry: $1000

Exhibit Deisgn & Building: $700

Professional Look Book: $1200

Supplies & Materials: $1100

Because of our win there, we have been invited to attend the National Event in California.  The exposure and networking that we can gain from our attendance in California will be mind-blowing and has the potential to really put us in a position to expand to a wider audience.  Your contribution will help us prepare for this trip and allow us to attend the award show and compete for business opportunities.
Secondly, our contributions to and participation in our local community events has afforded us the opportunity to display our work in front of global buyers at the annual Atlanta Apparel Trade Show. This top-notch event brings in buyers and sellers from around the world to see the most up and coming designers and gives us the opportunity to have our items purchased and later re-sold in exclusive markets!   We want to give Ekocreashunz the best shot possible and to do this, we need to revamp our exhibit so that it can compete on a national level and stock it with more items than we have ever tasked ourselves to do.  Your help will also allow us to pay our display fees for the trade show, purchase the materials needed and have professionally designed marketing materials created to showcase what we have to offer.
No gift is too small...and every amount that you contribute is appreciated. We have some amazing sponsorship levels that will score you some of our beautiful jewelry that you can keep or give as a gift to someone else!  We are also happy to speak with you directly about what we do and how we do it, just shoot us over an email.
 
How you can help?
Help us reach our fund raising goal of $5,000.
Your help will also allow us to pay our display fees for the trade show, purchase the materials needed and have professionally designed marketing materials created to showcase what we have to offer.
No gift is too small...and every amount that you contribute is appreciated. We have some amazing sponsorship levels that will score you some of our beautiful jewelry that you can keep or give as a gift to someone else!  We are also happy to speak with you directly about what we do and how we do it, just shoot us over an email.
Tell a friend, and ask your friend to tell their friends.  We are honored to be able to do what we do, after all, each of us has a role to play in taking care of the environment.  Our goal is to do just that, but allow each of us to “wear” our support through the design of up-cycled, nature inspired pieces.
 
Where your help will go!
Travel & Preparation for the RAW awards in California: $1000
Atlanta Apparel Trade Show entry: $1000
Exhibit Deisgn & Building: $700
Professional Look Book: $1200
Supplies & Materials: $1100

story:
Zero km is our main philosophy.

Gina Fiore is an ecological line of fashion. So we would like to export our 0km philosophy. Wherever there's an interested we hope to begin another production exactly the same as we have in Italy, the same enviroment, but using local materials and local work force of that area. To do this, our team Gina Fiore, has dedicated a limit to open a fashion cafè, the same as this one in another place and in another country.
In brief: closely connected to the territory, making the best of the local reources.
We have fixed a figure at 65.000 dollars. This figure is enough to create the same enviroment we have created here in Italy. With a similar dressmaker, a similar shop. And a similar small fashion-cafè with closely connected products inside with full respect for the enviroment.
Wherever this place shall be, we'd like to create a working team there, with its local people, but firstly discover how to furnish the fashion cafè recycling old furniture fount in the area and then begin to work with a local team, who will start to work together with our team and who will then become independent and expand according to the demand.
Still following Gina Fiore's line of fashion.
Maybe a way to do export without transport and pollution!

Gina Fiore: the team!


What We Need

We need $65,000 to open a new fashion cafè and shop.

  • $15,000 - Furniture and accessories.
  • $20,000 - Machinery, equipment and tools
  • $30,000 - Initial running expenses (rent and job-salaries)


What You Get


  • $35 - Each of our fashion cafè has a green wall. Your name will be written there (with your permission)


  • $45 - Send a photo. Our designer will design you two suggestions for your type.


  • $85 - An original "Gina Fiore Upcycling-bag" with personalized thanks (send us your name and proposal)


  • $90 - Organic cotton shirt - handmade - (S/M/L/XL)  - orginal price: $122



  • $95 - Mini-Skirt - hemp - handmade - (XS/S/M/L/XL) - original price: $163


  • $150 - Mini-Skirt - organic cotton - handmade (XS/S/M/L/XL)                                - original price:  $245


  •  $200 - organic satin blouse - handmade - (XS/S/M/L/XL) original price: $299



  • $200 - organic cotton trousers - handmade (S/M/L/XL) - original price: $299


  • $430 - organic cotton outfit - handmade - (XS/S/M/L-XL) original price: $650


  • $510 - organic cotton outfit - handmade - (XS/S/M/L/XL) - original price: $700


  • $510 - organic cotton dress - handmade knittwear - (XS/S/M/L/XL)                     - original price: $680


  •  $1490 - Suit (jacket, pants,gilet) - organic cotton - handmade - (S/M/L/XL)      - original price: $2170


  • $3000 - 25% off for 12 months unlimited (visit our fashionshop http://www.geenasshop.it/  )


  • $5000 - 35% off for 12 months unlimited (visit our fashionshop http://www.geenasshop.it/  )

story:
ALL NEW PERKS!....

Check out our newly revamped Perks!  We've added all the DexShell products at 20% off the retail price.  Great add-ons including 1 year extended discount and pre-launch access to new products.... Look forward to your support!  Thanks!

PER4MANCEGEAR.COM....

Hi, and thank you for taking the time to view our Indiegogo funding pitch for  PER4MANCEGEAR.COM.  My name is Christopher Dalton and my partner is Catherine Collins.  

Like 99.9999% of the world's population, we want a better life for our kids.  After years of working for others, we decided it was time to take advantage of what the world offers all of us, a chance to develop a business that we're passionate about and build a better life through our own efforts. 

We ran through a million ideas and business models until one day the light bulb came on and PER4MANCEGEAR.COM was born.  PER4MANCEGEAR.COM is an on-line seller of unique, high performance gear sourced from around the world.  The "4" in PER4MANCEGEAR is based on 4 words that best describe what is important to us in our products, business and lives.  The 4 key themes are Passion, Innovation, Creativity and Practicality.  From this base, we began a relentless global search to find products (gear) that fit this mantra.  Gear that someone, somewhere has "evolutionized," taken to the next level and beyond.  Our first find and our core product line is DexShell, a line of waterproof and breathable socks, gloves and hats.  Perfect!  DexShell fits our 4 themes and with our outdoor lifestyle as well.

After a year of product testing and business negotiations, PER4MANCEGEAR.COM now markets and sells the DexShell line of waterproof and breathable gear as well as the NikWax family of cleaning, waterproofing and conditioning products for technical gear.  We have a broad range of customers from the professional and recreational outdoor market as well as the professional uniform / gear market.  If you work and/or play outdoors, we want you in our tribe.

Our business is up and running and we're gaining momentum daily.  HOWEVER, a major challenge for every business, both large and small is CASH FLOW!  Cash to fund inventory build and expand our marketing is what we need now to move to the next level.  We reinvest every dollar of revenue; don't take a penny from the business and have kept and will continue to keep operating expenses virtually nil.  Our goal is to build a global brand and with your help, we will succeed!

Cathy Climbing Mt. Whitney, 2007

Christopher after finishing the Transpacific Yacht Race (Transpac), 1999

By The Numbers....

We're looking for a minimum of US$10,000.00 which will be utilized as follows:

  • Inventory Build:  The ability to offer quick delivery from inventory is paramount to success for a business like PER4MANCEGEAR.COM.  Therefore it is critical to have sufficient on-hand inventory to be able to react to consumer demand.  A tricky challenge when first starting out.  40% of the funding raised will go into new inventory purchase.

  • Marketing:  Even established brands need to continuously market themselves and their products.  For a new brand it is absolutely critical.  The remaining 40% will supplement our marketing budget and help us advertise in key consumer periodicals, exhibit at a targeted consumer gear expo, perform multiple direct mailings and beef up of our social media presence.

  • New Product Search:  We have quite a few new products on the back burner.  We require funding to have samples produced for product and market testing purposes.  The remaining 20% of the funds raised will go towards new product development, sourcing and testing.

All contributions will be greatly appreciated and will be employed wisely.   This is our promise to you! 

Join Our Tribe....

Beyond the support that crowd funding brings, we need brand ambassadors... those who see and understand our vision as well as use and love our gear.  We want each and every one of you to become a PER4MANCEGEAR.COM brand ambassador.  We've developed some exciting opportunities for you to support us and receive PER4MANCEGEAR  in return!  Not a marathoner, ultimate kayaker, offshore sailor?  Don't need to be... if your life finds you outdoors, you're bound to get wet!  I even wear DexShell socks with business suits!  

A Sampling of PER4MANCEGEAR.COM


DexShell Waterproof & Breathable Socks...

A variety of differing types depending on applications and desired performance.....

DexShell Waterproof & Breathable Gloves...

Warm and cold weather recreational as well as cut resistant Personal Protection Equipment waterproof & breathable gloves

TouchFit Warm Weather Gloves....                  ThermFit Cold Weather Gloves...

TechShield Cut, Abrasion & Tear Resistant Waterproof & Breathable Gloves (Left)

ToughShield Cut & Flame Resistant Waterproof & Breathable Gloves (Right)

DexShell Waterproof & Breathable Hats...


See all of our products at http://www.per4mancegear.com

Building this brand is our passion, focus and long term goal.  Success to us is measured in both dollars as well as in the sense of satisfaction we feel when our customers write to thank us for providing  high quality products and for going the extra distance to make sure they're fully satisfied.  We look forward to the challenge of scaling up while maintaining our vision.  Your support will go a very long way in helping us along this path.  


How DexShell Works...

DexShell employs a highly unique method for providing waterproof & breathable functionality to its socks, gloves and hats.  As with many "tech" innovations, it's the synergistic combination of materials and design that gives the products their unique performance.


  • DexShell's Triple Layer Construction combines outer, middle and inner layers of unique materials to provide a combination of waterproof capability, wicking and breathability.  
  • The outer layer consists of a water and abrasion resistant nylon.  This is the first line of defense and does a good job of wicking water away from the foot, hand or head.
  • The mid-layer is a highly advanced membrane called "Porelle."  Porelle is designed and manufactured so smaller water vapor molecules can pass one way, while larger water molecules are blocked from entering.  DexShell employs a patented, seamless construction technique for the Porelle lining that improves the fit, feel and performance of the products.  
  • The inner layer used on each product varies depending on the performance parameter for that particular product.  CoolMax inner lining is used for warmer weather socks (Coolvent Lite & Coolvent) and on the TouchFit Gloves  given its wicking capability and impregnated silver ions for antibacterial odor control.  Merino Wool is used for colder weather socks and is highly thermally protective, anti-bacterial and wicks moisture very well.
The end result are products that fit extremely comfortably while keeping your warm and dry.

Help Beyond Money...

You helping us, helps our kids... and we can't thank you enough for that!  

At the end of the day, we want customers.... We want the opportunity to show what our gear can do for people.  Please let your tribe know about PER4MANCEGEAR.COM and our Indiegogo campaign.   Twitter, Facebook, e-mail, SMS or even better yet,,,, live and in person.  

THANK YOU VERY MUCH!

Catherine Collins & Christopher Dalton

per4mancegear@gmail.com

story:
BILLY

We're an emerging Australian watch company, creating high-quality watches without inflated prices.

With soft Italian Leather straps, we have combined the highest-quality components into our watches. 

The Amalfi, 38mm, on an average sized wrist.

 

The Cannes, 38mm, on an average sized wrist.

The Florence, 38mm, on an average sized wrist

 

The Zurich, 38mm, on an average sized wrist.

Design

For the last year, we’ve been working with world-leading manufacturers and jewellery specialists to develop affordable, classic luxury watches that don’t compromise in design, comfort or quality.

When designing this line, we made sure of three things:

  • A stunning, classic design that could be worn by both men and women, in either a professional or casual setting 
  • The highest quality European materials, that are both a comfortable fit and incredibly durable 
  • To be able to offer our watches at a fraction of the price of our competitors

 

Manufacturing

Our manufacturing partners are leading companies in their space, who have been creating timepieces for luxury watch brands, often retailing at over $1,000 and lasting decades — for generations.

Soft Italian Vegetable-Grade Leather

We’ve incorporated true European luxury into our watches by sourcing soft Italian leather from the finest local artesian tanneries in Southern Italy.

 

The Billy Collection

The Monaco, 38mm Rose Gold Case, Black Italian Leather Strap

 

The Florence, 38mm Rose Gold Case, Peach Italian Leather Strap

 

The Milan, 38mm Brushed Black Case, Black Italian Leather Strap

 

The Amalfi, 38mm Silver Case, Velvet Blue Italian Leather Strap

 

The Cannes, 38mm Brushed Black Case, Dark Tan Italian Leather Strap

 

The Zurich, 38mm Silver Case, Light Tan Leather Strap

 

10-Year Guaranteed Warranty

We are so confident in the durability and quality of the materials in BILLY watches, that we are offering a 10-year guaranteed warranty to all backers of our Kickstarter campaign.

Limited Edition Watches

We are strictly limiting our Indiegogo campaign by selling no more than 500 pieces. This means that your timepiece will be only 1 out of 500 in the world, with an engraved Founders Edition. 

 

 

Specifications

 
  • Watch Case: Composite metal polymer, stainless-steel 
  • Water Resistant: Up to 3 ATM, 30 meters 
  • Case Glass: Sapphire coated crystal with anti-scratch surface finish
  • Strap Material: Soft Italian leather, uniquely handcrafted 
  • Date Function: All inclusive, fully functional date function 
  • Watch Size: 38mm / 7.5mm (diameter / thickness) 
  • Watch Weight: 38 - 45g
  • Buckle: Stainless-steel pin buckle 
  • Warranty: 10 Year Guaranteed Warranty across all models

 

Where is BILLY headed?

We plan on becoming the leader in our space - a global, luxury watch brand without the inflated prices. We're not another 5 minute business, BILLY is here to stay.

Our first range of watches have been designed to be a classic, luxury timepiece that will suit any occasion. We have already commenced designs of new lines and ranges, from corporate ready watches to complex chronograph pieces - your pledge to BILLY means more than simply funding this project, by pledging to this campaign you will be investing in the future of our business. Be part of the change in the luxury watch market from the very beginning.

Together, let's change the multi-billion dollar luxury watch industry for good.

 

Risks & Challenges

For our team, this campaign represents our first ever Indiegogo project. However, both us and our manufacturing team have decades of experience in the industry. This combined experience will allow us to remain agile and successfully troubleshoot any unforeseen issues throughout the campaign.

 
Our other challenge will be getting the word out through social media, blogs and other media outlets and getting IndieGogos to participate.

story:
*Please note that this campaign has ended*

Discover more at www.maestrowatches.com

Our vision in 2015 was to bring life to the idea of providing fashionable timepieces that were superior in quality, at a reasonable price point. Thanks to a tremendous amount of support and belief, our vision was brought to life.  Since then we have been diligently working behind the scenes on a unique collection that stays true to our brands vision. It comes with much pleasure to introduce our latest and most sophisticated collection;

 

 

The Collection

The Executive Chrono | 2.0 collection consists of 5 exquisitely crafted timepieces that each offer their own unique qualities that compliment virtually any lifestyle. Whether being worn during work or play, the collection grants a perfect balance between luxury and durability.

 

Brown & Rose Gold Chrono

Blue & Rose Gold Chrono

Black & Silver Chrono

Black & Rose Gold Chrono

Brown & Silver Chrono

 

When we began developing the collection we studied, examined and gathered influence from the worlds most prestigious luxury brands and retailers. Along the way, we saw truth in the old saying "The Devil's in the details" and made a commitment in the early stages of our creative process that each component of The Executive Chrono | 2.0, no matter how big or small, will illustrate our commitment to quality.

Each timepiece proudly carries with it the following specifications:

 

 

Reviews & Features

story:
Guizzi Bags

Guizzi bags realizes handmade bags exclusively made in Italy with a unique design, by using just fine ecological leather. Now Guizzi Brand wants to get a value added as gift for its clients...an app Android/Apple for your shopping on line which allows to customize your own bag from your phone during a walk (just as for our model in the video) or whenever you need, by choosing colours and type. No more problems for arrangement the right bag with your outfit but most important your bag will be unique. We could even satisfy demanding request as exclusive.

Guizzi Bags realizza borse artigianali, totalmente made in italy, con un design esclusivo, e di finissima ecopelle per salvaguardare la vita animale. Oggi la griffe Guizzi vuole realizzare un valore aggiunto da donare alla propria clientela: un’applicazione  Android/Apple che permetta non solo di acquistare online ma anche di personalizzare dal proprio cellulare, all’occorrenza anche durante una passeggiata per lo shopping come è successo alla nostra modella,  la borsa dei colori che si necessita. Non avrai più il problema di trovare la borsa giusta per il tuo outfit e inoltre… ogni esemplare di borsa può diventare unico. Valutiamo anche la possibilità dell’esclusiva per clienti particolarmente esigenti.


BACKSTAGE

Who's Guizzi

Two years ago chattering with a friend of mine we realized that today you can personalize whatever you want....such as houses, offices, decor, laptop, mobile and much more. Personally I often created dresses I designed thanks to a dressmaker such as jewelry or shoes....but it never happened with bags!

I met a lot of artcrafts very able in making good bags but they never understand what's on your mind.... Even high quality industrial products are not satisfactories. That's why we decided to put together a professional dealer, a creative mind, some artcrafts and create.... GUIZZI. The dream comes true....why can't we do the same for all women?

Thanks to technology we can.....but we need to engage an Italian manager and put on web our project that everyone could share. Downloading a mobile app it could be possible to shape a Guizzi Bag.....each single idea shared on Guizzi Bags App could turn into a unique product.

 Let's imagine your own bag...GUIZZI team will make it real and completely unique in the world.

Our products are all made in eco-leather cause we love animals.

Our products are all made by hand cause we believe that technology can never make it better than man.

Our products are all made in Italy cause it's the best quality in the world.


Chi è Guizzi?

Un paio di anni fa parlando con un’amica abbiamo convenuto che ormai le personalizzazioni sono fattibili in quasi tutti i settori…..personalizziamo case, uffici, arredamento, laptop, mobile e tanto altro, personalmente devo dire che sono spesso ricorsa a sartorie per farmi realizzare capi di abbigliamento che esistevano solo nella mia mente, ad orafi per farmi personalizzare dei gioielli, addirittura scarpe…… ma non sono mai riuscita a personalizzarmi una borsa.

Nella mia ricerca ho anche trovato artigiani bravi, ma spesso si limitano a realizzarti il prodotto che sanno fare, senza recepire le tue necessità creative…. E i prodotti industriali anche se di buon livello non mi colpiscono facilmente. Ecco che dall’incontro di una cliente esigente e commerciale di professione, una creativa capace di trasformare un sogno in un disegno realizzabile, un team di produzione artigianale capace di recepire le indicazioni del designer e di rendere concreti i progetti mettendo al primo posto la cura dei particolari degni di una Griffe di Alta moda……nasce GUIZZI.

Il sogno è diventato realtà…… e perché non dare a tutte le donne del mondo la stessa possibilità??

Oggi grazie alla tecnologia si può…..ed ecco che il nostro team aspira a crescere e  arricchirsi di un IT manager che metta sul web il nostro progetto rendendolo fruibile a tutti, scaricando sul cellulare una semplice APP  grazie alla quale ogni borsa Guizzi sarà unica nel suo genere, e ogni idea inviata tramite la Guizzi Bags App darà luogo ad un prodotto unico, frutto del lavoro manuale e della creatività umana.

La lungimiranza di un commerciale del settore unita con la creatività della designer hanno dato luogo ad un prodotto nuovo, realizzabile in tempi brevi, e senza eguali nel suo settore.

Immagina anche tu la tua borsa, il team di GUIZZI la renderà reale ed avrai un oggetto unico al mondo.

I nostri prodotti sono realizzati tutti in ecopelle, perché amiamo gli animali

I nostri prodotti sono tutti fatti a mano, perché la tecnologia è a supporto dell’uomo ma non potrà mai sostituirlo

I nostri prodotti sono realizzati interamente in Italia, perché il mondo ci riconosce la qualità del prodotto interamente Italiano.


The Collection - La Collezione


Murano Bag

White Ecologic Leather Bag with coloured details. 

Italian handmade product. All colours customizable. 

Width 40 cm, Height 29 cm, Depth 11 cm

         



Shabby Bag

White Ecologic Leather Bag with printed sign. 
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable. 
 Width 40 cm, Height 29 cm, Depth 11 cm


Amsterdam Bag

Grey Ecologic Leather Bag with coloured details. 
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable. 
Width 40 cm, Height 29 cm, Depth 11 cm


Square Bag

Beige Ecologic Leather Bag with  strass and mirrored ecologic leather details. 
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable. 
Width 31 cm, Height 34 cm, Depth 11 cm


Letter Bag

Black Ecologic Leather Bag with customizing initial. 
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable. 
Width 30 cm, Height 30 cm, Depth 8 cm

Paris Bag

Grey Ecologic Leather Bag with strass and ecologic leather details. 
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable.  
Width 30 cm, Height 30 cm, Depth 8 cm


Sun Bag

Yellow Ecologic Leather Bag with organza details. 
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable. 
Width 40 cm, Height 30 cm, Depth 9 cm


Moon Bag

Purple Ecologic Suede Leather Bag with strass moon. 
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable. 
Width 40 cm, Height 29 cm, Depth 11 cm


Hearts Bag

Grey Ecologic Leather Bag with strass and mirrored ecologic leather details.
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable. 
Width 36 cm, Height 34 cm, Depth 10 cm


City Bag

Linoleum and Ecologic Leather Bag. 
Italian handmade product. All colours customizable.  
Width 30 cm, Height 30 cm, Depth 8 cm


Inside ALL Guizzi Bags: lining and zip in several colours depending on bags

Dentro TUTTE le borse Guizzi: fodera e zip in vari colori a seconda della borsa



Rewards / Ricompense


Orange Keychain/Portachiavi arancio : 20 EUR


Blue Keychain/Portachiavi blu : 20 EUR


Red Keychain/Portachiavi rosso : 20 EUR


Orange Pochette/Pochette arancio : 30 EUR


Blue Pochette/Pochette blu : 30 EUR

Discount 25%/Sconto del 25% : 50 EUR

on our web site www.guizzi.eu from December 2015


Discount 50%/Sconto del 50% : 100 EUR

on our web site www.guizzi.eu from December 2015


Shabby Bag : 150 EUR



Square Bag : 200 EUR


Murano Bag : 250 EUR

                     


Our promise

1. Guizzi bags are all handcraft

2. Guizzi bags are all made in Italy

3. Guizzi bags don't use animal parts

4. Guizzi bags are originals and useful

5. Guizzi bags are customizable and with your help you can do it even by your phone


Le nostre promesse

1. Le borse Guizzi sono tutte artigianali

2. Le borse Guizzi sono tutte made in italy

3. Le borse Guizzi non utilizzano parti di  animali

4. Le borse Guizzi sono originali e funzionali

5. Le borse Guizzi sono tutte personalizzabili e con il vostro aiuto a breve lo saranno anche da cellulare


What your grants are for:

1. First of all we will implement the App for bags customization on line and e-commerce site

2. We will increase large-scale production to meet the increasing demand from the web

3. We will buy sewing machines to fulfill orders quickly


Cosa faremo con i vostri contributi

1 Come primo obiettivo implementeremo l’app x la personalizzazione online delle borse e il sito e-commerce

2 Incrementeremo la produzione su larga scala per far fronte alle esigenze dovute alla vendita personalizzata on-line e aumenteremo la ricerca di materiali particolari con cui lavorare

3 acquisteremo altre macchine da cucire per evadere in minor tempo gli ordini


FAQ (for any question send an email at info@guizzi.eu)

-  HOW DO I PAY FOR SHIPMENT?

  See costs under the reward and add it to the amount

-  CAN I BUY GUIZZI BAGS AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS?

  Yes! When our Indiegogo campaign is over you will be able to buy your Guizzi             Bags on our online shopping site from december 2015!

- I LIVE OUTSIDE EU. CAN I PARTECIPATE TO CAMPAIGN OR BUY YOUR BAGS?

   Sure. Send an email at info@guizzi.eu and we will try to find a solution for your shipment and taxes


Domande frequenti (per qualsiasi domanda mandaci una mail a info@guizzi.eu)

- COME POSSO PAGARE LE SPEDIZIONI?
  Aggiungi il costo della spedizione a quello della ricompensa
- POSSO ACQUISTARE LE BORSE GUIZZI DOPO LA FINE DELLA CAMPAGNA?
  Certo! Da dicembre 2015 sarà online il nostro sito di e-commerce
- IO VIVO FUORI DALL'EUROPA. POSSO PARTECIPARE ALLA CAMPAGNA O ACQUISTARE LE VOSTRE BORSE?
   Certo! Mandaci una email a info@guizzi.eu e troveremo una soluzione per tasse e spedizioni


           THANK YOU FROM

        WE LOOK FORWARD.. AND YOU?


Other Ways You Can Help

Share  this page on Facebook, Twitter and other social network!

Every share is important to us.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Mike, and i`m a turner,
All my life I have been working with the metal, turning it's not just a job - it's art over the years, I have learned many things and one of them, I want to share with you.



What We Need & What You Get

The aim of this project, I put the improvement of my skills and maybe sometime I`ll open my own workshop, but not now.



I love my job I love creativity, and accordingly I will be happy to create new ideas and things, which I hope you will support me.

Info


Brand: Turner's Cube - separated

Model characteristics: Four cubes, separated, one in another which can be moved freely in all directions by 360 degrees, smaller cubes can not come out

Finished, with a stand and turned insert

High quality of handmade

Handmade without CNC technology


Cube dimensions: Max. dimension 40x40x40mm (1,57x1,57 x1,57 inches)

Model specification: Made from one piece of aluminium cube, weight 200g

Weight of finished cube: For finished cube (weight 40g) it's needed to remove 80% of material.

Model materials: Aluminium

Base: Polished aluminum and turned aluminum inserts

Excellent as a present, may be used as a perfect decoration.

Great brain teaser on an intellectual level. It's paper weights but certainly makes a good conversation starter.

Exclusive gift for art-technique lovers.


Risks & Challenges

Risks - anyway if i wouldn`t reach goal - i will make so many cubes as you need.
I don`t need to buy equipment

story:
UPDATE

Thanks so much for all of your support, and for believing in the next evolution in makeup!

Together we've raised over $4,000 so far, WOW! That is amazing!

With these funds I can pay our brilliant videographer, get the jars professionally heat-stamped w/ the gorgeous lid designs you've all been voting on (thank you!) so they'll look amazing on the glossy pages of big beauty mags! And I can develop a marketing plan to help spread the word about intuitive COLOR.

I still need your help, now more than ever, to spread awareness of this campaign and that it's time for makeup to change--no more heavy unnecessarily unhealthy, dry, suffocating makeup. Titanium Dioxide and Zinc Oxide may have a place in sun screen lotions, but not in the cloud of makeup that you inhale everyday that can cause cancer, reproductive toxicity or respiratory toxicity.

Let's make makeup better looking and better for you!

 

intuitive COLOR, a natural, nourishing makeup set that is free of micas, titanium dioxide, zinc oxide and other unhealthy minerals is the next evolution in makeup – handmade in the USA.

My Story

I believe that even natural and mineral makeups are not yet safe enough. And that’s why I developed intuitive COLOR – a lightweight, blendable, breathable, nourishing type of makeup made with only natural and cosmetic grade mineral ingredients. Made in the USA with lots of love and care, intuitive COLOR proves that we can have better makeup with safer ingredients.

The three-part foundation set, our trifecta of smooth, color and set, is formulated with nourishing, line-erasing mango butter, beta-carotene and omega 7 rich sea buckthorn oil, and protein and calcium rich USA pearl powder.

I developed these products for women like me – dreamers, health nuts, natural beauty devotees, makeup junkies and all who are concerned with what they put on their skin that is absorbed into our bodies. I am inspired by the challenge of not settling for what’s safer, but safest.

Your Contribution

With the help of Indiegogo and people like you, we can spread the word that safer, healthier makeup is finally here. Being taken seriously as a cosmetic brand requires the attention of big beauty media outlets like Vogue, InStyle, Allure, Glamour and WWD, otherwise it will take years to educate people about better, safer makeup options. In order to do this, I need the help of a PR expert like Melissa Cassera who can help me to effectively spread the word and get intuitive COLOR noticed.

The Rewards

We’ve put a lot of love into the rewards we’ve come up with for our supporters, and we hope you’ll give us the opportunity to return the generosity to you. We can’t do this without you, so if you believe in our mission, please help by sharing and spreading the word.

After your pledge, we will mail you some tiny samples for selecting just the right shade. Please reply to us by emailing orders [at] intuitivecolor.co with your preferred shade and the perks will begin mailing at the end of January 2013.

For USA pledges, shipping is free, for Canada please add $10 to your pledge, for other countries please add $30.

Why I Develop Makeup and Skin Care Products

I am a seeker by nature, always searching for the safest, healthiest, best option in a given category. And when it comes to the products that we put on our skin every day, I believe it is very important to get it right.

Developing skin care products for my line Gluten Free Beauty since 2010 has forced me to really think about our skin’s needs. In an ideal world, perhaps we wouldn’t need to wear any makeup, but there is a certain thrill to balancing out one’s complexion, enhancing one’s true beauty, and facing the world with our best face forward. But I refuse to settle for what looks good, but is bad for me.

Mineral makeup revolutionized the beauty industry in the late 1990s. It was the first time a real performance type of makeup that wasn’t laden with parabens, fragrance and petro chems became available to the mass market. And the message was brilliantly spread throughout the world with the help of QVC.

Now it’s time for a high performance, natural and mineral makeup that leaves out those minerals which have been proven to be unhealthy.

EWG’s SkinDeep Database links titanium dioxide and zinc oxide to cancer and respiratory toxicity. And micas, which create all those beautiful pigmented colors contain titanium dioxide. But you cannot find natural or mineral makeups that are free from these ingredients.

We don’t need these unhealthy ingredients.

Natural, mineral makeup doesn’t need these ingredients. There are alternatives. That’s why I developed intuitive COLOR with just a few natural and mineral essentials. But in order to want to use a product every day, it can’t just be safer, it must also look and feel amazing, lightweight and breathable.

It must be so blendable that you can dab it on as a concealer (cutting out one other product you would otherwise need), and so lightweight that you can simply dust it on, or layer it on for special events, and so nourishing that it actually hydrates the skin and helps reduce lines and wrinkles.

All of these components are possible, so why would we use any other type of product?

It’s time to say goodbye to dry, cakey, heavy, unhealthy makeup.

-Kristen Campbell Brown

Share Our Story

I tweet (a lot) at @glutenfreefox (it was a play on Mozilla Firefox years ago, I swear I’m not calling myself a gluten-free fox!)

I also can’t keep away from Facebook, and can be found on the Gluten Free Beauty fan page. You can truly help by sharing the link to this project and telling your friend.

If you want to know more about my commitment to better, healthier beauty products, and my struggles and triumphs in developing them, please subscribe to my blog.

And lastly, visit the brand spanking new intuitive COLOR website to learn more about how we’re revolutionizing the makeup industry: www.intuitiveCOLOR.co

*A Note on Shades* – 1l  3y  3p are all the light shades   5y  5p are the light-mediums  7y 7p are the medium-darks  9y is the darkest shade View our shade chart.

UPDATE: I don't want any of our pledgers to choose the wrong shade, so for the full size trifecta pledgers ($55 or more), I will mail out shade-selecting kits to choose from.

*A Note to Our International Backers

I am sorry about the additional $30 for shipping, if I could ship for free internationally I promise I would!

Recent Testimonials

In the short amount of time I've been using intuitive COLOR I've been impressed with how easy it applies and covers, all without making me look "made up". My face looks natural and this foundation gives me a more polished and smooth look. And as I age, smooth is definitely how I want to portray my skin!
-Donielle Baker, Author/Blogger
NaturallyKnockedUp.com

 Kristen, I just want to encourage you- you are doing an AMAZING job.I LOVE your products and the overall message of your company. Keep rocking it, I have no doubt that you will continue exploding and dominate in this market.
-Lauren-Lucille Vasser, Blogger/Vlogger
TheCeliacDiva.com

 I can't believe how light the foundation is! And for it's weight it has very nice coverage. The base of course is fabulous. The setting powder mattifies it all down and keeps it in place. The end result is a baby fine, perfect finish. What I really love about this set is that the ingredients are like a facial treatment, but it's makeup!
-Afton Jones, Blogger
GlutenFreeMakeupGal.com

Key Benefits

  • Mango Butter Antioxidant rich Mango Butter is recommended by dermatologists for the treatment of wrinkles, and is said to soften, smooth, moisturize, and increase flexibility of the skin. With daily use, most people see a decrease in the signs of aging, as well as the disappearance of lines and wrinkles within 4 to 6 weeks. Mango Butter is also said to have protective effects against UV radiation.
  • Pearl Powder An ancient Asian secret for health and skin care, Pearl Powder is rich in antioxidants, calcium and essential  trace minerals. It is renowned for its ability to reduce wrinkles, fight aging, reduce sunspots, calm inflammation, clear acne and promote younger looking skin.
  • Sea Buckthorn Oil Said to be the single highest source of vitamin C, vitamin E, unsaturated fatty acids, essential amino acids, and beta-carotene, Sea Buckthorn Oil is renowned for its ability to combat wrinkles, dryness, and the signs of aging. Sea Buckthorn Oil’s UV-spectrum shows a moderate absorption in the UV-B range, allowing it to offer some low-level natural sun protection.

1l Our lightest shade., 3p A light, pink-hued shade., 3y A light, yellow-hued shade., 5p A medium, pink-hued shade., 5y A medium, yellow-hued shade., 7p A medium-dark, pink-hued shade., 7y A medium-dark, yellow-hued shade., 9y A dark, yellow-hued shade. View our shades.

INGREDIENTS

smooth: mango butter, sea buckthorn oil, jojoba esters, vitamin e oil (from Non-GMO soy), essential oils of helichrysum and palmarosa.

color: kaolin clay, boron nitride, pearl powder, iron oxides.

set: arrowroot starch, kaolin clay, boron nitride, pearl powder, iron oxides.

intuitive COLOR is free from:

phthalates, fragrance, parabens, petro-chems, sulfates, dyes, mica, titanium dioxide, zinc oxide, mica, carmine, bismuth oxychloride

intuitive COLOR and Gluten Free Beauty DO NOT conduct animal testing. All ingredients are vegan, except for our natural USA pearl powder.

Disclaimer: No gluten-free cakes were injured during the making of this film.
story_txt:
UPDATE

Thanks so much for all of your support, and for believing in the next evolution in makeup!
Together we've raised over $4,000 so far, WOW! That is amazing!
With these funds I can pay our brilliant videographer, get the jars professionally heat-stamped w/ the gorgeous lid designs you've all been voting on (thank you!) so they'll look amazing on the glossy pages of big beauty mags! And I can develop a marketing plan to help spread the word about intuitive COLOR.
I still need your help, now more than ever, to spread awareness of this campaign and that it's time for makeup to change--no more heavy unnecessarily unhealthy, dry, suffocating makeup. Titanium Dioxide and Zinc Oxide may have a place in sun screen lotions, but not in the cloud of makeup that you inhale everyday that can cause cancer, reproductive toxicity or respiratory toxicity. 
Let's make makeup better looking and better for you!
 
intuitive COLOR, a natural, nourishing makeup set that is free of micas, titanium dioxide, zinc oxide and other unhealthy minerals is the next evolution in makeup – handmade in the USA.

My Story
I believe that even natural and mineral makeups are not yet safe enough. And that’s why I developed intuitive COLOR – a lightweight, blendable, breathable, nourishing type of makeup made with only natural and cosmetic grade mineral ingredients. Made in the USA with lots of love and care, intuitive COLOR proves that we can have better makeup with safer ingredients.
The three-part foundation set, our trifecta of smooth, color and set, is formulated with nourishing, line-erasing mango butter, beta-carotene and omega 7 rich sea buckthorn oil, and protein and calcium rich USA pearl powder.
I developed these products for women like me – dreamers, health nuts, natural beauty devotees, makeup junkies and all who are concerned with what they put on their skin that is absorbed into our bodies. I am inspired by the challenge of not settling for what’s safer, but safest.
Your Contribution
With the help of Indiegogo and people like you, we can spread the word that safer, healthier makeup is finally here. Being taken seriously as a cosmetic brand requires the attention of big beauty media outlets like Vogue, InStyle, Allure, Glamour and WWD, otherwise it will take years to educate people about better, safer makeup options. In order to do this, I need the help of a PR expert like Melissa Cassera who can help me to effectively spread the word and get intuitive COLOR noticed.

The Rewards
We’ve put a lot of love into the rewards we’ve come up with for our supporters, and we hope you’ll give us the opportunity to return the generosity to you. We can’t do this without you, so if you believe in our mission, please help by sharing and spreading the word.
After your pledge, we will mail you some tiny samples for selecting just the right shade. Please reply to us by emailing orders [at] intuitivecolor.co with your preferred shade and the perks will begin mailing at the end of January 2013.
For USA pledges, shipping is free, for Canada please add $10 to your pledge, for other countries please add $30.
Why I Develop Makeup and Skin Care Products
I am a seeker by nature, always searching for the safest, healthiest, best option in a given category. And when it comes to the products that we put on our skin every day, I believe it is very important to get it right.
Developing skin care products for my line Gluten Free Beauty since 2010 has forced me to really think about our skin’s needs. In an ideal world, perhaps we wouldn’t need to wear any makeup, but there is a certain thrill to balancing out one’s complexion, enhancing one’s true beauty, and facing the world with our best face forward. But I refuse to settle for what looks good, but is bad for me.

Mineral makeup revolutionized the beauty industry in the late 1990s. It was the first time a real performance type of makeup that wasn’t laden with parabens, fragrance and petro chems became available to the mass market. And the message was brilliantly spread throughout the world with the help of QVC.
Now it’s time for a high performance, natural and mineral makeup that leaves out those minerals which have been proven to be unhealthy.
EWG’s SkinDeep Database links titanium dioxide and zinc oxide to cancer and respiratory toxicity. And micas, which create all those beautiful pigmented colors contain titanium dioxide. But you cannot find natural or mineral makeups that are free from these ingredients.
We don’t need these unhealthy ingredients.
Natural, mineral makeup doesn’t need these ingredients. There are alternatives. That’s why I developed intuitive COLOR with just a few natural and mineral essentials. But in order to want to use a product every day, it can’t just be safer, it must also look and feel amazing, lightweight and breathable.
It must be so blendable that you can dab it on as a concealer (cutting out one other product you would otherwise need), and so lightweight that you can simply dust it on, or layer it on for special events, and so nourishing that it actually hydrates the skin and helps reduce lines and wrinkles.
All of these components are possible, so why would we use any other type of product?
It’s time to say goodbye to dry, cakey, heavy, unhealthy makeup.
-Kristen Campbell Brown
Share Our Story
I tweet (a lot) at @glutenfreefox (it was a play on Mozilla Firefox years ago, I swear I’m not calling myself a gluten-free fox!)
I also can’t keep away from Facebook, and can be found on the Gluten Free Beauty fan page. You can truly help by sharing the link to this project and telling your friend.
If you want to know more about my commitment to better, healthier beauty products, and my struggles and triumphs in developing them, please subscribe to my blog.
And lastly, visit the brand spanking new intuitive COLOR website to learn more about how we’re revolutionizing the makeup industry: www.intuitiveCOLOR.co
*A Note on Shades* – 1l  3y  3p are all the light shades   5y  5p are the light-mediums  7y 7p are the medium-darks  9y is the darkest shade View our shade chart. 
UPDATE: I don't want any of our pledgers to choose the wrong shade, so for the full size trifecta pledgers ($55 or more), I will mail out shade-selecting kits to choose from.
*A Note to Our International Backers
I am sorry about the additional $30 for shipping, if I could ship for free internationally I promise I would!
Recent Testimonials
In the short amount of time I've been using intuitive COLOR I've been impressed with how easy it applies and covers, all without making me look "made up". My face looks natural and this foundation gives me a more polished and smooth look. And as I age, smooth is definitely how I want to portray my skin!  -Donielle Baker, Author/BloggerNaturallyKnockedUp.com
 Kristen, I just want to encourage you- you are doing an AMAZING job.I LOVE your products and the overall message of your company. Keep rocking it, I have no doubt that you will continue exploding and dominate in this market. -Lauren-Lucille Vasser, Blogger/VloggerTheCeliacDiva.com

The end result is a baby fine, perfect finish. What I really love about this set is that the ingredients are like a facial treatment, but it's makeup! -Afton Jones, BloggerGlutenFreeMakeupGal.com

With daily use, most people see a decrease in the signs of aging, as well as the disappearance of lines and wrinkles within 4 to 6 weeks. Mango Butter is also said to have protective effects against UV radiation.

Sea Buckthorn Oil Said to be the single highest source of vitamin C, vitamin E, unsaturated fatty acids, essential amino acids, and beta-carotene, Sea Buckthorn Oil is renowned for its ability to combat wrinkles, dryness, and the signs of aging. Sea Buckthorn Oil’s UV-spectrum shows a moderate absorption in the UV-B range, allowing it to offer some low-level natural sun protection.

story:
Blenders Eyewear Shades for Scholarships - Summer 2012 Full Color Rollout

Our goal is to help put students through school while decking them out in affordable and stylish eyewear. Help us fill out our product line of sunglasses for summer 2012 by pledging today!

Blenders Scholarship Program: Why does it matter?

"If we’re going to have a world class education system, young people have to be able to afford to go to college and pursue postgraduate work if they’re so inclined. Not only will the country as a whole benefit, but we will be true to what has always been the essential idea and ethic of American life, which is upward mobility and opportunity; That every child can achieve their goals. We want to make sure that every child has a chance to excel and find those areas in their lives that will allow them to make the most contribution to society. We’re failing to do that now."-President Barack Obama

Through our Blenders Scholarship Program, we help put college students through school while highlighting and fueling the efforts of America's best and brightest young people. We'll start small, buying books and whatever we can, and grow from there alongside the students we support. Eventually, we aim to award substantial scholarships to students all over the country. By selecting candidates who are actively pursuing goals like starting their own businesses, traveling the world, and community growth projects, we hope to both bolster them in their efforts and inspire their classmates.

Why sunglasses?

We were tired of having to choose between expensive designer sunglasses that inevitably disappear or break, or janky beach knockoffs that can lead to conspicuous style deficiency. Blenders shades are high quality, polarized, impact resistant sunglasses, designed with passion and priced at a point that almost begs you to lose em' or break em'...for the simple pleasure of picking out that next color combo.

Why Pledge?

Your contribution to our indiegogo project will help fund our full specturm of color for summer 2012, 5 new colors, which in turn allows us to continue with our mission of helping fund scholarships for students and giving back to education!

What's the bottom line?

Every pledge goes to new shades. Every pair of shades helps students get through school. JLT (Just Like That). 

We can't wait to get you in a pair of Blenders! Thank you for your support and please contact us for questions, comments, or a surf report. The Future is Bright. Come Prepared.


FAQ

1) When can I expect to see my perk packages?

We will ship out all perk packages in June, just in time to rock your 'Blenders for summer!

2) What colors will I be able to chose from If I have pledged?

Once the funding campaign ends (May 10th) we'll contact you and ask you which colors/ or styles you'd like. 

3) Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we do ship internationally! We will ship your 'Blenders to the moon if we have to :)


FREE SHIPPING INCLUDED IN ALL PERK PACKAGES! Yes, were that cool.

story:
The Story of a spark

3rd Earth Fireproof is An innovative line of clothing and accessories with fire performers in mind. Designed by fire performer and costume designer Tara Mc Manus, she has focused her line on the needs of the fire dancer. By blending the latest in materials such as stretch Kevlar® and Nomex ® with natural materials like leather and precious stones, she has engineered the perfect fit for fire dancing. The challenges of starting a clothing line based on military and manufacturing materials are numerous but can be solved with some machine upgrades and new equipment. Once the line is ready to sell, Mc Manus is taking it on tour for a summer of fire festival hopping to reach out to customers, meet fellow fire spinners, learn new fire techniques and grow as a performer and designer.

The Ignition

Ignite the flame that is 3rd Earth Fireproof! Help Mc Manus see her designs come to life and reach other fire performers around the country.


To feed the fire...

The 3rd Earth studio needs special blades, leather sewing needles, Kevlar® scissors, grommet dyes and leather working materials to manufacture the designs! In addition to setting up the studio, there are costs of fabrics, tags and trims. Beyond getting the brand launched, there are travel and vending expenses to get 3rd Earth Fireproof on the road and onto some sexy fire performers!


Perks include some 3rd Earth Fireproof gear for yourself! check out the gallery for images of the giveaways!

Spread the wildfire!

Share this link with your friends and encourage people to donate! Thank you!
