story:
Hi, my name is Kevin! I'm a freelance graphic designer and Illustrator

In order to do my job the best I can, I need a new camera to work with. Unfortunately decent cameras are pretty expensive - and buying one on my own would mean to eat spaghetti for 3 months straight afterwards (not that I'm a very healthy eater right now - but this would actually still be a downgrade :) ).

So thinking of ways to get my new camera I figured out that Indiegogo might be the right place to go to. 

This is the camera I wanna buy:


The Canon EOS Rebel T3i is the perfect entry-level Camera and it can do pretty much everything I need from a cam.


- SO THAT'S THE DEAL -

In order to collect money for the camera I will design a personal monogram for you to use as a logo, to personalize your letters and e-mail or even your clothes.

(These are actual examples I created to show you different styles)


Monograms trace back to 350 B.C. and were used ever since as distinctive logos and insignias by royals and even by cities. Even today they are used by companies and individuals as logos or unique personal marks.

And now - you can get your very own monogram to personalize your letterheads, backgrounds and even your clothing.

And this is how it works:

1.) You tell me your name. (You can choose to have 1, 2 or 3 letters in your monogram)

2.) You choose the style you want:

- Your preferred color (1 or 2 colors)
- Your style (Classic with decoration, classic clean or modern)

3.) I'll get to work and you'll receive your monogram (different files so you can easily give it to a printer, use it online or change things) one week after the fundraiser is over.

! I hope that you understand that there are no revisions included! However, I promise - as with all of my work - to deliver you quality design. So don't worry - You'll like it !

story:
Short Summary

TWIN is the fashion brainchild of Becky Bacsik and Liz Schmitz. It is inspired by all things odd, dark and quirky. We are working to create a men's and women's clothing line beginning with our fall of 2016 collection. It is going to be a high quality, well-tailored, one-of-a-kind collection. So, this being said, we need YOUR help in order to get this project off the ground... and to save us from a life of desk jobs and coffee runs!

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise at least $500 (USD) to cover the cost of creating this highly detailed collection. The money will go towards purchasing various high-quality materials such as wool, beads, thread, etc. (we don't want to spoil all of the surprises we have in store, but trust us, it'll be like nothing you've ever seen). Even if we don't reach our goal, any money that is raised will still help us towards starting this project. However, the more money raised, the more products we can create. 

As if you needed any more reason to donate, we have great perks! For a donation of $50, you will receive a pair of earrings or a tie-pin, for $100, you can get a one-of-a-kind necklace, and for $150, a one-of-kind bag.

The Impact

TWIN's purpose is to bring bold originality to every day wear. We want you to strive for something new and interesting when it comes to your appearance. We want to make you the person that people turn their heads for. And, not only will you be the coolest cat around while wearing TWIN, but you will also be supporting independent artists...designers...whatever you want to call us. Why waste your money at H&M buying what everyone else already has when you could be a part of something fresh and exciting! We say let your hair down, be your one-of-a-kind awesome self, and SUPPORT TWIN!!

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is that we are physically separated by a few hundred miles, so shipping things and flying between Texas and Illinois is not cheap. Another challenge for us is the cost of the materials we intend to use. We are sourcing them from the best and most unique sources, so we need all the funding necessary in order to make this collection the best it can possibly be. 

We plan on overcoming this obstacle of distance by using Skype, USPS, and other means of communication to share our progress on each end. We also will be traveling to meet up at various times throughout the next year and a half as we create this collection. Regardless of the amount of money we earn, we will still create this collection. However, it would be MUCH easier to create if we have the full amount of funding from the start. 

Other Ways You Can Help

So you don't have money? That's okay! We could use all the help possible in spreading the word of TWIN. Tell your friends, family, bae, and even your tinder pals, because the more help, the better! If you've even got connections to materials, locations for a pop-up shop, or anything you think may be helpful, feel free to give us a shout! 

Lastly, if you just want to get involved with TWIN in some way or another, email us at designtwin1@gmail.com

THANK YOU!!!!

As if you needed any more reason to donate, we have great perks! For a donation of $50, you will receive a pair of earrings or a tie-pin, for $100, you can get a one-of-a-kind necklace, and for $150, a one-of-kind bag.
The Impact
 TWIN's purpose is to bring bold originality to every day wear. We want you to strive for something new and interesting when it comes to your appearance. We want to make you the person that people turn their heads for. And, not only will you be the coolest cat around while wearing TWIN, but you will also be supporting independent artists...designers...whatever you want to call us. Why waste your money at H&M buying what everyone else already has when you could be a part of something fresh and exciting! We say let your hair down, be your one-of-a-kind awesome self, and SUPPORT TWIN!!
Risks & Challenges
  Our biggest challenge is that we are physically separated by a few hundred miles, so shipping things and flying between Texas and Illinois is not cheap. Another challenge for us is the cost of the materials we intend to use. We are sourcing them from the best and most unique sources, so we need all the funding necessary in order to make this collection the best it can possibly be. 
We plan on overcoming this obstacle of distance by using Skype, USPS, and other means of communication to share our progress on each end. We also will be traveling to meet up at various times throughout the next year and a half as we create this collection. Regardless of the amount of money we earn, we will still create this collection. However, it would be MUCH easier to create if we have the full amount of funding from the start. 
Other Ways You Can Help
So you don't have money? That's okay! We could use all the help possible in spreading the word of TWIN. Tell your friends, family, bae, and even your tinder pals, because the more help, the better! If you've even got connections to materials, locations for a pop-up shop, or anything you think may be helpful, feel free to give us a shout! 
Lastly, if you just want to get involved with TWIN in some way or another, email us at designtwin1@gmail.com
 THANK YOU!!!!

story:
THANK YOU!!! 

The hereO campaign achieved 216% of its goal - and we are thankful for each of the 1,485 backers who supported us. We are moving quickly into implementation!

We are now accepting pre-orders at:

 www.hereofamily.com

As Seen On: 

The hereO GPS watch is the world’s smallest real-time connected GPS tracking device, created specifically for children three years and up. For the first time, tracking technology has been miniaturized to fit in a trendy kids watch.

hereO enables parents to know the whereabouts of their children at any moment directly on their mobile via the hereO app. 

The hereO GPS watch comes with a build-in SIM-Card, which automatically connects to a local carrier in more than 120 countries.

The early bird perk is now sold out! You can still purchase the hereO watch for a discount at USD $129 (retail: $149) with 6 month subscription included, $4.95 p/m thereafter. The hereO watch will not be available in retail stores until fall 2014!, so get it first!

Thank you for helping us reach our goal! Now help us help others. Ten percent of proceeds will now support Autism Speaks, a national organization focused on the education and awareness of Autism.


Fox Business News (click here to view)

Imagine receiving a notification on your smartphone that reads “your child has arrived at school”. Knowing where your child is located at anytime with a click of a button, that is priceless. This is what hereO offers.

The hereO watch comes fully loaded with functions that keep parents and their children connected, allowing parents to keep track of their little ones’ whereabouts at all times. But there’s more than meets the eyes:

The hereO Family App not only syncs with the hereO watch, but also with all other family members who are using the free hereO app, enabling you to know the whereabouts of your entire family. hereO offers the first complete end-to-end family location sharing service.

The app allows users to view their family’s whereabouts, broadcast messages and make calls, receive directions to family member’s current location and view each family member’s historical locations. It also allows for parents to create virtual fences around specific areas such as home, school or work, and it will notify them when a specific family member arrives or leaves that place.

We are currently conducting beta testing on the iPhone app, with android and other devices in developed. The iPhone app will be available on iTunes in April 14', with android and HTML5 ready in June 14'.


While there are a number of child tracking products and services available to consumers, the key differentiators offered by HereO include:

  • The HereO GPS watch was designed with children in mind, allowing it to fit properly and comfortably on tiny wrist and is more than 1/2 the size smaller than any other wearable tracking products in the market.
  • HereO is the first and only complete end-to-end family location sharing service, which include a dedicated device for young children and application for the entire family.
  • Less than half the price of our competitors.


The hereO GPS-watch’s dimension is 32X30X14mm. hereO is engineered to fit a child’s wrist and comes in a variety of trendy children’s designs and colors.

The watch is comfortable for any kid to wear everyday and is water resistant; it is very durable to keep the watch on even in the heaviest of play. It features a panic button that can be easily sent in any situation. Battery life last up to 24-72 hours between each charge (depending on the usage). Parent receives a notification when the battery is low.

Certification:FCC, CE & SARS
Compatible with: Iphone, Android & HTML 5


From day one we involved kids in the design process, to make sure it was a watch they would really want to wear. We created a range of designs with the aim of developing a standard kids watch.

Today, hereO is small, comfortable to wear and trendy. The watch was designed not  to be intrusive to the kid’s daily activities.

We have partnered with key manufacturers and suppliers from the rapid prototyping phase to the final production. We work with a leading contract manufacturer to build the device.

We have already manufactured 50 working devices directly from the assembly line.

We have nearly reached all our milestones and are ready to bring this product to market. 


Children’s tiny little wrists, while adorable, post a huge technological challenge for any developers to come up with a wearable tracking device that is small and comfortable to wear. The hereO engineers overcame this challenge by miniaturizing more than 10 components in order to make GPS watch that are 100% tailor-made for kids.


The hereO watch assembly process was made simple, enabling us to offer a wide range of watch designs.

While the watch looks like an everyday child watch, when synched with the HereO Family app, the HereO GPS watch acts as tracker, allowing parents to keep in constant communication with their children.

The hereO ecosystem consists of 3 main components: GPS tracking watch, back-end server, mobile app and web portal. The image below provides a high-level overview of how the hereO end-to-end system functions.


The watch is bundled with a cellular connection provided by Wyless, which works in over 120 countries. This is similar to a standard cellular connection provided by companies like AT&T or Vodafone, except there is no external subscription needed.


hereO was started by three founders (Daniel, Gill and Allon) and now a team of 10 with a common mission: to make a product that will keep our children safe within arm's reach. After three years of research & development, we are happy to announce that we have completed our first assembly run.

A group of extraordinary people came together to make this idea a reality. From experts in medical miniaturization who redefined the workings of antenna, battery, screen and a few other secrets to manufacturers who took control of the entire assembly process and prepared us for this moment - to raise funds and to start mass production.

The hereO team includes experts with different backgrounds, each with their own core competency - from entrepreneurship to hospitality to technology and LBS. Additional specialists joined hereO with a range of expertise ranging from hardware engineer, industrial design, branding, marketing, app-design, app-programming, software programming and more.



What is hereO?

Founded in 2011, hereO is the first complete end-to-end family location sharing service, including the hereO GPS watch and the hereO Family app.

What is the hereO GPS watch?

The hereO GPS watch is the world’s smallest real-time GPS tracking device, designed and created specifically for children three years and up. The watch is water-resistant and is durable. The watch comes in a variety of vibrant colors, including: Grape, Lemon, Blueberry and Strawberry and more subdued color such as black/grey.

What makes hereO better than other child locator products on the market?

The key differentiators offered by hereO include: 

  • The hereO GPS watch was designed specifically for children. A team of experts miniaturized the technical components in order to make a watch that fits properly and comfortably on tiny wrists. 
  • It’s the smallest children GPS watch in the world, measuring half the size of any other wearable tracking products in the market.
  • The watch is stylish and colorful. The press has raved about the candy-like design of the hereO watch. 
  • Less than half the price of our competitors.
  • hereO is the first and only complete end-to-end family location sharing service, which include a dedicated device for young children and mobile application for the entire family.

How does the hereO GPS watch work?

On its own, the watch looks like an everyday child watch and functions as a digital watch. When synched with the hereO Family app, the hereO GPS watch acts as tracker, allowing parents to see their children’s whereabouts. The child wears the watch, and the parents connect with the child by downloading the free hereO family app on their smartphones (iphone or android), or by logging on to your hereO account using any computer. With the hereO family app, parents can set and receive various alerts and notifications such as panic alert, check-in alert, low-battery alert and more.

What are the features of the hereO GPS watch?

The watch is comfortable for any kid to wear everyday and is water resistant. It can be pre-ordered with an optional childproof locking mechanism for an additional fee for parents who are concerned with their child fiddling with the watch.

The tamper alert works with the hereO watch, both with and without the locking mechanism. When someone unauthorized tries to remove the watch, parents will get an alert on their smartphone. 

Parents can set Safe Zones, which are predefined boundaries such as home, school, or playground. When the child enters or leaves a dedicated safe zone, a notification is sent to the parent’s smartphone.

It also features a panic alert that can be easily triggered in any scary situation. On the technical side, the hereO GPS watch comes with a built-in SIM-Card. The SIM-Card connects directly to a wireless network automatically and works in over 120 countries. There are no contracts to sign. No tie-up to service providers. No changing of SIM cards.

Will the hereO watch fit my child?

The watch has a flexible and fully adjustable wristband, which will fit most children from three years and up.

How is the battery life of the hereO GPS watch?

The hereO GPS watch is designed to last up to 72 hours between each charge, depending on usage.

How do I charge the hereO GPS watch?

Charging your hereO watch is easy! All you have to do is connect the device to the charging dock, which is included in the box when purchased. 

Does the watch feature a battery-alert?

Yes, when the watch is low on battery, a notification, along with the current location is sent to the parent’s smartphone.

Does the watch work in my country?

The hereO watch works in over 120 countries. Please see below the list of countries supported. We continue to update our service. If you don’t see your country listed, please stay in touch for the latest updates.

Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), Afghanistan, Albania, Anguilla Antarctica, Argentina, Australia, Austria, Azores (Portugal), Belgium, Benin, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, Canary Islands (Spain), Chile, China, Colombia, Corsica (France), Costa Rica, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Desirade (French Antilles), Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ghana, Gibraltar, Greece, Guatemala, Guernsey, Guyana, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, India (Andra Pradesh), India (Bombay/Mumbai), India (Calcutta/Kolkata), India (Goa), India (Gujarat), India (Kerala), India (Tamil Nadu), Iraq, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Jordan, Korea, Kosovo, Latvia, Lesotho, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Northern Ireland (United Kingdom), Norway, Panama, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Romania, Russia, San Marino, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, Spain, Suriname, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, Trinidad and Tobago, Turkey, Ukraine United Kingdom, United States, Uruguay, Venezuela


How do I order a hereO GPS watch?

Currently the watch is available exclusively for pre-order on our Indiegogo campaign. We offer an early bird special that features USD $99 for the hereO watch, with 6 months of subscription fee included, thereafter USD $4.95 per month of subscription fee applies. This package represents 40% discount off our MSRP. Visit our pre-order campaign here: igg.me/at/hereO

Why can’t I choose color when I pre-order?

We are currently working on offer more color combinations for our customers to choose from. When you pre-order the watch, you don’t need to select the color right now. We will contact each of our customers in a few weeks time to confirm color preference.

How much does the hereO GPS watch cost after the pre-order campaign?

The hereO GPS watch retails for USD $149. Included in the cost is a charging doc and three months of free service. After the three-month period, monthly service fees for GPS tracking start at USD$4.95 per month.

How much does the hereO watch cost in my currency?

Because the watch is sold to over 120 countries, we provide prices in one currency (USD) to ensure consistency.

Please use any popular currency converter to convert to your local currency. Google currency converter is very user friendly.

When will I get my watch?

If you pre-order the hereO watch during our Indiegogo campaign, the expected shipping date is July 15.

What are the benefits to using the hereO Family Location App?

The hereO Family Location app allows family members to view their entire family's whereabouts and communicate through an all-in-one free app on their smartphone, perfect for knowing where their teenage daughters & sons without having to call them all the time. 

Working in sync with the hereO GPS watch, the app allows users to view their family’s whereabouts, broadcast messages and make calls, receive directions to family member’s current location and view each family member’s historical locations. It also allows for parents to create virtual fences around specific areas such as home, school or work, and the app will send a notification when a specific family member arrives or leaves that place.

What smartphones is the hereO family app compatible with?

The family location app is available first on iPhone and Android, following with Windows.

Will I have to sign up for a subscription to the hereO family app, or will there be any additional costs?

The family location app is FREE to download and to use.

story:
MEET THE PERFECT DIVE WATCH

WE SET OUT TO MAKE THE PERFECTLY DESIGNED DIVE WATCH FROM THE BEST AVAILABLE MATERIALS AND OFFER IT AT AN UNBEATABLE PRICE. ALL WHILE HELPING TO SAVE THE ARCTIC.

SAY HELLO TO KNUT GADD CULT DIVER.  

THE ARCTIC CIRCLE EDITION EXCLUSIVE

IN HONOR OF THE GREAT NORTH, EACH ARCTIC CIRCLE EDITION IS PUT TO THE TEST AT THE BOTTOM OF AN ARCTIC LAKE, JUST TO MAKE SURE IT CAN HANDLE THE ADVENTURE. 

 

TROLL LAKE, SWEDEN, ARCTIC CIRCLE: 68°23’N 18°20’E 

FIFTY MILES NORTH OF THE ARCTIC CIRCLE IS ONE OF THE COLDEST PLACES IN THE NORTHERN HEMISPHERE. THIS IS WHERE EACH AND EVERY CULT DIVER IS BAPTIZED.

COVERED IN A FIVE-FOOT LAYER OF ICE FOR THE BETTER PART OF THE YEAR, TROLL LAKE, OR RISSAJAURE, IS THE CLEAREST AND PUREST LAKE IN SWEDEN. ALSO ONE OF THE HARSHEST PLACES YOU CAN IMAGINE. THIS IS WHERE WE SUBMERGE YOUR CULT DIVER IN ZERO DEGREES WATER FOR 72 HOURS, AT A DEPTH OF 100 FEET. 

BECAUSE WHILE SOME COMPANIES MAKE ADVENTURE WATCHES, WE’VE MADE AN ADVENTUROUS WATCH. 

DESIGNED IN SWEDEN 

IN AN ESTEEMED STOCKHOLM DESIGN STUDIO FROM THE 17TH CENTURY, PERCHED NEXT TO THE ROYAL CASTLE, THE KNUT GADD CULT DIVER WAS FIRST SKETCHED TO LIFE IN THE BLISTERING WINTER OF 2018, HONORING THE SIMPLICITY, MINIMALISM, AND FUNCTIONALITY OF SCANDINAVIAN DESIGN.

TESTED IN THE ELEMENTS

MAKING THE BEST DIVER WATCH DOESN’T JUST MEAN DESIGNING AND MANUFACTURING IT. IT ALSO NEEDS TO PROVE ITS CHOPS.

THROUGH FIRE AND ICE, BLOOD, SWEAT, AND TEARS, THE KNUT GADD CULT DIVER IS, AS THEY SAY, ELEMENTAL.

OUR MISSION

APART FROM OUR DRIVE TO MAKE A DAMN GOOD WATCH WITH A SENSE OF ADVENTURE, WE ARE  PASSIONATE ABOUT HELPING TO PRESERVE THE ARCTIC.

THE ARCTIC IS A DELICATE ECOSYSTEM WHERE THINGS ARE CHANGING QUICKLY. THAT’S WHY WE DONATE 10% OF OUR PROFITS TO A FEW HANDPICKED NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS THAT ARE SUCCESSFUL IN THEIR WORK TO PRESERVE THE ARCTIC, PROTECTING POLAR BEARS,  PERFORMING ENVIRONMENTAL RESEARCH AND LOBBYING FOR NATURE. 

WE GO TO THE ARCTIC BECAUSE TESTING A WATCH IN THE FACTORY IS DIFFERENT FROM TOUGH TESTING IT IN THE HARSHEST ENVIRONMENT POSSIBLE. EACH WATCH HAS TO GO TO HELL AND BACK BEFORE WE DELIVER IT TO YOU.

TO ENSURE WE LEAVE NO TRACE RESIDUES BEHIND, OUR WATCHES ARE 100% CLINICALLY WASHED BEFORE BEING SUBMERGED, AND WE STRIVE FOR OUR EXPEDITION TO MEET A ZERO LEVEL CARBON FOOTPRINT.

EASILY INTERCHANGEABLE METAL BAND 

ENGRAVED BACK CASE

AN ENGRAVED BACK CASE DEPICTING AN ARCTIC MAP  HIGHLIGHTS THE EXACT COORDINATES AND COMMEMORATES THE ADVENTURE YOUR CULT DIVER ARCTIC CIRCLE EDITION HAS UNDERTAKEN.

ENGRAVED ADJUSTABLE FOLDED BUCKLE  

 BOX AND TRAVEL POUCH 

 

COOL IN MORE WAYS THAN ONE

A BIT OF LEGACY NEVER HURT 

ONCE UPON A TIME, ALL IT TOOK TO BE ADVENTUROUS WAS  A CONVERTIBLE, A TAILORED SHIRT, AND A DAMN GOOD WATCH. WITH THE KNUT GADD CULT DIVER’S QUALITATIVE AND REFINED INTERIOR SEAMLESSLY MATCHING ITS ELEGANT AND UNDERSTATED EXTERIOR, WE CARRY THAT LEGACY ONWARD, IN HONOR OF KNUT HIMSELF. 

BECAUSE LIVING YOUR LIFE IN STYLE SHOULD BE DONE WITH A WATCH YOU CAN TRUST WITH YOUR LIFE.   

READ MORE AT WWW.KNUTGADD.COM 

REWARDS

ONLY THE FLEET-FOOTED CAN BE CULT DIVERS. GET THEM WHILE THEY'RE COLD.

ADD-ON

THIS HIGH-GRADE RUBBER WRIST BAND ADDS PRACTICALITY TO ITS SPORTY GOOD LOOKS. A PERFECT ADDITION TO COMPLETE YOUR CULT DIVER. $29 (VALUE $69)

*Simply add $29 to your pledge if you want to include 1 X rubber wrist band.  

KNUT GADD CULT DIVER - ARCTIC EDITION 

DESIGNED IN CIVILIZATION. FORGED IN THE WILD. WORN BY THE BEST.  

www.knutgadd.com

*Disclaimer and Guarantee. In the unlikely event that weather-related issues for some reason prevent us from reaching Troll Lake according to schedule (nature can be unpredictable in the Arctic) we will venture to one of several backup locations in the Arctic to adventure test the Cult Diver.

Risks and challenges

Our working prototypes have been rigorously tested to meet the standards we expect from a high-qualitative diver’s watch. It’s currently ready for production and we have a slotted time with our manufacturer to ensure there are no production delays. We therefore fully expect to meet our projected delivery dates. Our Arctic testing of each watch will take place during a 72-hour Arctic lake submersion at 100 feet. We will document this and update you on the progress and process. In general, our updates will be frequent, and we will always be available online for questions from backers, ensuring that you will be in the loop at every stage of the process.

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

Our Cult Diver Arctic Edition is timelessly designed and manufactured to last an adventurous lifetime.

Reusability and recyclability

Did we tell you about the time Knut Gadd used his diver's watch to prop up his Mercedes SL an extra crucial inch to change the tire when stranded on the French Riviera? Anecdote aside, that's just one way a high-quality watch can be used, besides telling time. And being a collectible will ensure the Cult Diver stays out of any landfills. The packaging is also kept to a minimum to lessen the use of resources, renewable or not.

Sustainable materials

Steel is a uniquely sustainable material because it can be infinitely recycled. Our surgical grade steel is 100% non-allergenic.

Sustainable Distribution

Our expedition goes by train to the Arctic, where we use dogs and sleds to take us to Troll Lake. We also ensure that our fulfillment centers have carbon footprint offset programs in place.

Last but not least

Apart from our drive to make a damn good watch with a sense of adventure we are equally passionate about helping to preserve the arctic. The arctic is a delicate ecosystem where things are changing quickly. That’s why we donate 10% of our profits to a selection of environmental organizations.
story_txt: MEET THE PERFECT DIVE WATCHWE SET OUT TO MAKE THE PERFECTLY DESIGNED DIVE WATCH FROM THE BEST AVAILABLE MATERIALS AND OFFER IT AT AN UNBEATABLE PRICE. ALL WHILE HELPING TO SAVE THE ARCTIC.SAY HELLO TO KNUT GADD CULT DIVER.  THE ARCTIC CIRCLE EDITION EXCLUSIVEIN HONOR OF THE GREAT NORTH, EACH ARCTIC CIRCLE EDITION IS PUT TO THE TEST AT THE BOTTOM OF AN ARCTIC LAKE, JUST TO MAKE SURE IT CAN HANDLE THE ADVENTURE.  TROLL LAKE, SWEDEN, ARCTIC CIRCLE: 68°23’N 18°20’E FIFTY MILES NORTH OF THE ARCTIC CIRCLE IS ONE OF THE COLDEST PLACES IN THE NORTHERN HEMISPHERE. THIS IS WHERE EACH AND EVERY CULT DIVER IS BAPTIZED.COVERED IN A FIVE-FOOT LAYER OF ICE FOR THE BETTER PART OF THE YEAR, TROLL LAKE, OR RISSAJAURE, IS THE CLEAREST AND PUREST LAKE IN SWEDEN. ALSO ONE OF THE HARSHEST PLACES YOU CAN IMAGINE. THIS IS WHERE WE SUBMERGE YOUR CULT DIVER IN ZERO DEGREES WATER FOR 72 HOURS, AT A DEPTH OF 100 FEET. BECAUSE WHILE SOME COMPANIES MAKE ADVENTURE WATCHES, WE’VE MADE AN ADVENTUROUS WATCH. DESIGNED IN SWEDEN IN AN ESTEEMED STOCKHOLM DESIGN STUDIO FROM THE 17TH CENTURY, PERCHED NEXT TO THE ROYAL CASTLE, THE KNUT GADD CULT DIVER WAS FIRST SKETCHED TO LIFE IN THE BLISTERING WINTER OF 2018, HONORING THE SIMPLICITY, MINIMALISM, AND FUNCTIONALITY OF SCANDINAVIAN DESIGN.TESTED IN THE ELEMENTSMAKING THE BEST DIVER WATCH DOESN’T JUST MEAN DESIGNING AND MANUFACTURING IT. IT ALSO NEEDS TO PROVE ITS CHOPS.THROUGH FIRE AND ICE, BLOOD, SWEAT, AND TEARS, THE KNUT GADD CULT DIVER IS, AS THEY SAY, ELEMENTAL.OUR MISSIONAPART FROM OUR DRIVE TO MAKE A DAMN GOOD WATCH WITH A SENSE OF ADVENTURE, WE ARE  PASSIONATE ABOUT HELPING TO PRESERVE THE ARCTIC.THE ARCTIC IS A DELICATE ECOSYSTEM WHERE THINGS ARE CHANGING QUICKLY. THAT’S WHY WE DONATE 10% OF OUR PROFITS TO A FEW HANDPICKED NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS THAT ARE SUCCESSFUL IN THEIR WORK TO PRESERVE THE ARCTIC, PROTECTING POLAR BEARS,  PERFORMING ENVIRONMENTAL RESEARCH AND LOBBYING FOR NATURE. WE GO TO THE ARCTIC BECAUSE TESTING A WATCH IN THE FACTORY IS DIFFERENT FROM TOUGH TESTING IT IN THE HARSHEST ENVIRONMENT POSSIBLE. EACH WATCH HAS TO GO TO HELL AND BACK BEFORE WE DELIVER IT TO YOU.TO ENSURE WE LEAVE NO TRACE RESIDUES BEHIND, OUR WATCHES ARE 100% CLINICALLY WASHED BEFORE BEING SUBMERGED, AND WE STRIVE FOR OUR EXPEDITION TO MEET A ZERO LEVEL CARBON FOOTPRINT.EASILY INTERCHANGEABLE METAL BAND ENGRAVED BACK CASEAN ENGRAVED BACK CASE DEPICTING AN ARCTIC MAP  HIGHLIGHTS THE EXACT COORDINATES AND COMMEMORATES THE ADVENTURE YOUR CULT DIVER ARCTIC CIRCLE EDITION HAS UNDERTAKEN.ENGRAVED ADJUSTABLE FOLDED BUCKLE   BOX AND TRAVEL POUCH  COOL IN MORE WAYS THAN ONEA BIT OF LEGACY NEVER HURT ONCE UPON A TIME, ALL IT TOOK TO BE ADVENTUROUS WAS  A CONVERTIBLE, A TAILORED SHIRT, AND A DAMN GOOD WATCH. BauBax Pants feel  light and will not weigh you down. No more saggy pants that drop due to their own weight. Travel light! 


Ok, we all know the feeling how we could carry our wardrobe with us when we travel. Wish granted. Our pants pack small when rolled so you can carry more. Pro tip: Since our pants can go days without a wash, go on, carry those extra shoes you always wanted to wear! 


We didn't want you to have a polka dot pant when an unexpected drizzle came around. So we made them water resistant. 


We know spills happen, especially when you are on your 4th drink, joyously banging those glasses to cheers the viking way, thats why we made them stain resistant! Be it coffee, beer, wine, soda, cocktails, our pants allow you to walk away without a stain. You can practically walk to work in them after partying all night! 


After sitting on those long, cramped, uncomfortable flights don't you feel like stretching out, doing some Yoga maybe. Well now you can. Our dynamic stretch technology allows you to stretch your hearts out!


Breathe in - Breathe out .... thats what our pants do all the time. Allowing your skin to breathe while keeping you fresh like a daisy!


Feel so comfortable in our pants that you just don't want to remove them, just as your daughter loves her princess dress! Well go right ahead! Wear them night in day out without a wash. We promise they won't stink.



We get it. You want more pockets, but cargos are not your thing. With strategically placed pockets you can go from a hike to an elite restaurant without a change. Whats more? we made your pockets secure and deep. The YKK zippered pockets give you a secure way to carry things that could easily slide out on a plane when you are catching some zzZZZZz. Deep pockets allow you to carry more than just keys. To give you that sophisticated look we have designed pockets that blend in with each style. Check out our Color and Details section below to get a better look!


Travel and the sun go hand in hand and we have got you covered quite literally. BauBax pants are UPF 50+ so you can go out and enjoy the sun! That means they only allow 1/50th of those harmful rays through. (Blocking 98% of the other UV rays). Whats more? all of this comes without any use of harmful chemicals which are found in most sunscreens. So go ahead you sun flower! Beam Away!


Although natural fibers like Merino Wool and Bamboo are strong, they need a little help from Polyester to make sure your pant stays as good as new even if you wear them 365 days in a year.


This unique property of Bamboo is why we decided to go for Bamboo over Cotton. Bamboo viscose is 3X more absorbent than most cotton fibers, wicking moisture away from the skin much faster and keeping you dry and comfortable easier. Bamboo viscose can take in three times more water than its weight which once made into a fabric, means that it can absorb tons of moisture.


Merino Wool on the outside helps wick away the moisture that the Bamboo has absorbed on the inside. The combined action of Bamboo Viscose and Merino Wool helps keep you dry, fresh, and comfortable.


Think of a sheep. When they get a bit chilly, they don’t head to the closet and grab another layer. When they get warm they don’t throw on a cotton t-shirt. They only get one shot at it and Mother Nature has given them the perfect clothing to keep them comfortable all year round in all kinds of conditions.
Warming: Wool has a natural crimp to it that helps it trap more dead air than any other fiber. Dead air is a fantastic insulator and provides a great buffer against the cold.
Cooling: Wool has the ability to store moisture within the structure of the fiber. As your body warms up, the moisture stored within the fiber will begin to evaporate, cooling the air between your skin and the fabric. The warmer you get the more evaporation takes place and the larger the cooling effect


Merino wool is super fine, but yet it can cause an itch, trust us we scratched a lot. So, we smartly put Bamboo closer to your skin and Merino on the outside - to Ditch the Itch. You are welcome!


For those times when you are on the road, we have got good news for you. BauBax pants are naturally quick to dry thanks to the wicking technology. 
















Because all our pants are Teflon treated, they will absorb less odor and stains. Thus, they can and should be washed less frequently.
CARE: Wash with like colors with mild detergent cold. Tumble dry low or lay flat. Do not use fabric softener during wash as this may damage the water repellency. Do NOT bleach. Do NOT dry clean.


DOMESTIC SHIPPING - To 33 Countries:
United States, Canada, Australia, Singapore, Hong Kong, and 28 EU Countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
We've got 6 warehouses worldwide that allow us to offer low-cost domestic shipping to the 33 countries listed above. Backers with a shipping address in any of these 33 countries will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT, etc. We've got that covered!
*INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING - Rest of the World:
Backers from all other countries (apart from the 33 countries listed above) may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.  
From our prior experiences, we have learned that most of the countries have higher thresholds for import duties and most of our international customers should not get charged any additional fees apart.

story:
Our Story

It all started out with my experience in the fashion and arts world here and around the Baltimore area. I wanted fashion to be more accessable to the community; to all people, of any shape or size, income, or ethnic background. The first show was a tribute to the late Alexander McQueen, who had such great talents, ideas and presentations that always inspired me. He held fashion shows in all kinds of unsual places, like garages, ice rinks, and warehouses. I thought what better place then the beautiful and historic heart of Baltimore city, Mt Vernon. The parks in historic Mt. Vernon gave us a runway to that topped all runways.  It was length of a large city block including multiple levels, stairs, and a fountain! Wooh, look out Tyra! I stewed over the idea for a while, as I tried to gather my confidence. I decided to post an open invite on facebook to see how many people were interested. It was kind of like getting Betty White on SNL! First there was 10 interested people, then 25, then 90, then over a hundred. I knew I had to make this happen. This would be my biggest challenge ever!! So what exactly was this great idea?!?  "A Day of Fashion", is a day in which we invited the community to come out and show their support for the fashion industry. Models strut their stuff, designers show off their talents, photographers professional and amature capture great shots outdoors in the historic park. Also it was to be a chance for people wanting to network and meet others in the fashion & arts field. Finally, an event where other inspiring artist can take part. Offering open runway time gave a chance for the daring to take their first walk. I hoped this event would pass along the inspiration to others in the community to make things happen. "Free to the Fashionable & Open to the Public". The event was totally free (and will aways be) to all taking part. Even the Baltimore boutiques I invited to showcase their stores who sell local area fashions. Having a free public event was the biggest challenge! I had to find sponsors who shared in my vision and  to help support my dream and its costs. It happen!! I, We and the Community came together and made the dream a reality when the crowds said it couldn't. My next goal is it to be bigger and better! Now to the up & coming... at the end of the summer, beginning of fall we will hold our 2nd Annual "A Day of Fashion ~Orchestrated Elegance". The theme this year will be inspired by Music,. Like fashion: with tedious work and conducting, it creates a beautiful harmony. We are within the second stages of planning and are currently looking for: sponsor to share and fund the vision, designers & boutiques to show their clothing, models, photographers, hair and make-up artists in order to make this a sucess. If that is not enough I am still in need of a strong support staff. Oh yeah, and music... looking for musicians, from classical - contemporary to accompany our runway shows as they happen. The booming bass we will save for the after-party. This year,  in the park, it will be refined, elegant, with some Bmore charm.

The Impact

We need everyones support! Last year was a great start to our Annual Free Fashion Event for the community.  If we don't get the support we will not be able to make it happen again.  Last year gave alot of people the chance to show their work, take their first walk on the runways and challenge themselves in many ways.  We NEED your help to make this happen again. Bigger and better this year!!

What We Need & What You Get

Ok, here is the scoop. It costs us $2000 dollar to rent the parks in Mt Vernon. Last year, there is no discount or difference for non-profit events.  I personally rasied and funded all costs myself last year and got together everything together in a matter of 3 months.  This year was an unpleasant suprise to find out the rental fees have doubled to $4000 and even the application fee has gone up to $150 dollars.  So the money we are trying to raise will go to the rental and anything over that will help pay for ads and equipment.  No one taking part in this event is paid.  Everyone is donating their time and energy to make it work because they believe in the dream.

Other Ways You Can Help

This is for the community and supported by the community.  Tell your friends, family, co-workers, that friend you think should be a model and those who need to come out of their shell.  A Day of Fashion is the event to be fashionable, be noticed and be Kantankerous!  www.adayoffashion.com

story:
Short Summary

My name is Brad Saul. I have been a serial entrepreneur since the age of 13. My businesses include a radio network and syndication company that is 34 years old. Our credits include having created the NBA Radio Network, Sears College Football Game of the Week, Animal Planet Radio, Travel Channel Radio, and more is running low some of my companies have made the Inc. 500 in 1990  I was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis. I decided that it should come with more than just good parking privileges. So, I created. businesses to help people with disabilities, including the second largest provider of paratransit in the city of Chicago, the first software to make websites fully ADA compliant with voice – text and text – voice capability. If you can use a keyboard or hold a smart phone camera, you can use Twitter or Vine. However, even if you are not disabled or don't have difficulty using a keyboard, finding the perfect 140 characters or six seconds of video, it isn't easy. Yet, anyone/everyone can talk into a smart phone and create a 10 second voice message, a "Peep". That's what Peepsters is all about. Easy. Fun. Random thoughts that can be shared with friends, family, or colleagues. All the features of the other services, but only if you want. can be passionate about and to people they trust.  Peepsters will be an app initially for IOS, but Android too. Perhaps the coolest feature of Peepsters is that it is a double bottom-line business. It's nice to make money, but better to make money doing something good.

story:
The video above is from the showcase of RAW:natural born artists, which I am up for LA Accessories Designer of the Year.  http://www.rawartists.org/stylesbyana

Hi there! My name is Ana and I am the designer behind Styles By Ana. I don't remember the exact moment that I fell in love with neckties, but I've always found them interesting, elegant and just simply fascinating. Nevertheless, they were a man's accessory, therefore untouchable in my head. Until one day, a year and a half ago, when Pinterest showed me a pleated tie. I was delightfully inspired. I bought a tie the next day, hand sewed it and stitched a button on. It brought me so much joy to be creating and sewing again. 

Styles By Ana MyTies are one of a kind and no two are alike. We love color, floral, geometry, vibrancy, intricacy, paisley patterned neckties in 100% Silk. With those, we pair an amazing array of different colored and sized buttons, pearls and studs, that will provide a feminine touch to the masculine necktie. All items are conceived, sourced, sewn and produced by yours truly in sunny Los Angeles, California. 

Concept Fashion Week is a new turn key platform for designers to showcase their collections during fashion week in both New York and Los Angeles and I would very much love to be a part of it in LA. 


What We Need & What You Get

We need $1300.00 to cover the entry fee to LA Concept Fashion Week.


The Impact

You are not only funding my entry fee but also supporting my dream and future. You are supporting a young fashion designer with a lot of passion and talent to create, and always be inventive. I don’t want to miss my chance to showcase on such an amazing opportunity due to financial reasons. If I don’t reach my funding goal I will find other ways to showcase at LA Concept Fashion Week but your help will certainly make a huge difference!

So, please take a look at the perks on the right side of the page. If you are willing to contribute, please select any perk(s) you like and support me! A HUGE THANK YOU!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a contribution, that's completely fine. I am already so incredibly grateful that people are willing to read this campaign so if you personally cannot help me then please share my campaign on your social media pages or to friends and family. Please share this with anyone you think will be interested in supporting me make it to LA Concept Fashion Week. THANK YOU BUNCHES!!!

If you can't make a contribution, that's completely fine. I am already so incredibly grateful that people are willing to read this campaign so if you personally cannot help me then please share my campaign on your social media pages or to friends and family. Please share this with anyone you think will be interested in supporting me make it to LA Concept Fashion Week. THANK YOU BUNCHES!!!

story:
Hi!

We are Üdahaus and we have invented a new product that wants to make you smile!

It's an eyeglass frame attachment that brings a little attitude to your personal style.

We have started with a Boombox, a Disco Ball, and three colored Gummy Bears named Olaf, Günther and DiDi.

The eyeglass frame attachments are easy to use; just take the piece and press it onto your frames. They're unique, fun and perfect for sunglasses, novelty glasses, or prescription glasses.

Along with creating an exciting new accessory, we are out to make a positive impact for our world and those who live in it.

DiDi is our stylish and sassy green Gummy bear, and when you purchase her, a portion of the proceeds will be donated to The Arbor Day Foundation.

Günther is our red jet-setting trendsetter Gummy Bear, and when you purchase him, a portion of the proceeds will be donated to the American Red Cross.

Last but never least is the world's greatest mountain climbing yellow Gummy Bear, Olaf, who loves nature and animals. When you purchase him, a portion of the proceeds will go to the SPCA. 

But Üdahaus is much more than eye style frame attachments. We are developing an exciting online social media website where you can create your own artwork, chat with others, receive discounts on Üdahaus merchandise such as clothing, hats, and stickers, and learn more about the charities you are helping. 

So where is Üdahaus today?

We have filed our trademarks, copyrights and patent paperwork.  We have negotiated terms with a factory to produce our items and have begun developing our first generation website.

We now need your support to make it all happen!  Your generous pledges will enable us to order the frame attachments, purchase an inventory of Üdahaus merchandise, maximize the potential of our inter-active website and to start making a significant difference to our charities.

story:
HELP TAKE CJB APPAREL ON TOUR THIS SUMMER!  

   EXTENDED VIDEO: By Melissa Seda Films 

                http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZtE8Imf9ZuM&feature=youtu.be                                             

WHO: My name is Cassie Joy Bergman - I am currently a full-time student in my senior year at Washington State University. Born and raised on Vashon Island, among a thriving community of artists and creators, I knew from an early age that I too wanted to join the creative world. I started shooting photography at 11 years old and two years ago, I realized my dream of bringing these passions together in the form of an apparel line: Create Joy & Beauty. Inspired by what is captured through the lens of my camera, CJB designs are fresh, unique, and an authentic expression of youth. 

WHAT: My goal is to fund a national tour for CJB Apparel this summer. I plan to vend at popular music festivals all over the country. I am an avid festival-goer and a huge fan of EDM (Electronic Dance Music), and relish these opportunities to connect with fellow music-lovers and entrepeneurs. 

 

WHEN: Photography has been a part of my life since I was 11, but I hope to make 2013 the year I take my designs and concepts to the next level. The tour will last from June-September 2013. 

 

WHERE: I will be vending at several of the popular music festivals around the country. Starting with vending at Paradiso at the Gorge, Washington.

 

WHY CJB? CJB Apparel has been independently run for two years now. All CJB design work, and the marketing of those designs, has been run by me myself and I (with help from some friends of course!). I would hope that this shows the true dedication and passion that goes into this brand.

 

I work really hard to keep designs fresh, colorful and authentic. For example, although tempting, I try to steer clear from the typical Seattle designs involving the Space Needle. The Space Needle never really represented Seattle for me. The cranes next to the West Seattle Bridge, however, were what I drove by every single time I traveled to Seattle, and THOSE are what I remember most: the dinosaurs of Seattle! I leave the Space Needle designs to other local brands who have already honed in on that design so successfully. 

What CJB Needs & What You Get:

Vending: I have already paid for 4 events, totaling $2,080. I still need to pay for the rest of the events, as well as pay for the inventory itself! 

Transportation: I have calculated roughly $2,000 total in gas costs. 

Inventory: I will be making most of my inventory ahead of time. I have put in hours of design time, coming up with new and exclusive summer designs and need funds to keep inventory coming while on the road. However, what is so cool about everything I produce this summer, is that once it's sold out, it's SOLD OUT! 

 

Food: I will be living on the road 90% of the time, and will be eating out of pocket on the daily. It would be great to raise a little extra so I can be sure to have grub funds! 

Van: This is the van I hope to take on the road with me if I raise enough! She's a beauty! 

 

What You Get: Fresh, unique, lovingly crafted art creations turned into quality designer apparel. My everlasting gratitude!! A chance to help me Create Joy & Beauty across the country! Follow my road trip and stay updated on my whereabouts, the music scene & all kinds of hip happenings. 

 

YOU GET TO BE PART OF SOMETHING WONDERFUL!!!

 

Where do the funds go if I don't reach my goal?

If my goal is not reached, the funds I raise will go to vending fees for each festival, and inventory costs. This way, I can hopefully recycle the money I make at festivals to get me from one festival to the next.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

As a designer, I think one of the biggest fears I have is not running out of ideas, but running out of product! 

Another challenge I expect to face is consistency with product, promotion, and social media. I’ll be on the road 24/7, which means when I’m not driving, I’ll need to be spreading the word on the CJB brand, and keeping up with my inventory. I plan to tackle this in the best way I know how: lots of rest, and with the help of friends (and a little planning and organization too)! I hope to bring one or two people along with me to help balance it all.

This trip will be the experience of a lifetime, but it’s going to require a lot of hard work and dedication for it to become a reality. With the help of backers, a reliable screen printing company, a few helpful friends, and a collective of supporters (YOU!!!), these challenges will be overcome! Thank you Indiegogo, and I'll see you on the road!

Other Ways You Can Help

I completely understand that some folks just can't afford to donate. HAVE NO FEAR! YOU CAN STILL HELP, MY DEAR!

We live in a social media world. It is SO easy to get the word out to your friends and family by simply posting a link to my Indiegogo profile. Make some noise about the CJB Apparel campaign! Post this link on your Facebook, Twitter or personal blog, or email it to friends and family! You never know WHO will see it and take advantage of some great deals! (You can also use the Indiegogo share tools listed below)

"It’s about making the most of life, absorbing all experiences, following the music and reaching goals"-CJB

 THANK YOU INDIEGOGO!

          (more images of perks below)


A Note about Shipping: Shipping is included for orders within the United States. Add five dollars for Canada, and $10 for the rest of the World.


                                                   '206' Snapback Cap

  

 

Crane City Mens and Womens Tanks, Longsleeve Crewneck, Shortsleeve Tee

      

     

Snow Ghost and iSki - Designs Inspired by the Mountain Slopes!

  

       

          

      

 

Snow Ghost is my favorite chair lift on Schweitzer Mountain in Idaho! I learned to ski here in 2011 and spent quite some time shreddin' the Snow Ghost slopes. Look for chair lift #101 when you're wearing your Snow Ghost shirt!

 

The iSki design is an image of my shadow on the first chair lift on Schweitzer Mountain. I love this design because it reminds me of the first lift of the day. After driving three hours from Pullman, it's always refreshing to hop on that first lift before a full day of riding the slopes!

 

 

  EDM Rhinestone Tank

Get a little sexy in these one of a kind, hand pressed, asymmetrical rhinestone cutoff tank tops. Each one is specially hand made and trimmed to show off the body in the right way. These tanks are great paired with skinny jeans or skirts when your dancing the night away to the music you live by.

 

 

Rave is King -  these rhinestone designed crop tops are perfect for wearing to raves and nights out on the town. Pair with a high waisted long, flowy skirt, or just rock it with some cute mini shorts if you’re heading out to a big show! Also work great for performers like belly dancers, hoola-hoopers and go-go dancers! HAND WASH.

 

CJB Neon Fringe Tank - One of CJB's most popular items! These light weight, hand-cut fringe tanks are perfect for dancing! They move as you move! You’ll be the brightest one in the room while you light up the dance floor in these one-of-a-kind neon tanks.

 

 

 

 


EDM Tank - I've always had a huge passion for Electronic Dance Music. I've been going to shows since I was 17. EDM will always have a special place in my heart. The lettering for this tank is produced from a photograph I took at Identity Festival at the Gorge, Washington in 2011.

 


     Frame the Fame Perk: swagglasses

Frame the Fame Perk: Whoville


While traveling in Europe in May 2012, I found myself taking lots of mental notes of fashion trends. I brought home a wonderful dress from Germany that became the basis for the design of these skirts. My mom, Eileen, and I made these patterns by hand and hand-sewed them as well! Also among my hand-made items are these sequined bras I created.

 

 

     Another Winter Favorite, the CJBeanie!

 

 

 

 

 

Below you'll see the new My Paradiso design. Remember! This design will come on lightweight tees and tanks of all colors for both men and women. Fringe tanks will be offered as well!

BRAND NEW!! CJB pre-release (available at the $35 perk) - the ever-popular Snapback cap in a new design: 'Keep Trance Alive' !! An image of the hat & my original drawing.

story:
A special thanks to our incredible 518 pre-order supporters, including Canada's largest department store - Hudson's Bay. We can't wait to share our product with you. www.knixwear.com

We believe it's time your underwear did more.

That's why we're changing it for good.

What has your underwear done for you lately? Chances are probably not that much. We want to change that. We're committed to making underwear that’s as comfortable as can be, beautiful to behold, and technologically state-of-the-art. So that you can feel good, look great, and have the confidence to take on whatever life throws at you.

Every pair of Knix Wear features Fresh Fix Technology™. A thin yet super absorbent gusset, it wicks away moisture and naturally eliminates odor, keeping you feeling fresh and dry all day long - without the feeling that you're wearing anything other than your most comfortable pair of undies. 

 

We've created 3 lines that do whatever you're needing to do.

Whether you want to hit the gym, the nightclub, or the boardroom, there’s a pair that will sync with every aspect of your life:

Knix is our everyday basic that is anything but basic. It’s your essential pair of underwear that multitasks just as much as you do. 

Knixy is lovely lace lingerie that can go from morning ‘til wherever the night takes you. Feel fancy and fresh for as long as you desire.  

FitKnix is the ultimate workout underwear, maximizing movement and comfort while integrating moisture wicking technology throughout the garment.

 


The principles of the Knix Wear brand.

1. Fashion

We want to make women’s lives easier, so it’s essential that our underwear is easy to love. A big part of that is making it as beautiful as possible. Working with a well-established lingerie designer, who has experience designing for the likes of Victoria’s Secret, Gap Body, and Nordstrom, we believe our designs are just that. And, after travelling the world in search of the best fabrics, we are thrilled to see them come to life.

2. Function

We have developed an incredibly discreet and effective gusset that can be seamlessly integrated into underwear. We call it Fresh Fix Technology™.  It wicks away and absorbs moisture, and eliminates odor. And with a 100% cotton top layer, it's extraordinary technology that doesn't feel out of the ordinary against your skin.

3. Fit

From demure to cheeky, we've created a range of styles that will fit yours.

  • Bikini: A classic, low-rise bottom that hugs the body with just the right stretch.
  • Thong: A less is more look with a revealing rear that’s there where it counts.
  • Boyshort: A streamlined fit that features more coverage and a snug feel.
  • NEW! High-Waist Brief: A retro fit, sitting higher on the waist for increased coverage. 

Each style is available in your choice of black or nude, and come in a wide range of sizes.   

Combine that with our three different lifestyle lines, and there's bound to be a pair (or more) that you will love, love, love.

Just take a look. 

On top of getting your pair before anyone else, we've included some exclusive extras to thank you for your support.

The Knix Wear lingerie wash bag: keep your favorite knickers looking lovely.

 

Minisoaks of Soak Detergent: modern care for the lingerie you love.

 

The Story:

The inspiration for Knix Wear came while looking into a more suitable underwear solution for the 1 in 3 women who experience the occasional light leak also known as stress incontinence. In the process of developing our technology, we discovered that it could be slim enough to fit into any style of underwear. And that the benefits it offered would be appreciated by more than just 1 in 3, but 100% of women. 

We want to keep the conversation going.

Launching Knix Wear is just the first step. Whether or not you're able to support us at this point, join us as we continue to revolutionize what your knickers can do.

You can find us at:

knixwear.com

facebook.com/knixwear

@knixwear

pinterest.com/knixwear

Or get in touch with us at:

info@knixwear.com

 

A Special Thank You To:

Consul Media – For the videography

Kris Goojha - For the beautiful designs

Jennifer Jansen - For ensuring our product fits just right

Workplace One - For letting us shoot on location

INSEAD Professor & Students - For your support and inspiration

Soak Wash - for providing us with some special perks 

Cristiano Morroy – For the stunning photography

Whitman Emerson – For their superb branding

And to the hundreds of women whose input has helped us get Knix Wear to where it is today.

 

FAQs:

When will my product be ready?

We are targeting a July delivery for all finished goods. We are confident that we will meet this timeline as we have been working with our manufacturing partners for a few months and have finalized our patterns and designs. 

 

When do I get to pick my size and colour? 

We will send you a link once the campaign has been completed where you can pick your desired size and colour.

 

How does the product eliminate odor?

Fresh Fix TechnologyTM features silver threading which naturally kills odor-causing bacteria. 

 

How much can the product absorb?

Every pair of Knix Wear knickers can absorb up to 3 teaspoons of liquid at any one time. The bikini and boyshort styles have a larger gusset and therefore are able to absorb even more than the thong style.

 

What kind of research have you done?

When coming up with the product requirements we did a mix of primary and secondary research. Primary research consisted of doctor, physiotherapist and continence society interviews as well as speaking with hundreds of women in person, online and via surveys. Secondary research included reading medical journals and information created by national continence organizations. 

 

Where can I learn more about stress incontinence? 

A great place to start is the resources provided by the National Association for Continence in the US. http://www.nafc.org/bladder-bowel-health/what-is-incontinence/what-every-woman-should-know/ 

 

Will Knix Wear fit me if I'm pregnant?

Yes, all of our underwear is designed to sit below the belly for a comfortable fit no matter how far along you are. But for maximum comfort, we recommend the Knix line.

 

Do you plan on making additional colours and styles available?

Yes! We have plans in the works for additional colors, sizes and styles. But we'd love your feedback, so if you have anything in particular that you would love to see, just let us know.

FAQs:
When will my product be ready?
We are targeting a July delivery for all finished goods. We are confident that we will meet this timeline as we have been working with our manufacturing partners for a few months and have finalized our patterns and designs. 
 
When do I get to pick my size and colour? 
We will send you a link once the campaign has been completed where you can pick your desired size and colour.
 
How does the product eliminate odor?
Fresh Fix TechnologyTM features silver threading which naturally kills odor-causing bacteria. 
 
How much can the product absorb?
Every pair of Knix Wear knickers can absorb up to 3 teaspoons of liquid at any one time. The bikini and boyshort styles have a larger gusset and therefore are able to absorb even more than the thong style.
 
What kind of research have you done?
When coming up with the product requirements we did a mix of primary and secondary research. Primary research consisted of doctor, physiotherapist and continence society interviews as well as speaking with hundreds of women in person, online and via surveys. Secondary research included reading medical journals and information created by national continence organizations. 
 
Where can I learn more about stress incontinence? 
A great place to start is the resources provided by the National Association for Continence in the US. http://www.nafc.org/bladder-bowel-health/what-is-incontinence/what-every-woman-should-know/ 
 
Will Knix Wear fit me if I'm pregnant?
Yes, all of our underwear is designed to sit below the belly for a comfortable fit no matter how far along you are. But for maximum comfort, we recommend the Knix line.
 
Do you plan on making additional colours and styles available?
Yes! We have plans in the works for additional colors, sizes and styles. But we'd love your feedback, so if you have anything in particular that you would love to see, just let us know.

story:
We're specifically here to raise money to make a website where you can see and buy the exact one-of-a-kind custom made wallet, bag, or product that catches your eye and maybe even whispers that the two of you would look incredible together. The more we raise, the better the usability and more custom the products we can offer will be!

Our hand crafted wallets as well as the bags and backpacks are made from upcycled US highway billboard vinyl- an extremely durable, waterproof, and downright awesome material that lets every piece we make be as unique and one-of-a-kind as you.

To support us, just click on one of the pledge levels to the right or the big pink "Contribute Now" button! 

(If you're outside the US, no worries! We ship anywhere in the world. At the bottom of each pledge tier it will say the amount to add to the total- just click on the reward you want, add that to the total, and you're good to go). :)

Featured by:

"10 Projects that Deserve Your Money." - Heavy.com

"..they certainly bring a unique design sense to the equation. Made from recycled billboard vinyl, it’s all kind of fitting since this bad boy calls attention to itself and makes no apologies for doing so." - InStash.com

"Highway billboards reincarnated as... ski bags! ...Each has “character” via the inked graphics and text that remain from the material’s old days as an advertising sign." - GearJunkie.com

350.org / biglines.com / Fubiz.net / Korduroy.tv / TheTurboBass.com / EcoFashionWorld.com / DailyXY / Thrillist

meet our wallets!


the Palette

These are the colors you get to choose from when you get a wallet, backpack, or bag. (Once the campaign is successful, we'll contact you and find out what color(s) you want!)

debossed Logo Option:

You can choose between the current vinyl Epicstoke label (above pictures) or a more minimal debossed logo (below) that will appear on the bottom right of the wallet (bottom right inside for the Gentlemen). Just like color choice, we'll collect your Epicstoke label choice at the end of the Kickstarter directly from you. :)

the Ole

A minimalistic Scandinavian inspired design that breaths simplicity and actually has no idea how to make your pants bulky. RFID blocking for inside cards while the outside cards are still scanable for your convenience. niice.

 

 

the Gentleman

Because some of us like to keep things classy- a modern take on a favorite bifold design. RFID protected when it's closed, just open to scan inside cards. nifty.

 

 

UNLOCK this reward : the Backpack

Once this indiegogo hits $4,000 in pledges, this classic style two pocket backpack will be added as a reward avaliable for purchase. It's made from the same exact waterproof recycled highway billboard vinyl as the wallets and is avaliable in the same color options and will have a minimal 'epicstoke' label on it when shipped out!


UNLOCK this reward : the Gym Bag

Once this indiegogo hits $7,000 in pledges, this 4 pocket gym bag will be added as a reward avaliable for purchase. It's made from the same exact waterproof recycled highway billboard vinyl as the wallets and is avaliable in the same color options and will have a minimal 'epicstoke' label on it when shipped out!


LIMITED reward 20/20! : the Ski Bag

We're only offering 20 of these custom made ski bags for this campaign. This 191cm double ski bag (fits 1 or 2 pairs) with adjustable shortening strap for shorter skis will stunningly stand out in any aiport you fly into or anywhere you ski for that matter. Made with the same recycled waterproof billboard vinyl material and AquaGuard YKK zippers, it will keep the inside of your bag dry and keep that water out that rusts your edges. You like that or what? -Avaliable in the same colors as the wallets!


LIMITED reward 10/10! : the Thruster Surfboard Bag

Only 10 of these will be sold for this campaign! This thruster surf bag comes in 6'0'' & 6'6" sizes with 1/4 inch padding and non-rusting zipper parts. If you want to stand out like no one else when you drive up to the beach this summer, here's your chance. Avaliable in the same colors as the wallets!

the Quiver

Have you seen our Kickstarter and still really want to get your hands on a Roo and I.D. wallet? This special $100 packaged reward is the only way we're selling these two wallets right now! If you want to see more pictures of them feel free to check our recent successfully funded Kickstarter!

about This Campaign:

We're excited to be here.

Basically, we got into making these two wallets, the Ole & the Gentleman, because, well, a bunch of people told us they kicked a lot of ass and for that we'll be forever grateful because here we are!

Making sure that you have the right to own an Epicstoke wallet and get the same exclamitory remarks from friends and strangers while having something extremely functional, durable, one-of-a-kind, made from recycled highway billboard vinyl with state-of-that-art RFID blocking technology in it is our perogative. It's like a sleek fully loaded car that boasts your individuality while embodying minimalism and functionality- except for now it's in your pocket.

Did we mention we're still selling these two wallets at our low discount prices? Becasuse we are.

We're coming to indiegogo now because we need to raise extra money for a new website that will accomodate the one-of-a-kind nature of these wallets. Once the site is up, so the prices of these wallets will go as well. This is your chance to get an Ole or Gentleman in one of 7 great colors. You also have the option to have the 'Epicstoke' logo debossed into the vinyl or get the classic Epicstoke label.

reasons to Support:

  • Everything is made from one of the thinnest, most durable, waterproof materials out there: billboard vinyl
  • Ever lose your wallet? Epicstoke wallets are easy to find and everyone will know it's yours
  • Leaves more space in your pockets than they'll know what to do with
  • Breaks in like leather in case you want to pack your life into them
  • Easy accessibility- can even scan credit cards while still in the Ole
  • Keeps your butt and thighs looking as they should
  • You deserve to treat yourself
  • Awesome gift and easy to mail
  • Only $21 to get in on this
  • One-of-a-kind, amazing conversation piece- quality that stands out
  • There are two great styles to choose from
  • They're made in the USA by highly skilled US sewers (i.e. sewers of Mountainsmith packs) and save an immensely durable material from going into landfills and getting burned into the air

wallet RFID Blocking Technology:

Because the high tech material we're using (Cryptalloy) is only 0.1mm thick, it can seamlessly fit between layers of the above two wallets without any notice or appearance change what so ever. It's a near magical, state-of-the-art material that blocks all common frequencies and comes with both wallets free of charge on this indiegogo campaign.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zD8PJr3sfHw&feature=player_embedded 

 

"CRYPTALLOY is a high tech RFID shielding foil which blocks RFID signals of all current RFID frequencies. It protects digital privacy. As an inner layer it turns items like wallets into data safes for personal and biometric data. Certified by TÜV (Germany) the RFID blocking material protects from unauthorized access to the data encoded on RFID/NFC chips.


Note* The mesh inside the wallets is upcycled from mountain towns and surf events.
Note2** We love you guys. You're the best. Seriously.

story:
A really bad idea "SPARKS" a new innovation...

Fuse-panel-pho-bi-a

(the fear of changing a fuse)

Hi, I'm Joel Vogt, and I am one of the 40+ million people in North America who still have to deal with an old fuse panel at work or home. If you have one too, then you know what a harrowing experience changing a fuse in that old panel can be. The first thing that comes to mind when you "blow" a fuse and approach the fuse panel is, "electricity can kill me." So, naturally, we've all tried different methods to be on the safe side when changing a fuse; from wearing rubber gloves to using a pair of rubber grip pliers, or just using your fingers, which always sends a chill down your back. Others give in to their fears and call an electrician. Well, after a close call with my fuse panel and a search in vain for the proper tool to safely change a fuse, I decided to take a stand.

The Fuse-man safety stick

I have designed and developed a safety tool that allows me, and you, to safely change a fuse in that old panel. This sleek little device is made from non-conductive material and is long enough to keep your hands away from the  panel. You know how hard it is to identify a blown fuse! I do too, so I built in a flashlight to light up the panel and make a blown fuse very easy to find. Even better, when you remove the fuse with my safety stick you don't have to worry about dropping it on the floor, because a magnet under the rubber grip holds the fuse in place for you. But wait, there's more! After you remove the bad fuse, just pop the top off the Safety Stick and grab a new fuse from the caddy that has room to store five new fuses. And after you've replaced your fuse and the lights are back on, use the magnetic hanger on the Safety Stick to attach it to the panel where it belongs. Mission accomplished!

Typical old fuse panel.

Here is a photo of an old fuse panel. A lot of panels have been serviced so many times that they are missing the cover plate. How would you like to change a fuse in this one. Shocking thought, huh?!?

Old Buss style household fuse panel

The process of development

I started from an idea and redesigned it several times. With each revision there were new challenges to overcome: creating gripping power that is not too strong or too weak, allowing ease of twisting and pressure, making a perfect connection to hold the fuse securely, and creating a tool that is functional and convenient to use. You would think it would be a simple task for a tool to simply grab and turn a fuse, but that is not the case. Because fuses are made of slick painted metal, it is very difficult to grasp and turn them with your fingers or any other device. Another issue is trying to identify which fuse is blown. Most fuse panels are in areas with poor lighting, so trying to see a burnt filament through the small glass window on a fuse is very frustrating.  To alleviate this problem, I added a built in flashlight. With the inclusion of a storage caddy and magnetic hanger, the result is a completely functioning fuse puller in one sleek tool. Four years later...

First sketch of the Fuse-man.

Original Idea

First technical drawing of Fuse-man.

Technical Drawing

The Fuse-man takes shape.

Development Changes

Final patent drawings.

Final production schematic and patent application.

I need you to spread the word

I know fuse panel talk is not a hot topic of conversation for anyone. But if you know someone who has an old fuse panel, let them know about the Fuse-man. With your support we can provide some peace of mind to a fellow fuse puller. Who knows, you may even save someone from harm and at the same time help me move forward with this new innovation. Remember there are 40+ million fuse panels out there that need a Fuse-man attached to them. There is probably someone somewhere right now standing in a dark room with no power and wondering if they should open that fuse panel. Let's empower them.

Ready to go!

Fuse-man Safety Stick

EVERY ONE NEEDS AN AUNT RUTH...

 Just a little tribute to my # 1 Backer... For two years I had been "designing on a dime" my Fuse-man project and had once again run out of money. I had my first run of cad drawings complete. I had a quote of $9,000 from a prototyping company to make my first working model. It seemed like a reasonable amount but, as I said, I was broke! I told them to be patient, that I would, somehow, come up with the funds. So I taped my drawings back up to the office wall and resigned myself to more waiting on my dream concept.

A few days later I got a call from my mom telling me something special was in the mail from my recently deceased aunt. Then she added, in almost a whisper, "not everybody gets one". A few days after the mysterious phone call, I received a letter from an attorney in Florida notifying me that the Estate of my Aunt Ruth had been settled and I was a beneficiary! Apparently she had made a list of all her nieces and nephews (exactly 47 names).  She then methodically lined through each name that did not "measure up" and conversely made a star by each name that did. Being a 6th grade school teacher her whole life, that made perfect sense. (One of my uncles has the actual list.) Each of the twenty finalist were awarded a check for $5,000 dollars. Of course, when I received my letter I immediately called my sister to see if she had made the cut, so to speak, and of course, if she knew who might have been left out. As you can imagine, within days, the whole family was in the know and in an uproar over this approach to showing favoritism. Correction, those who did not receive were upset and those who did receive somehow justified it. Dear aunt Ruth probably knew the controversy she would create with her $100,000 dollar gift, but she also knew at the time of the award she would be in a position to NOT CARE!

This gets even better. After I received my check I called the prototyping company. I told them the story of  how I had come into $5,000 dolars to put toward the prototype. After they finally stopped laughing they got serious and told me they would make the prototype for the $5,000, because Aunt Ruth would have wanted them to.....TRUE STORY...

...I NEED MORE AUNT RUTH'S

Help fund my project

The Fuse-man is very close to becoming a reality. I have been through the design, prototyping and patenting process. I have contracted a manufacturer to produce my device and molds are being made with my first shipment of Fuse-men due in March of this year. I am asking for $5,000 in additional funding to implement the following:

- Rebuild and expand my website

- Initiate my product launch through Amazon and eBay

- Develop product material & samples for hardware industry sales reps.

Your Contributions or just spreading the word is greatly appreciated... Joel
