story:
DESIGNING BEAUTY 

 There is no doubt that when you peer into the looking glass at the Glamorous Wedding Collection and Formal Designer Collection created by Melany Rowe, you are going to feel that you are a part of a Hollywood Red Carpet event. She has come into the industry with a bang with gown designs that are polished, pretty, and above all: Glamorous. Intricate, hand-sewn beading, detailed floral techniques, and feathers, adorn her Bridal & Evening gowns (and accessories!).

In her debut season with Western Canada Fashion Week (WCFW), she has managed to elicit the attention of Couture Fashion & Celebrity Bloggers, and One of a kind boutique stores in New York, Los Angeles and in her native Montreal, QC. Additionally, she has been invited to ‘Couture Fashion Week’ in New York as well as Cannes, France for the ‘Cannes Film festival’. In addition, the Designer has been accepted to show her gowns at the Si Sposaitalia Collezioni in Milan, Italy. She has recently shot the look book for her website with high end Fashion Photographer Amanda Diaz.

Melany has just signed a contract with Gotham House Studio Services (also associated with Gotham City Films) in Los Angeles, California, USA for their ‘private Actor and Producer’ Store that provides quality, one-of-a-kind gowns for notables attending Red Carpet events. The Los Angeles and New York portable stores (also associated with Gotham City Films) are known for selling to television actresses such as in the series Gossip Girl (Blake Lively is her inspiration!) as well as other Red Carpet events and is one of the feature designers that the stars can choose from. She has also recently been commissioned to sell her gowns at a high-end Fashion Store located in Montreal, Quebec’s Chabanel Street as well as a similar (high-end) independent store in Los Angeles, CA. 

Inspirations such as Alexander McQueen added with a love for all things fancy, glamourous and theatrical is what Melany Rowe is all about!

   

What Melany Rowe Needs & What Melany Gives Back

With Hollywood knocking at her door and New York spreading the word, Melany Rowe is ready to put her production in the trusted hands of a high end garment manufacturer that specializes in luxury apparel and hand embellishment techniques. 

Melany Rowe is looking for funding to take her two collections to the next level by producing quantity with quality. story_txt:
DESIGNING BEAUTY 
 There is no doubt that when you peer into the looking glass at the Glamorous Wedding Collection and Formal Designer Collection created by Melany Rowe, you are going to feel that you are a part of a Hollywood Red Carpet event. She has come into the industry with a bang with gown designs that are polished, pretty, and above all: Glamorous. Intricate, hand-sewn beading, detailed floral techniques, and feathers, adorn her Bridal & Evening gowns (and accessories!).
In her debut season with Western Canada Fashion Week (WCFW), she has managed to elicit the attention of Couture Fashion & Celebrity Bloggers, and One of a kind boutique stores in New York, Los Angeles and in her native Montreal, QC. Additionally, she has been invited to ‘Couture Fashion Week’ in New York as well as Cannes, France for the ‘Cannes Film festival’. In addition, the Designer has been accepted to show her gowns at the Si Sposaitalia Collezioni in Milan, Italy. She has recently shot the look book for her website with high end Fashion Photographer Amanda Diaz.
Melany has just signed a contract with Gotham House Studio Services (also associated with Gotham City Films) in Los Angeles, California, USA for their ‘private Actor and Producer’ Store that provides quality, one-of-a-kind gowns for notables attending Red Carpet events. The Los Angeles and New York portable stores (also associated with Gotham City Films) are known for selling to television actresses such as in the series Gossip Girl (Blake Lively is her inspiration!) as well as other Red Carpet events and is one of the feature designers that the stars can choose from. She has also recently been commissioned to sell her gowns at a high-end Fashion Store located in Montreal, Quebec’s Chabanel Street as well as a similar (high-end) independent store in Los Angeles, CA. 
Inspirations such as Alexander McQueen added with a love for all things fancy, glamourous and theatrical is what Melany Rowe is all about!
   
What Melany Rowe Needs & What Melany Gives Back



With Hollywood knocking at her door and New York spreading the word, Melany Rowe is ready to put her production in the trusted hands of a high end garment manufacturer that specializes in luxury apparel and hand embellishment techniques. 
Melany Rowe is looking for funding to take her two collections to the next level by producing quantity with quality. All our sample dresses are created in house with great attention to the hand details before we send them to our manufacturer to be sewn in quantity. The funding donated by you will be used to purchase larger quantities of fabric and embellishments which will result in Melany Rowe being able to manufacture her collections at a lower cost. 
The orders are rolling in and we need your help to get them back out the door and on the racks of some incredible boutiques. By supporting our goal, you will not be forgotten! Melany Rowe is excited to give back to you for the valuable contribution you've made....Every contribution big or small counts!
     Other Ways You Can Help



Melany Rowe recognizes that not everyone can finacially contribute to her campaign. All means of getting Melany Rowe seen are huge factors in making Melany Rowe a success. Indiegogo has share buttons that make it simple to spread the campaign so please click and share!
You can also view our website: www.melanyrowe.com
Or view our full collection: www.melanyrowelookbook.com
Melany Rowe Blog: www.melanyroweofficial.blogspot.ca

"Thank you to my amazing team for helping bring my dreams to life! I couldn't do it without all the support you each give me! 
And to those about to contribute, many thank yous for making my fashion dreams my reality! Thank you Thank you Thank you!!!!"

story:
Is your dog scared of loud noises like thunder, fireworks, alarms, and the vacuum?  

Do they need help controlling their anxiety?  

Get a PAWNIX Noise-Cancelling Headset for them, and help them tune out the world.

Our founder’s Fur-Baby Emma is one of those statistics.  Emma is the reason for the development of the Noise-Cancelling Headset for Dogs.  

Two years ago, during a 4th of July Fireworks show, Emma ran away.  

What happened: 

Colored explosions drip across the night sky. Their reflections dance along water across the bay.  The sound from the fireworks reverberates in my ears while my eyes drink in the night's wonder.  Then, at ground level, a white streak enters and exits my field of vision in the blink of an eye.   It takes me a second to realize, another dog has just ran away due to the loud 4th of July firework show.  Family members then start to yell my dog's name.  My heart stops, and I feel weak and helpless.  My dog is now another statistic and I am freaking out.  A run-away.  My family also realises what has just occured, and all get up immediately, in a panic and set off in the direction of our new runaway. 

After what seemed like hours, Emma was found down the street.  Thankfully, she had been taken into a garage by a neighbor to ride out the rest of the firework show.

Like many dogs, Emma is scared of all kinds of loud noises.  Alarms, Motorcycles, Thunderstorms, Fireworks, etc. The Journal Of American Veterinary Medical Association reported 30% of dogs suffer from some type of storm anxiety; and 86% of dogs with thunder phobia develop separation anxiety.  

I tried CBD oil and treats, doggie thundershirts, playing soothing music, nothing worked for Emma. One day, while we were traveling for my old corporate research and development job an idea popped into my head.  During the planes loading process, the stewardess on the airplane started slamming the overheard baggage compartments to get them to shut over large bags.  This happens on most flights, and because it is a loud noise, Emma jumps a little every time it happens.  I was wearing my own Noise-Cancelling headphones, so I decided to try to hold my headset to her ears.  It was bulky and awkward, but it worked.  She stopped being jumpy, and settled down and got comfortable for take off.  I let her laydown in them the rest of the flight.  That was the first day of the development process of PAWNIX Noise-Cancelling headsets for dogs. Comfortable headphones for dogs to eliminate these triggers that create all of our drama.

How do we know that it works? 

First, we used audio testing technology to prove that the electronics were in fact canceling the noises we created.  Then, we put it on Emma in different situations. The highlight was taking her to the New Years Eve Concert with midnight firework celebrations (video on our website).  She wasn’t bothered by the fireworks being set off 1 block away.

 

Every aspect of the Pawnix headset has been designed with a dog in mind. 

There is no heavy plastic for them to knock off of their head.  It is designed to be soft and cushioned with lots of noise dampening foam.  We have tested different foams, including acoustic foams, and combined them in order to provided the highest Noise Reduction Rating for the dog.  All this foam also make it like they are wear a giant pillow on their head!  So comfortable!

 

 

 

 

In a human headsets, the speaker and active noise cancelling system can sit over ear, on the ear, and in the ear.  We have designed our PAWNIX speakers to combine the benefits of on ear and in the ear technology for noise reduction, while still supplying comfort for the dogs. 

The active noise cancelation technology takes an incoming sound-wave and creates a second wave that is flipped 180 degrees to the original wave. This second sound wave intercepts the original sound-wave before entering the ear canal.  When these sound waves meet each other, they will knock each other down, thus decreasing the loud disturbance to the dog.   

 

The human hearing range is commonly given as 20 to 20,000 Hz.

The dog hearing range is commonly given as 10 to 45,000 Hz. Research by R.R. Fay and H.E. Heffner has shown that dogs also have greater sound sensitivity that humans, and detect lower intensities better than humans. We have accounted for this in our noise cancelling technology.

 

When this Indiegogo is fully funded for your PAWNIX Noise-Cancelling Headset, the PAWNIX team will contact you to help you pick the right size and color combination for fur baby. 

Colors Available:

Red Kelpie ; Blue Bamse ; Greyfriars Bobby ; and Pink Patsy Ann 

All of our headsets are named after heroic dogs from around the world. These dogs are captured for postarity as status around the world, so that their loyalty and love may be shared with many.  We want to celebrate those that care for us, and protect us.

 

PAWNIX, will reduce the number of scared dogs, and will reduce the percentage of dogs that run away during loud noises like thunderstorms and fireworks.

According to lost Pet Statistics, 14% of the 63 million dog owning households in America will runaway with in a 5 year span.  Dogs being scared by loud noises is one of the top four reasons dogs run away. 5 million dogs are lost every year. Currently 93% of dogs are found, and on average 6% of these dogs are found at shelters/humane centers etc. According to Petfiner, only about 22% of lost dogs that entered the animal shelters are reunited with their families.  The PetTech reports 1.2 million dogs are killed on the roads each year. 

We are working with shelters, humane societies and Shelter Animals Count to quantify the cost benefit our communities will see from PAWNIX Noise-Cancelling Headsets.  We will be digging deeper to report the following statistics.

Cost of Intake Exams: tbd >$250

Cost of Injuries : tbd

Daily costs:  Food, Electricity, Heat, etc - (1-2 dollars per day)

We will then be able to set yearly goals on reduction of runaway intake numbers and costs to shelters around the US.  With less intakes of runaways, the shelters can focus more resources on spay/neuter programs, and adoption programs.

PAWNIX is convenient for you and comforting for them. PAWNIX cancels the noise to keep them home.

Featured in

 
 
 

In order to deliver your PAWNIX Noise-Cancelling Headset by the spring, and the thunderstorm season, the funding from kickstarter will go to:    

  • 3rd party testing and certification of electronics (FCC, CE, ETC)
  • Packaging and shipping

Rewards

Risks and challenges

The common challenges we may face 

  • 3rd party testing of the electronics, as well as If the testing should for any reason fail to meet standards, then this could delay production. 
  • Covid-19 related shutdowns.

 

The Specification

Electronic Specification: 

 

Features:

1. Advanced active noise-cancelling design effectively reduces thunderstorms, aircraft, vacuums, and firework show noise up to 30dB. 

2.Premium CSR8670 aptX Low Latency wireless Bluetooth 5.0 stereo headphone with active noise canceling, enables you to play soothing music at a controlled volume to your dog from your smart phone or smart home operating unit.  Compatible with almost all the multimedia players and smart phones, very convenient for your daily life

3. Ergonomically and succinct design for maximum comfortable wearing experience and easy on and off

4. Battery level indicator works every time when you operate the headset

5. Built-in rechargeable Lithium-ion battery for wireless use, simply charge it via the USB-C charging cable.

story:
Genre – Documentary

Duration – 8 minutes 

Technical Format – Digital 16:9 Widescreen HD
 

Synopsis - The rowers arrive in the early morning, turn on the lights of the boathouse and hesitantly open the doors. The location of the sea will be revealed, where the weather conditions will make the viewer feel cold, but also soothed as the waves bring forward this emotion.

 We see the athlete’s reactions and the way they express themselves, which makes the viewer realise that this is not an easy sport. However, they recognise in order to become fitter and stronger at rowing, they need to grasp the level of dedication that this sport requires. 

The constant battle against turbulent waters, endurance ergs and repetitive weights gives the audience a visual insight into their physical and mental state. These changing conditions, force the athletes to focus all their attention on the movement of the boat and helps to remove themselves from any other distractions.

Statement – The beauty of the symmetry and synchronization between both rowers’ battle against the intense turbulent motion of the waves, will be the main theme throughout this documentary. The sounds of both the rower’s movement, accompanied with the natural sounds of the waves location, gives a relaxing and soothing effect against the harsh motion and reality of this extreme sport.

Having a strong focus on the continual workout will come through onto the screen as close ups of their face, breath, eyes, hands and legs will portray this muscular pain. Furthermore, the ripple effect that the boat gives as the rowers travel across the sea calms the situation, as the repetitive sound of the water gives a soothing effect to the viewer. Additionally, this comforts both athletes, as it is a reminder that this sport, besides the physical and mental pain, brings a realisation of the natural world that this early morning regime has to offer. 

Funding - All the donations will go towards waterproof housing equipment, a drone (flying camera) and Go Pro accessories so we can attach the camera to the boat/rowers, in order to show the passion, grit and intimate feel of the sport. We really appreciate all the help and support towards the making of our film.
